Waited outside at pick up window for at least 10 minutes, ignored by at least two employees, only to be told finally, after I had to ask that they're only taking orders in the app. Unacceptable. Very disappointing.

This is by far the worst Chick-fil-A ever!!! The only Chick-fil-A establishment I've ever in my entire life or existence ever experienced a problem at ever!!!! On multiple occasions at that. Every time I ever go I ask for well done and they never do it. Today they denied my $20 bill due to a 1 centimeter rip on the bill. The last time I was here they ruined my entire breakfast order and my child's tater tot's were completely burnt and hard. Unfortunately this is the closest location to my house and my baby loves Chick-fil-A. I just wish they would take notes from every other Chick-fil-A in the world and do everything right and be polite about it.

I've occasionly eaten at Chick-fil-A, but this is only my 2nd time at the Sunset Blvd. Hollywood location. When you order at any fast food restaurant sometimes the food is not hot when you receive it. Not at all the case here...the food was super-hot, fresh and delicious.  The drive-thru attendant that helped me was the store manager, Adrian. I have rarely encountered such "incredible" customer service as Adrian gave me!  Adrian with extremely professional,very polite, friendly and... the most important thing... "concerned" that my order come out rightl! I will definitely come back to this particular location of the Chick-fil-A!
Ordered 30pc chicken nuggets and selected the two dipping sauces they allow and also asked for an additional sauce and wasn't given ANY sauce at all. Horrible first time experience and waste of money

The Hollywood Chick-fil-A is fast, the staff are friendly, and my food is always hot!  I really like the new Spicy Grilled Chicken Sandwich.  Order curbside for points and to avoid the drive-thru line!

This is the worst chick fil a I've ever been to and I've given this location multiple chances. I last went during breakfast and was told everything is out except the chicken biscuit so I got that (and waffle fries since hash browns were out too). It took at least 30 minutes to get in and out of the drive through. I get home and am missing sauces and the "chicken biscuit" I was supposed to get was actually just a plain biscuit by itself, no chicken or anything, just bread. So disappointing. Went to McDonald's instead
Customer service at the Homewood, IL location is horrible. Staff are rude and nasty. I prefer to make the drive to Orland Park, IL instead. I can't stand to spend my money on poor customer service.

I understand they're a busy establishment but lately they have been in decline. In order to not deal with the crappy customer service and just fear of the pandemic, I started ordering delivery. After MULTIPLE different messed up orders, I'm not even sure I want to keep giving this location my business. They just don't care about giving you an accurate order. They full on forgot to add a deluxe sandwich to one of my orders. Do better, you guys aren't cheap.

Food is always ok. The online app never accepts any payments so I have to walk up, order, and pay. Customer service is always bad and none of the workers ever seem happy to be there. Just work on your app and customer service please!
For the line that was around the block... You would have thought the french fries would be fresh. They were cold and soggy. Customer service has definitely dropped as well. A little paranoid much...
GOD I LOVE THE FOOD!!!! dont love the values but its food not church
Excellent food. The line goes by very fast and mobile orders also come out very fast. Love the customer service at this location!

I get mixed feelings about this place everytime i come, which is pretty frequently. Sometimes the service is good, most of the time its whatever, but sometimes terrible. Tonight we waited in the drive through a total of forty minutes, but got our food in 20 min. Yeah, let that soak in for a second. Im not sure who thought this way would be more efficient, but its weird getting your food but still being forced to wait in line. When we finally got one car behind the window, we thought we were almost out, but we waited for a few mins and when we finally saw some interaction with the staff, it got followed by the staff member walking out and giving the customer a hug in the drive through. After this we continued to wait, and it kind of seemed like the person was ordering more food, once i heard the staff say would you like large or small i honked my horn to remind them there are some more people here. Mind you ive had my food at 20 min now. The staff member instantly turns to me and says "what are you honking for?" I replied with what had been going on, when someone pulled her back in through the window from saying more. Almost instantly after that, they handed the car 1 drink and i was finally able to move up to the window, so i asked for the manager and explained to him what happened. He seemed to understand my frustration and said hed speak to her  about it. When i tried to drive away from the window, the car that was previously infront stayed blocking me in thinking it was cute. Finally staff had to get involed to get the car to leave so they could continue to operate your business. Inshort, chickfila you need to check your staff. They should feel lucky they have jobs in these times.

Why do I keep coming back here? Bland overpriced chicken sandwiches and gross soggy waffle fries. Drowning everything in sauce helps a bit but not by much. It's definetly a let down when the best part of your meal is the iced tea you wash down all that junk. Plenty of chicken spots in the city to check out before going back here.

I've been frequenting this place more than I'd like, but there's obviously a reason I keep coming back. For starters, the food is consistently good here and the staff is super friendly. They have never messed up an order and the food is always packaged neatly. Obviously as others have stated, the parking/drive thru situation can be somewhat of a mess depending on what time you're there. Your best bet is to come from Sunset Blvd and make a right onto McCadden. The wait varies, anywhere from 15-30 minutes, but the staff there have a solid system in place to handle the cars, just be patient. My go-to is the classic chicken sandwich and some Chic Fil A sauce. Their fries are okay, nothing special in my opinion. Overall, this is a solid location with good fast food.

I've been going to this this location for about 2 years because it is conveniently located near my job. Unfortunately this location can NEVER get my order right. I understand that it gets extremely busy but this has happened to me numerous times it's very frustrating. Today a friend and I went for lunch. We ordered a 30 piece grilled nuggets and a grilled chicken sandwich. I check my order every time now before driving away (I learned my lesson) and I got a very small bowl of nuggets and a chicken sandwich. I said I don't think this is all 30 nuggets. I believe it was the manager that came to the window (he was wearing a blue shirt) and said yes that's a 30 piece. I pulled the bowl out and said I don't think so. He said "YES THATS THE SIZE OF THE 30 CONTAINER"!! At that point I felt bad for holding up the line but I opened the lid and began counting them 1 by 1. Lucky I had just sanitized my hands. As I got to number 11 I could see only 3 were remaining but then an employee ran up from the back and said here's the rest of your nuggets sorry we spilt the order accidentally. The manager kept saying sorry I could tell he felt stupid. I told him it's all good but it's crazy how this happens every time it's always wrong. The part that really upset me was how he kept choosing to argue with me telling me that's all of them! That's all 30! But he was completely wrong it was only half of them like I said in the beginning. Hopefully they can get a new management team that can lead this location in the right direction.

It took 27 minutes for this location to prepare my pickup order, and when I received it, I was given a medium drink instead of a large (I ordered a large and my receipt said large), and only half of my macaroni container was filled. I immediately complained about the drink size, and when the guy replaced it, he did so with the wrong drink. So I had to ask for yet another correction. On the third attempt, he put barely any ice in the cup, so what I left with was a Luke warm tea. I didn't notice the macaroni was under-filled until I got back to my work to eat. Ordering or getting anything resolved at this location is immensely frustrating, because the location is closed off and there is only one window open to pick up orders or talk to staff. With COVID, getting close to the window means getting close to a bunch of strangers crowded up near it, which is no bueno. The pickup area is also completely outdoors, and there is little to no communication from staff, as all the orders were announced via loudspeaker. Considering the number of pickup orders and the apparent predilection for mistakes, there should at least be two windows - one for delivering orders and a second for fixing them. Also, for the first 10 minutes I was there, they didn't call out a single order for pickup - so it's not like I was waiting for my order to be fulfilled over a sea of others; it just took forever for some unknown operations disaster. I have dined at dozens of CFA locations across the country and this has been by far the worst experience I've ever had. It's so bad, it disappoints me. I would rather drive 30 minutes to the nearest Raising Canes than to come back to this location. And that's a real bummer because I normal proselytize the CFA brand. It's my favorite fast food restaurant. This location needs some serious TLC. Jesus.

Closed Sundays, a really easy drive-through now in times of Covid. Since business is so high (every time I've gone), CFA smartly has two drive through lanes and staff takes your order before you get to the drive through speaker. Our order taker jumped lines to make sure my car was accommodated so I didn't have to wait! Chick-fil-A is great for their chicken sandwiches which I've loved for years. Grilled has less calories, which I go for. I also love the house sauce! There are a couple salad options but would skip since it's extra money to have chicken added to the market salad (even though it's advertised in the picture as with chicken while It's actually not unless requested).Nuggets are quite small, kid-size so if you have an appetite, get a lot! All in all, I'll always be back when I'm in the mood for my chicken fix!

Say what you want about them not fw my homosexual homies but they do be making the fye chicken sandwiches can't deny that. Lemonade is bless get that every time or you sleep, and don't be a weirdo just order the shit it's a panoramic out here.

I did a online order from the app and picked up my order. When I got home I realized they didn't put my whole order in the bag. I called the store on Greenville Street here in Anderson, SC and explained I didn't have my entire order. The gentleman I spoke with apologized and asked for my address. They brought me the rest of my order and also gave me a gift card. I'm speechless their customer service is above excellent. I gave a 5 star rating because that's the highest number you have. Very happy and satisfied customers.THANK YOU
I order nuggets wanted breaded but got grilled ask for buffalo souice didn't get that

This was the one on shaw and fresno st bu fashon fair mall. Received wrong item so I called and talked to Crystal the manager she was very nice. When I called they said it would only be 10 mins. I waited over 30 minutes. And I had to keep calling them to remind them I was still waiting. And my food was cold. Bad service. I didnt end up eating my food

I would think twice about eating at this Chik-fil-a. Last time I ate there I found a Fingernail in my sandwich. I wrote to them and complained and I only received a Canned response and no response from the Store owner. They didn't refund my money. For that. I am eating at Wendy's where I know the food is prepped right.

I rarely go to Chick Fil A but when I do I usually have a decent experience with this location. This time was different. We went to this location tonight and they gave us the wrong order. We kindly told the cashier that it was wrong. When she called over the supervisor on duty he angrily complained to her about possibly getting in trouble if he has another wrong order. They stood around for a bit talking, then remade the order.I get home, open my sandwich and there's a hair in it...we were so grossed out and disappointed we threw the whole order away.

I'm done with this location. Every time I go there the fries are stale, the burger is cooked unevenly with some parts cooked and others under cooked. I mean wow. And talk about horrible presentation. This should get fixed ASAP bc this is just unacceptable at this point.

I have never been to a rude Chick-fil-A and I was so disappointed in the customer service here I understand it's a hard day we're all outside but the lady who was assisting was talking about me as if I'm not standing there in my car waiting to be helped I wasn't offered condiments it was just all over a bad experience and I love Chick-fil-A one of my uncles works at Chick-fil-A so I always go there so this was like a huge disappointment made me feel extremely uncomfortable

Chick fil A is such a ripoff.  I ordered a Parfait and it was less than half filled, do you know how much they charge for a Parfait.  Then I got a fruit cup, same thing not filled at all.  I hate Chick fil A.

This place is a phenomenon in the Chick-fil-a world. Of my last few orders, I have received the incorrect items, incorrect or missing sauces, or super overcooked chicken. The staff has been generally unhelpful in resolving these issues. I'd recommend finding a Chick-fil-a with better attention to detail until this one can get their act together. It's a hard pass for me right now; I don't love chick-fil-a enough to keep dealing with these people.

I hate to leave a bad review for one of my favorite restaurant chains, but im doing so in hopes that the franchise owner or any higher level management sees this. Today i went through the drive thru & they gave me someone else's order. Everyone makes mistakes, its natural, so i decided to not make a big fuss about it. I went through the drive thru again and informed them that they gave me the wrong order. I then had to repeat my order again, wait in the long line, and finally get my food. Or so i thought. I get to the window expecting to give them the wrong order back, get my food and go. Well thats when everything went straight to hell. Not only did they not care that they made a mistake, they started saying we owed $7 and wanted to refund the original charge and charge us again. I asked to speak to the manager, elias, which instead of being a mediator and upholding the golden rule of "the customer is always right", started arguing with me. He then charged me $1.13 (i dont know how he came up with that), and gave me my food. I take off only to realize they gave me the wrong order AGAIN. At this point i was furious and decide to get out of my car and handle this in person. I mean, what does someone have to do in order to get their damn food and some courtesy? The lack of professionalism and the fact that elias literally argued with me about a dollar is ridiculous. Im a frequent patron of chick fil a, but i will take my business to another franchise. If i was a business owner i would be embarrassed to have a "manager" argue and go toe to toe with a customer over a dollar. I'm also be concerned that in the day and age of COVID19, they take items back from people. Its not sanitary.

At this particular location (I come here often) their employees are NOT as friendly or helpful. Some of you may COVID has changed things. While this is true, this has been a persistent issue way before COVID. They also no longer offer reviews.  Items are missing or packaged poorly; the staff seems to be disappointed they have to serve so many customers and it shows. Many don't say, thank you or my pleasure.
Fast, friendly and tasty with the reasonable price. My daughter and I enjoyed so much. It was such a wonderful choice.

Friend Coughed On at Chick-Fil-A for Wearing a Mask. A friend was waiting to get to the walk up order window at Chick-Fil-A on Sunset & Highland 4 weeks ago, where 3 young adults (18-19) were hanging around by the window and blocking access to the order window. They were not wearing masks. When he asked them to move to the pickup window so he can order, they refused and were mocking him for wearing a mask. They also coughed on him and a few others. They said Covid is a hoax. Then they picked up their phones and started recording everyone telling them they are going to blame those people on their social media (frame them) for bothering them . None of the workers at the restaurant could care less. There was no security around, even though there is supposed to security present there. This altercation went on for 10 to 15 mins. After month-long calls to Chick-Fil-A customer service we have gotten nowhere. The franchise owner has proven to be a real jerk. And has totally ignored the complaints. He initially even gave us the finger by offering a free cookie. Like throwing someone a penny. Extremely insulting.   It's shocking how uncaring Chick-Fil-A has turned out to be considering their claims of being otherwise.

During this COVID - 19 ordeal, you are only allowed to use the drive-through. This is the problem as the lines are so long that by the time you do get your food you can't wait to drive away to eat. just to open your bag and find your food wrong or the fries are so few, that you wonder if should've gone somewhere else for the $10 you just paid for a chicken sandwich, small coke, and the three fries you just got.

First shout out Johnny for the great custo service  the line seemed long but it went quick ... Johnny made it worth the waithowever my fries tasted kinda old, not fresh and my chicken nuggets didn't seem like they were fresh either. Quality could be improved but i still love chick fil a

Undercooked & very oily fries, disgusting. We had to throw away 4 fries. Not good for the brand name, they need to do some quality control. Also, they're so stingy on portions. A large fries is only 3/4 filled. Poor operation.
Another swing and miss on the order being correct.  Is this a joke? lol

I was very disappointed to see some of the staff wearing their masks improperly when preparing food. Luckily, most of the food I purchased could be re-heated in microwave. I will not be coming here again. I don't want to have to worry about my cold items and beverages because food preparers cannot follow simple instructions or practice common sense.

This Chick-Fil-A gave me food poisoning on July 1. I had a spicy chicken sandwich and a small peach shake and about 3 hours later I thought I was going to die.Not surprised to read the reviews here about how filthy the inside is, how they don't change the oil, etc. This location is vile. I'm put off Chick Fil A for life.

Chick-fil-A the spicy grilled chicken is my favorite Chick-fil-A sauce is really good and the waffle fries are amazing the lemonade is a must they are enforcing wearing masks and social distancing hand sanitizers stations available
Whoever made the Mac and cheese today... I just want to thank you for understanding me  Bless your existence and thank you for making my day

I love this Chick-fil-A. As soon as you walk in, you smell a good odor. And the breakfast is amazing. I always try to get the delicious hashbrowns, that they make so fresh. They always make you feel great, they use great slogans and they are here to serve you. They have a variety of good food, and I can't get enough of it. I love chicken and I love Chick-fil-A

This Chic-fil-a is busy!!! But that is to be expected in Hollywood. They get your order right and it's pretty quick. However over the times I have gone to this location and drink the fountain drink I get there is no flavor! The employees never check if the syrups in the fountain drink machine are working or filled up. I always get a flavorless soda here. It's really disappointing.

Really employees at this particular location, wtf. Each size of fries is worth a different amount yet both of my orders looked as if they were filled up with a size small amount. Imagine driving out on a Friday to have something different during quarantine for your family and you set up the table and are trying to serve everyone their food and the fries look like this? I was pissed off to be honest it was a waste of time and money. Did the employees help themselves before serving them to me? Very disappointed to present size medium and large side by side as I removed them out of the bag. Make sure you check your order before leaving their drive through lane. I can't express it enough. Who cares if you hold up the line, just make sure you're getting what you are paying for.
I just want coffee to be on the postmates menu for this location  everything else is good though. another location has coffee on postmates but it's farther away

I live down the street and this review is because they make a killing here and give ZERO back to the community, how about coughing up some money for GARBAGE CANS AROUND YOUR STORE!!  That's the very least thing that they can do yet they don't! McCadden, Leland and Highland for a 2 block radius is absolutely disgusting with Chick-fil-A bags and trash . I've also had EXTREMELY TERRIBLE EXPERIENCES here. Tonight takes the cake though. I waited in line for 35 minutes and gave my order.. got to the window and was told that they no longer had food left. How in the hell does that happen? Seriously? How do you take someone's order and then not have the food? They couldn't save me the giant long wait? Nothing!!! They start closing their store 2 hours before they are supposed to, so if you wanted a frosted lemonade or milkshake you better come during lunch because they just stop making that at night anyway. This place is truly awful and the food really isn't good either
My online order was cancelled after 40 minutes of waiting, no explanation email, no phone number to call....never again

Most of chick-fil-a. Are good but this is Horrible branch. Dirty oil use, so chicken nuggets are brownish black color , chicken taste like lubber.I wish someone open another chick- fil- a near here.I reported to their headquarter in GA but it is franchise so they can't control this location they said.

The service here is amazing friendly and the genuinely care about your business at their establishment. Unfortunately chick fil a is ALL hype for me. Their nuggets are decent And Their chicken sandwiches are ehhh. Literally nothing special about them. I prefer Wendy's chicken sandwich in all honesty.
I ordered delivery and asked for sauce and extra pickles got nothing of what I ordered disappointed
I honestly love this chick fil a! They are always so fast, and they make my day thank you guys!

I have been to different Chik fil a locations in different cities and this is by far The worst one. The customer service is horrible. I ordered 2 breakfast meals and one entree and they repeated my order just fine. I get to the window and I drive off with my bag. Before I pass the first block we realize were missing one pack of tatertots from one of the meals so I go back to let them know. I get a little girl with attitude that asks for the receipt and let's me know they only charged me for one tatertot which doesn't make sense because they gave me 2 drinks so there's clearly 2 meals. So instead of offering to charge the extra for the other tatertot since apparently I didn't buy them she just stares at me with attitude. I hate to see this kind of customer service at chik fil a because that's they are known for great customer service and I don't mean to judge any other fast food place but she should probably go work at a jack in the box with her attitude. I didn't get a chance to get her name but I hope they have some sort of talk with these kids there's no way this is the first complaint about this. Oh one more thing our sandwiches were room temp the cheese wasn't even melted throughout the whole sandwich just lovely wasn't even worth dealing with the hassle.

I got soup and they didn't give me a soup spoon. Really!!! I didn't get to eat my soup. Bad idea for customer service. Give people a soup spoon when they order soup. Isn't it bad enough you have to ask for a straw. Very disappointed in this chick fil a.

I came here a few weeks ago a little bit before closing. There was a really obnoxious worker in the back that walked by the window as I was getting my food and screamed at me saying if I come back at this time when it's close to closing again that he's going to spit in my food. The girl at the window looked so shocked and was like he was kidding but he walked back over and was like no I'm not ! anyway I guess be careful if there's a obnoxious man giving you your food because now I'm scared to go back.
Always pretty quick & nice service. Your lemonade just ALWAYS tastes so nasty for some reason. Every. Time.

I live near to this place. And tried their chicken several times. To be honest, I really liked it bec each time when I am ordering my food comes fast, hot and delicious. I rated them 4 star bec they dont have security in this place and there are lot of homeless people.

WORST CHICK FIL A LOCATION. First of all if you've been to a location in the South, they have the best customer service. THIS LOCATION doesn't live up to the Chick Fil A standard AT ALL! Completely rude  and no care in world for their customers. Secondly, I had a reward for a free nugget or Kale salad. Complete FALSE ADVERTISEMENT! They did not honor it. And did not offer an explanation or a "I'm sorry". Won't be going here again. Just awful!

Started off really well when it opened. Stopped by for dinner today. No Mac n cheese, no salads. I get the nuggets and fries drive home 3 blocks and my food is colder than a polar bears toenails!! Won't be back anymore trash food. Had two nuggets and tossed the rest in the trash. Staff has always been great. Best part of my meal today was the ice in my sweet tea lol. Horrible food even worse are the milkshakes ! It was hot milk with whip cream. No quality control at this location  disappointing disgusting food and shakes.

This is the just a stupid place. Live around the corner, but have only been there a couple of times. Last night around 9:00pm. I went there.  The drive thru was backed up on to the street.  I was not even in the the parking lot, when a kid comes to my car and asks to take my order.  I was at least 5 cars from the menu.  I said I haven't seen the menu.  He hands me a tablet with the menu items so small I couldn't possibly read them.  I also noticed that neither of their two drive thru lanes were moving.  I drove away and will never be back

This is my favorite CFA location in LA! It's not my closest though, so I only go here if I'm in the neighborhood. The food is always fresh and my goodness they are so fast with your order! This location honors the CFA app which is a huge plus for me. There are two drive through lanes and you can also walk up and order at the windows. There are several parking spots available and TONS of outdoor tables to sit and eat at. All the staff have always been kind to me.
Amazing Experience very friendly staff one in particular named Jasmine Marquina was very kind and helpful so welcoming definitely coming back just because of her service

Yes, I understand it's a busy hollywood location. And yea, I did come during rush hour so it was insanely busy. But I'm pretty sure they gave me somebody else's order because I got the exact opposite of what I ordered. I asked for a plain chicken sandwich without pickles but I got the the spicy chicken sandwich WITH pickles! Lol, what can you you do? I wasn't about to ask for a change cuz I already waited for like a half hour in the drive through line. Kind employees though. I also gotta dock a star cuz they anti-lgbt and they are opened in Hollywood. The irony...
The worst customer service assay night the guy Judy closed the lane in my face Ann's I was here before their official  closing time. They dont care about their customers at all. 1
Customer service is not good, some of the employees are grumpy and completely rude, and I've had my order messed up at least 3 different times. Not happy with this location!!!

This was my regular/go-to chic fil a, typically go monthly. This morning I used door dash and my chicken biscuit had a gray pubic hair inside the bun. Thankfully I had opened it up and looked before pouring any sauce.So disgusted, reached out to door dash who did nothing. I will never go back to this location. So grossed out and wasted $13 on food and delivery of one chicken biscuit that was immediately thrown in the trash.

I go to this Chick-fil-A every morning, I get two eggs sausages, The hash browns is great the employees that work there is great they have good service I appreciate them serving me, the managers are great, one day my food was wrong and he reimbursed me with a free sandwich with no hesitation or no problems. I also go there for lunch sometimes, and get a Chick-fil-A sandwich. The evening employees is also great. The food comes out hot and in a decent amount of time I can't complain with the service I give this overall five stars.

I decided to pick up some spicy sandwiches for the hubs on my way home and the drive thru line was all the way to the streets. I honestly thought id have to wait a good 20-30 minutes until I could even place my order. Maybe 3-5 minutes of being in the line, an employee came to the window, took our order and had our food brought out within another 3-5 minutes. I swear I thought the whole good customer service thing was just a internet thing but I was totally wrong. 5 stars for the fast and friendly service! Wish every fast food location was just as awesome.

Lupita was excellent tonight, thank you for your positivity. While pulling up to drive thru I had no expectations but I was left with waiting for my waffle fries uplifted after my short but sincere interaction with Lupita who was very courteous and positive. I was already satisfied for coming to Chick-fil-A even before I got my fries as I'm typing this

Leslie the manager made me wait 20 min on purpose they all laughing and what not. They know who I am. Licence plate guy. You kids gotta go back to school. And get retrained. Or fired. Ain't this discrimination....
The place would get a 5 star but they need to have someone directing traffic.The customers block the road too often

I'm almost 30 years old and this is my first time trying chic-til-a, and boy was it delicious! My hubby picked it up, so I didn't get to experience the amazing customer service, but he said I should definitely go back and experience it for myself. We got the spicy chicken Delux sandwich and it was soooo delicious! Sauces were so yummy too. Fries were the only thing that I didn't really care much for, but I'll try asking for extra crispy next time I go to chic fil a. Been craving it since I had it a few days ago, so I'll probably go again sometime soon!

I love chick-fil-A sauce and use quite a bit. I usually ask for extra, but I guess at this location you have to pay for extra. For goodness sake your chick-fil-A. Dumb and this is a deal breaker for me.

Spicy deluxe tastes amazing every time, and the line always moves super fast and wait time is almost non existent. Only reason they don't get 5 stars is because they removed a lot of items from the menu recently.

4stars because most of the Workers here are amazing. It's a person here named Leilani that was so rude and unhelpful it was shocking. Couldn't believe it when she said she was the manager. My order was wrong on Postmates and I came from my home to get my order right and she admitted it was wrong but wanted me to pay for it again even though NOTHING was eaten from the bag. Disgusting. But I won't let her deter the nice people that work at Chik Fil A. Fire her though. She made me lose my appetite.

This location has gone down hill very fast. They have cut the menu to half the items. They offer no unique menu items (no breakfast burrito, Mac and cheese or even iced coffee). They have new weird cheap signs up advertising to super size your fries. The drive through line also took twice as long as it ever took before. An employee stated the franchise owner cut the menu to balance costs with his other location...we will not be back.

Chick-fil-A has THE BEST salad. I ate mine without the dressing and it was still SOOO yummy! I did dip my nuggets in the Buffalo Wings Sauce though! The flavors of everything just add up into something magical in your mouth. The service was fast and the food is always good here! Always good to remember it's closed on Sundays! It's funny that I would get cravings for Chick-fil-A on Sundays. Try their salad, you won't regret it!
Tasty chicken. Love the guest service. I will be come again back again for this wonderful experience.Warren 2020 #forsure

Punta del norte httpsppI just can't get enough of Chick-fil-A someone's or twice every week leather Chick-fil-A sauce love their fast reliable friendly young staff ...And a very busy busy street so you must be careful if you're not from the Hollywood area
Jeremiah was freindly ASF he even offered me a water cup when I got up to the window on god I'm coming back thanks jeremiah

First World Problem Review #3Why the heck does this popular location NOT carry the new Mac & Cheese? I guess the media screwed up when they said this was available at ALL locations nationwide...Hollywood is exempt. That's what I get for listening to the crooks, I know. Reached out to ask why and received the generic, 'We have forwarded your concerns to the appropriate people', blah blah blah. Which means it went nowhere. If this is the worst thing that can happen to me, I guess I'm grateful. But still pissed since I was craving this hard one night. Your sweet tea is still tops though. Meh. I've experienced better, HERE AT OTHER LOCATIONS!

This location is quite possibly the worst chic fil a location. On two occasions I've gone during normal business hours and the drive thru was chained closed. I watch many cars do the same as me and stop with confusion and then drive away. I emailed corporate both times about the loss of business and they sent a generic reply and said they'd send it to the franchise owner. I never received a reply. Then literally a day after I was raving to coworkers about the breakfast at chic fil a, they ALL went only to find the breakfast menu cut down to hot generic coffee and 2 breakfast options. To make it worse the breakfast menu was covered with printer paper!!! It looked soooooo tacky and a month later, it's still there. The employees encouraged us to reach out to corporate because they were getting a lot of heat for the sudden change and the owner was not stepping in to take ownership of the change (well besides the printer paper signs. ) Corporate once again sent a generic email about not having the kitchen space anymore. This is interesting because they had the space before and they didn't add anything to the menu.  They said they'd send my comments to the franchise owner but I know how that will go. I don't know what the future direction is for this location but it's really sad to not get the service you expect from chic fil a.
Drive thru line moves fast af considering it's located in the heart of Hollywood ,great service ,food gets delivered to your car while you wait to get out the parking lot !!

This chic-fil-a sucks. They charge 25 cents for more than 3 sauces. They have also eliminated several items off the menu including chicken soup. The drive thru menu board has white paper over everything they have decided to eliminate. How can this one location be able to do whatever they want? No consistency here!

Great food, bad location, limited parking, drive thru line into the street, no inside seating, hobos sleeping on the sidewalk, filthy tables. This location is the worst of the best. Move to another location that isn't a failed Carl's Jr
According to my mother in law, who is hard to please, she gives a 4-star with no comment.

BEWARE!! Literally the worst Chick fil a on planet earth. First, as I wait in line, I see a family of cockroaches crawling by my feet, which caused everyone else in line to freak out. Then, I go to order the cool wrap meal and they said they took it off the menu to "speed things up". They literally offer that item at every other chick fil a. So I order a 12 piece nugget and they gave me like 9 pieces and fries that are cold and soggy. Oh yeah and they charge you 50 cents each for bbq sauce and honey mustard, which no other chick fil a does. Let me be clear. I love chick fil a and go often. But this location is very dirty, greedy and does not operate like a normal chick fil a location.

This has been the worst experience at Chick-fil-A ever !!! Chick-fil-A is my favorite restaurant but this place is just terrible !! For example one of the workers was smoking and then just slammed the door to go back to work .And the restrooms are soooooo nastyThe smell is like pee and poo and there is graffiti everywhere:(

Why doesn't this location serve mac & cheese. I called the store yesterday and they said the owner did not want to serve it. Why?Oh my God, they have the best drive through system in the world. The employees are beyond courteous and helpful. The drive-through is like going through a pitstop at the Indy 500...I don't Believe in their politics but the food is awesome... Definitely get the signature sandwich at Chick-fil-A. Also try the Chick-fil-A minis usually served at breakfast...I always thought in and out had great customer service... Nothing
RIP to the iced coffee, killed my only reason of stopping by there everyday before work. Used to be a regular, will be going elsewhere for my coffee. Bring the iced coffee back :(
The first item that I ordered was not in my bag, I had asked for the 8 pc grilled nuggets. It was so kind of them to bring my order to my car but yeah no nuggets :(

This is probably the sorriest drive through ever and so friggin slow , they disorganized, I will never go through this one again. Come to the drive through place my order for breakfast, mind you the breakfast menu is up and the wait 25 minutes to get to the window and they tell me there not serving breakfast at 10:30am and didn't have the decency to apologize, they suck I would give the place zero stars and need better management

Not nearly as good as the hype. I tried the Cobb Salad (not enough eggs and such for the hefty price), and the basic and the deluxe chicken sandwich. The basic was very, very basic. Just dry bread and pickle with a chicken patty inserted, and the deluxe wasn't any much better... again, especially for the hefty price. I will say, however that the "Chic Filet Sauce" they offer in little tubs, is absolutely addictive. But I had to drench my sandwiches with it to enjoy them, haha. -- Also, they are closed on Sunday... really? In 2019? -- Lame! (eye-roll)

We love Chick-fil-a, especially the Downey location.  The foods are good and very healthy; salad at this is the best of all fast food chain. All the employees were always very nice and polite. Services were excellent and the dining areas very clean and restroom facility was in sanitary conditions.  Chick-Fil-a is our #1 fast foods place.  We visit them at least twice a week.David L

The staff working on Tuesday nights have no common sense. My order was simple and they messed it up completely. Number one no pickles with lettuce ( for an extra 15 cents) just the sandwich. They sent it plain so I told them to just add the lettuce, it took an extra 10min and they sent it wrong again!!! This time they gave me a deluxe!? I didn't want cheese or tomato. I also got the 12 count grilled nuggets meal. They gave me the regular fried nuggets and no fries?! The whole experience was horrible! The manager did not help at all... on my third attempt to try to get the sandwich right, he told me that I should have been charged more for the lettuce, even though it clearly showed on my receipt that I DID get charged for that lettuce. Now 30 min later, I have completely lost my appetite so I just kept my sandwich and asked for my money back on the rest. FYI-they know that they mess up orders so they take people's receipts away and when you try to confront them, they try to make you look crazy, so disrespectful! I asked them to reprint my receipt. The evidence lays here I added a photo of the reprinted receipt

Aniyah helped me and she was so so nice. This location is actually so nice for hollywood bc they have two to go lines and a parking lot which is convenient bc there is neverrrr parking in hollywood! They also have little water mist machines for warm days like today If you are waiting in line or if you are eating outside !

Fantastic location, it's always clean and quick. I've been coming here for years and they have LITERALLY never gotten my order wrong. Not once. The customer service is always a pleasure, one time I lost my phone hear and they gave me a gift certificate... it wasn't even their fault!

Girls who took money at curbside register have a sarcastic attitude like theyre gunna fuck your order up on purpose and they do! Gave me kids fries really skimped instead of large paid 11$ for meal.They are as retarded up close as they are from afar joking being clueless.and i have asked to have it to go and she gave me a shitty attitude and said "it already comes in a bag to go!" Fuck you bitch i dont know that. Most times coming here these young kids need to be aware and not be deaf. Its not hard! Do your job.
Excellent service but every time  I come to this chick fil a and order a large fry, I get a small amount of fries in a large box
Their fries are bomb and they have semi fast service, their burgers however aren't as tasty

Chick-fil-A has yet to fail me in providing consistent, delicious tasting fast food. This location is a drive through and walk up only (no dine in). However, there is outdoor patio/seating area so you can still enjoy your yummy chikn and lemonade. It's my favorite location because even though the lines are long, they bring your order to your car for you within minutes of ordering.

Worse experience at chick f la location, worse location , I never go inside but I didn't feel like eating and driving . I came with a group of friends as soon we came in to make line there was this crazy guy talking and screaming to a cop that was ordering food, maybe the cop was on his lunch break but so unprofessional not to do anything even after. There was another crazy lady there also being loud , there were kids, it was really scary . When we waited in line this lady that works for chick f la was in line too and was getting too close to my friend not giving her space. The cashier was not friendly like other chick f la employees. When I got my food they call my name went to the window and the workers seem distracted I waited like two min. My friend sandwich had cold cheese. I'm only giving two stars because only one of the workers seem to handle the situation with the crazy guy outside very professional.

This is one of my favorite places to eat for sure! Food is consistently great and service prompt and friendly. This location didn't let me down. There is no inside dining area but with Southern California weather I didn't mind. I would suggest a little more attention to keeping the tables clean but I was taking my breakfast to go so i didn't hang around. Otherwise great location and though it's a tight parking and drive-thru, access in and out was a lot easier than I expected. If you've never tried Chick Fil-a you have to! We love the chicken mini's and the sausage, egg, and cheese biscuit!

I got my friends car broken into and my laptop stolen intront of the togo window and no one has contacted me back regarding the video footage. We were eating in the patio while all this happened and they seemed to be helpful at first but no one ever followed up.

Uriel made my experience on 6/22/19 PHENOMENAL (with Caps) when The staff mistakenly put whip cream on my milkshake. He personally remade it for me with Love  & walked back to my car. Thank you so much Uriel

OJ Simpson owns and operates this establishment... I am out here trying to give people the truth. Listen up sheeple, it's now or never. If you don't believe, go check for yourself. Ask anyone and they're legally obligated to answer. Thanks for listening.

Chick-fil-a  It is the same no matter where you eat it, in my opinion. The employees are nice and helpful, and they truly have the best "fast" food chicken sandwiches out there. On the chicken nuggets, I do have to agree with the other reviewer, Damn! where's the chicken in these nuggets? I found out in a similar fashion, as I had purchased them for grand children. But I don't order them any more. I just like Chik-fil-a, and this is a good stop for chicken products.

I come here frequently but today I had the worst experience ever!! Spent 42 bucks on food and paid extra for some extra sauce. While I was driving out I pulled over to check my bag to make sure everything was there. They didn't give me any of the sriracha sauce and also was missing 1 bbq sauce. I came back around the corner and let them know. Opened my bag for the guy that walked up to my car to show him the sauces and even counted them for him and showed him the receipt and he said sorry I'll go get them. The lady at the window had the nerve to say, she ain't getting anymore sauces. What?!? Are you kidding me?!? I paid for extra sauce and you didn't give it to me!!! You  aren't doing me a favor. I paid!!! Anyway. Nobody would give me her name. I asked 4-5 employees at the window and the ones taking the orders and they all wouldn't give me a name. They ruined my appetite and I'm never coming back again.
Quick and delicious. They move so quickly and are extremely friendly. Like all chick fil a's

This place is amazing. I came her as a gay man craving a chicken breast sandwhich. And left a a straight man craving womens breast in my face. Their food is amazing, you can almost taste the intolerance.  I wish I could have given this place 5 thumbs up, because stars are a bit gay. MUST TRY

Horrible. They never check your order if it's over 4 combos. I work at the Hollywood Bowl. I've gone to this Location many times with $100+ orders 8-10 combos at a time. And the last 4 times in a row you SHORT ME 3-4 sandwiches from my combos and then argue with me about the time I'm calling back because I have to drive in traffic back to work as if I ate them. You guys are lazy and sad that a business doesn't respect a big order like IN&OUT or even WENDYS does. 1 Star only cuz i can't give 0

I have two hungry boys. I thought they were joking when each of my sons ordered a 30-piece box of nuggets...EACH! I said, "Are you kidding me? How can you eat that much? I'm not spending fifty bucks on chicken nuggets!" Of course, being the rich spoiled brats that they are who always get their way, I ended up shelling out my Amex black card just to shut their whining pie-holes. When we got our food, I realized WHY my kids had ordered a total of 60 chicken nuggets. Each chicken nugget was the size of a pea-pellet. I'm not joking. I couldn't believe it. I spent $47 for two boxes of chicken nuggets that were smaller in size than the brain of my most recently fired employee...and that's SMALL! Up your game, Chick-fil-A. You're cheating the public.The only reason I gave you two stars is because your sauces are like MSG-infused liquid crack. I could drink them straight...well, actually, I did because I couldn't see the nuggets swimming around in them.

Ugggg this place is soooo killing my summer time bod right now!!!!! Why must you be so good!!! I'm totally hooked on zesty buffalo sauce because I just love the way it makes my tongue numb. When I'm stoned, I hear this place calling my name. And it doesn't help that I'm staying half block from this place!! I went for In-and -Out last night and for the first time, I found the animal sauce to be a bit salty. I know!!! What is happening to me!!Omg get this place away from me!!!!! Noooooo!!! I want more!!!! Noooo you must stay away!! But I can't fight it anymore!!!! Fast food is bad for you! But I looooove the way it tastes!!! No stop it! Summer time bod, remember!!! Ahhhhhh

This location specifically has the worst service I've ever experienced at any chick fil a. Asked some friends that have gone here as well and they all agreed about the service. Definitely not like other chick fil a's or what you'd expect. The order is usually wrong as well and the staff gets angry if you tell them. Occasionally they are fine but 8/10 they're not going to be helpful with anything. Burbank just opened up a location. Haven't been there myself but from what I've heard the service is much better.

Food is goodCustomer service is goodParking is okayThere is no place to sit besides outside. That's why I never go anymore.Props to them for letting drag queens film a music vide there. Don't believe me? Just look it's okay to eat chic-fill-a on YouTube. Pretty hilarious.

Trash don't know how to make a custom order. Slow, not friendly... next. They're all just hanging out. They over charged me for something I've ordered many times. How does every other chic fil a know how to make an order but you guys don't. Look if it's either McDonald's or this at the minimum at least McDonald's will charge you correctly and have your food in a timely manner. Find new management because they suck .

It's our second time to visit this location on our way to the dentist. The drive through is so convenient! Someone takes your order and payment and you just pick up at the window. Today though we went at 1230pm and it was pretty packed so a team member walked up to our car and handed us our order instead!Love the fact that they don't give you excessive amounts of condiments too as I hate wasting food.  Love this location!

Yes they aren't the best with the community but they have really good food and I'm definitely on the safe side when I say I'm coming again. They have great food great service. What else could you ask for?! They have multiple options to choose from. Definitely deserves my 5 star rating

I love this location! They have mostly good days and certainly some bad moments within the premises but they are pretty efficient. I am normally not in drive thru line to long. However, the restaurant is off a busy intersection and gets pretty gridlock at times. Other than that, great location & pretty fast service.
i love chick-fil-a! eat there every morning! live in va went to ca for vacation. guess what breakfast was the first day??? it is a must have!!!!

I absolutely love chick fil a bUT of ALL the chick fil A's I've been to, I got sick at this one! Drive thru was horrendous and to top it off they CHARGE FOR "EXTRA" SAUCE...WTF. How am I supposed to have my nuggets AND fries with a limit on my sauce ..it's the only location I know of that does this. I said whatever and paid the additional $.25 PER sauce bc I was that desperate. Only to get home and notice the chick fil a sauce even tasted different than before. That should've been my red flag right there ..so now I fully regret going to to this location and so do my bowels. Save yourself the trip and avoid this location at all costs (pun intended).

This has probably been the best and fastest Chick-fil-a experience I've ever had. Talk about efficient. Our group went through the drive-through and the line was long but moved quickly. They took our payment right when we ordered (the employees stand out there and take orders and payment on a tablet) and our food was ready as soon as we pulled up to the window. We were out of there in about 5 minutes! They did miss some of the sauces we ordered but had already driven away since they were moving us quickly. If you're cruising through Hollywood and need to get food fast without getting out of your car, this is the chicken spot for you.
I know the company isn't a great one and they aren't about supporting all communities and genders BUT DAMN Their Chicken was good. BG I guess

I absolutely love chick-fil-a, don't get me wrong. But this location is absolutely horrible. The drive through protrudes out to the main road, blocking traffic, as well as people trying to pull into the tiny parking lot. The parking lot is very limited and there is no indoor seating... only a few seats outside. Overall the service is decent but the location is very horrible. I would not recommend visiting during lunch hours, as it gets way too crazy to just get in and out.
I would not go back nothing special about this place it's a normal sandwich place ridiculous line sometimes but then I usually like trying new stuff but this is not something I will go back for

Contender for best chicken sandwich ever. I don't care if it's a chain. It's quality. Possibly the best quality in the fast food game. I usually go with the og chicken sandwich but everything is great here. So glad there's more of these popping up in California. Their breakfast is fantastic also. Fun Fact: this location used to be a Carl's Jr

Chick-fil-A - another delicacy for my East Coast having ass. We don't see many of these in the New England area that I am from. I went with the spicy chicken sandwich with waffle fries. Kept it simple. Simple was all I needed for some late night eats (10 PM for me). As a matter of fact, I best be getting back home now. Solid food. Solid service. What more could you ask for?That's a wrap.Chicken is their specialty and chicken they do well. Five stars.

My colleague and I came here on a Monday night. He ordered 2 medium fries and a sweet tea Arnold Palmer. How they managed to get the order this poorly executed, I have no idea. BUT after we drove off and opened the bag his medium fries had about half the box full with cold fries and the Arnold Palmer was regular and not sweet. We were too far to go back but this is definitely beyond disappointing for a chick-Fil.A.
I had a craving for chick fil a yesterday, as I haven't had it in a long time. Of course it was exactly what I wanted it to be.

The food is usually great and fresh but today it was not the chicken breakfast sandwich was old the chicken was dry and the biscuit was hard also they didn't even give me a full order of hashbrowns the best thing was my drink. So disappointed
I don't care what they say about you. You're delicious. Best chicken sandos in the world.

So I ordered breakfast through the app one morning and I got to the location and they told me they were unable to make the biscuits for the chicken minis bc the oven was broken and told me my options for something else. It wasn't a big deal I understand things happen out of your control so I picked something else. It was alright but I still enjoyed it. No complaints. I look on the app a few days later and they sent me a reward for a free sandwich bc of my troubles! Chick-fil-A never disappoints!

Every chick fil A deserves a 5 star review in my honest opinion. The customer service is always great and they keep the drive through moving at this location. Chick-fil-A could possible have some of the best sauce in the game!

Like the other reviews say,This place charges extra for sauce now. Im sorry that i like different sauces to go with my nuggets and fries. The sauces are a huge reason why i love chic fil a!I wont be going to this location anymore strictly out of principal. Does corporate even allow this franchise location to do this??

$3.18 for a side salad? And $0.25 for extra sauce? OMG...and to make things worse my money is donated to anti-gay foundations? Well, it's not really about the donations...the food is too expensive...especially for such a low quality.

I don't know why I tried this place again. They charge 25 cents for extra sauce. I bought enough food for 4 people and they only gave me 4 sauces. I asked for one more and they wanted to charge me. I have never heard that at a Chick-fil-A before.On the app tho, you can order as many sauces as you like. This just happened to be that one night I didn't get to place a mobile order in advanced.

Went to check out the keto menu they have been promoting with my recent problems getting gluten down. Was sad when I got home to find regular nuggets and not the grilled ones. But after writing in online to say that  I appreciate the speed of this location (and most honestly) to get orders out that I was just disappointed. In LA this is the closest location and it's 20 mins away so I didn't want to go back and the company sent me a free nugget card to replace the ones they got wrong. I felt heard. And that was great.

Crappiest CFA I've ever been to , service was horrible. Putting something on my order I never asked for , Idiots. Why don't you repeat it ? If I could give y'all 0 stars I would. Not the place to go , try the chick fil a literally anywhere else not here.  Charging extra for sauces ? What the hell , corporate should really close this location
Fast serviceHORRIBLE LOCATIONOutside seating onlyFriendly employeesDo not park at the rite aid

Be advised this location charges you for packets of sauce. So you $10 nuggets now cost .25 cents more per packet of sauce that you want. Go to another Chick-fil-A location if you do not want to get up charged. That is the last time I go to this one.

Talk about efficiency at this Chick-fil-A!  It was my first time here going through the drive-thru and it was awesome. I was in line on the street when I pulled up and I was mentally preparing myself to wait in line for at least 20 minutes. They took my order and I paid with the girl that took my order. Then before I even got to the pick up window like 2 minutes later a guy came out and brought the food to my car! The spicy chicken sandwiches and the waffle fries are the go-to deliciousness.

This is the closest location to me which is 5 minutes away from my house. The drive thru is always packed and there's 2 lines. It moves fast! They have people outside managing the lines and taking the orders in tablets to help move the line fast and efficient. When ever we don't feel like cooking we come here for food. My order is always the same thing: Chicken burger deluxe & a side of chicken strips for my daughter. She doesn't like the fries but I do. And the chicken is her favorite. She's a picky eater so getting her to eat is always good! The chicken is always well done and I never had an issue with my order. And we always get an ice cream cone to go as well. Since the cold weather is upon us we don't eat here since there's only outside seating. But in the summer for sure. Drive thru works for me!

The busiest location I've ever seen! Uriel took our order. Great personality! Had some small chat. Got my order right. Ordered the deluxe chicken sandwich, not spicy bc I'll get some acid reflux, and ordered combo so you know ya girl had to go with the Polynesian sauce! Anyway, come through to this location. Friendly staff, and double drive thru lines as well. Didn't wait too long either.

UPDATE: Guys you must be messing with me now. I go to the drive thru. I order a small portion of chicken nuggets and a large sweet tea. Girl tries to give me a small sweet tea but I correct her. I go home and these people have given me ONE NUGGET in a small portion box. Who on earth goes to chick fil a at 12 am and orders ONE NUGGET?? Did you run out of chicken?????? Come on guys. If it isn't clear what I want, ASK. One nugget?? Thanks chick fil a, after this nugget I am STUFFED.

BEST Chic-fil-A in Los Angeles! It's in a great location and the service is so fast and of course the employees are pleasant. They have an outdoor patio so you can enjoy LA's beautiful weather in downtown Hollywood with some nuggets. It was a great stop for me to grab lunch quick during work and i've never had any problems. so ya
Every location I go to I always get the best customer service... thank you chick-fil-A ( PS: your sweet and spicy Siracha sauce is delicious with chicken tenders my favorite combo ever !!!!)

WORST CHICK-FIL-A location ever!!!! For whatever reason the staff at this location can not comprehend getting an order correct. I come here at least once a week and almost EVERY TIME my order is wrong in some capacity. Order extra pickles? You get none. Ask for well done? It's soggy. The staff cut you off and or do not listen to you fully when taking your order. They rush you along even when not busy. And don't get me started on them being so CHEAP with the sauce!! Do the staff get a bonus for every sauce pack they don't hand out for free?? Come on! When they ask "what sauce for the order" and you tell them who in their right mind uses just ONE or I'm sorry even TWO sauce packs?? Chick-fil-a corporate should look into how this location runs and operates. I would be embarrassed to have this location with my company attached to it. This spot could learn how to treat their customers better like the ones in Texas.

The best way to order your food is going through the drive thru because they are fast & efficient. The whole process to the walk up windows is beyond frustrating and employees aren't professional.  Please have a better process when walking up of you placed the same system in place for walk ups lien the drive thru.. things would be much better ran. Food was soggy and cold.. not happy

Chick fil-a never disappoints.I really like the food over there and how fresh it is.To be honest, I'm not a reviewer; the only way for me review a business is if I absolutely love or hate it. It has to be an extreme for me to review.I felt the need to review this branch because the employees there are amazing. My 1 year old spilled a drink on the floor and I felt so embarrassed.Not only did they continuously tell me it's totally fine. They actually helped by getting me another drink rather than going to the machine myself.The manager then passed by and asked if everything was ok and if I needed help TWICE.Thumbs up and a great job to everyone who works there!

I stopped by this location on my way out to The Valley only to find two hairs in two separate sandwiches. I returned to the location for a refund only to receive terrible service and a bad attitude from the young man who was the manager on duty.You can't sell sandwiches with hair in them AND have a nasty attitude about when the customer returns it.

This place sucks! Drove through the drive thru to order THREE meals to get TWO chick fil a sauces. I parked at riteaid to go back and ask the girl at the pick up station for more. I wish I got her name. She had the nastiest look and attitude. I really wanted chick fil a this day but now I won't be back. The girl said she can give me another sauce but that's it. I said "excuse me? I ordered 3 meals", and shes like "well theres no way to prove that" and she kept stating if I want more then to pay for it. I wish I had my receipt bc she was So rude & petty in my opinion. Do better chick fil a ! Yall are supposed to be the nicest but the employees you're hiring now are RUDE.
If they're chicken wasn't so delicious and the customer service so friendly, I might care more about the political stuff ‍

Worst Chick-fil-A location I have ever been to, and of course, it's the Hollywood location. Time and time again, this location never fails to disappoint. Customer service is disgusting. Just really bad, poorly-managed and unmotivated employees who hate their jobs and take it out on the customers. No management to speak of. Really bad attitudes. Very busy location, always a wait and no parking spots available. The drive through never fails at messing up your order...TRIPLE CHECK IN FRONT OF THEM. I guarantee you something is wrong or missing. Learned my lesson the hard way multiple times. The food itself has also gone down in quality over the months. Dont see myself going here anymore. Sad!

I hate this location! Every time I go they always manage to fuck up my order! The people taking the orders always try to rush you and always "confirm" the order while always not even paying attention. I refuse to return to this location I'm so sick of them constantly fucking up my order. Chick Fil a is supposed to be great in customer service and at this location I see nothing great about any of the employees

Honestly, what's not to like about chick fil a? Other than the extremely long lines... and this review is not on the food, mostly on service. The food is always 5/5... never disappoints. This location is near my work, so it's probably going to be my go-to location if I'm ever craving it for lunch. I ordered on the app and there's only the option for pick-up via drive thru. I ordered my usual - spicy chicken sandwich (no pickle) meal with medium waffle fries and a sweet tea. I drove to chick fil a around prime lunch time (12:30pm) and the drive-thru line was sooo long, like out the drive way and trickling onto the streets long. I wish there was an easier way to pick up, because even though I ordered early on, I still had to wait in that long drive-thru lane. Just waiting in that lane ate up my lunch hour so I might've as well ordered in the drive thru lane, because I had to wait for my food to come out and I had to wait to get out of the drive thru lane as well. The workers were all nice, of course. The food was delicious, of course. The wait/drive-thru line was a little annoying. I don't mind waiting if I didn't order beforehand, but I did order beforehand... and having to wait the same time as people who didn't order beforehand isn't my favorite thing to do.
Chick Fil A never fails! Everytime I go I get the spicy chicken deluxe. The chick fil a sauce and Polynesian sauce. It's literally like Crack!
This is a spot I can always rely on to be quick and delicious! And when I say quick I mean AFTER the long drive thru line that always seems to be

You can never go wrong with the spicy chicken sandwich must request the cheese at the beginning of your order or they will not add it. Other wise also very quick service and your order being prepared but don't order their milk shakes

The fact is that the people holding down this location have evolved and learned to be incredibly nice and efficient. It's a fact that chick-fillet is incredibly consistent and tasty. It's a fact that chickens are more delicious fried than alive. May god jesus mary joseph joshua mark billy bless us all n all da factz as well. R.I.P.TupacAmaru-IncaLord.R.I.P

Very Fresh! The chicken was juicy and my friend wanted another one to take home to his fiancé. Which got me in trouble because his fiancé told my wife and my wife was mad that I didn't bring her any lol.
So busy that the workers pre make the sandwiches and have them bagged mine were soggy and gross I get you guys just opened but come on now this is unexceptionable

Horrible experience! If I could give them 0 stars I would! I ordered a number 4 and a number 1 I asked for honey mustard and bbq. I was given 1 honey mustard and 1 bbq. When I requested more sauce the young lady shared that she was going to have to charge me 35 Cetus per sauce. I told her it was ridiculous for the cost that I paid and the size of the order to only receive 2 sauces. I then told her I did not want the food and to give me my money back. It is sad that this establishment would rather lose a $25 order than to give a customer more sauce. They have officially adopted the McDonalds mentality!!

Good CFA location - been going for years, but the new 1 sauce per entree rule is petty. I understand people might've been taking too many sauces, but this seems like a huge over-correction. For a bunch of nuggets, it's reasonable you may want two or three sauces to dunk in, and if you're buying 5 entrees (~$25 of chicken), it feels petty to be charging me extra for sauce. Maybe we could find a reasonable middle ground between giving unlimited sauce away and being extremely stingy with it?If you're going to make a rule to combat sauce abuse, make it 2 per entree. BTW, this is just the latest in an ever-changing sauce rule. No lie, they tell me a different sauce spiel every time I'm there. This one finally broke me. It's a small thing but it bugs.
The customer service was good, really enjoyed the environment and the workers were nice, especially a girl named Mercedes. She made me feel at home.

One of the best fast food establishments. Nuggets and strips are good. Sauces are good and the grilled AND fried chicken are both good! Definitely get the spicy chicken sandwich DELUXE! Overall I don't have much to say about this except it's one of the better fried chicken places (in the fast food world) raising canes is the other contender.

I have been coming to this Chick-fil-A for years since it opened. when it opened the employees were so friendly and attentive when you ate outside there was always an employee cleaning the tables and asking if we needed refills or anymore condiments. It was great I really did enjoy that and loved how close I lived near there. Throughout the years they stopped doing that. The tables to eat outside are filthy and dusty there is pigeons everywhere back then there was an employee making sure pigeons wouldn't be on the tables or anywhere around the dining area. The food is always fresh when I received it when I want to eat outside I try to ask someone to clean the table because how dirty and dusty it is sometimes they do it but recently when I ask they don't do it at all. I hardly go now I usually take my food to go and that's about it.

Pretty fast and delicious and great when you have a limited lunch hour. Make sure you get the fries, the upgraded sandwich as opposed to the plain sandwich, and try different sauces. It's a popular spot so be prepared to wait in a long drive thru line. There is limited parking in the lot if you are eating in, and they have cold metal seats so keep that in mind at nighttime. Also, it's cold at night. There are some vagrants around but not too many. It is an open space in Hollywood afterall...

I had just gotten a divorce from my wife. I was sad af believe it. I was driving around Hollywood with a couple joints fucken just you know driving. Until i started to get the muchies i was fuck it let me pull up to chick fil a or however you call it. I was like fuck it kfc too far for me. So i go thro the drive thru foo and i asked for a number one because thats the big mac at McDonald's but since my faded forgot i was at chick fil a or however you say that so it kinda tripped me out. So i start munching on that shit and i was awe damn it only come with two pickles and i was fuck the big mac only come with two pickles too so i started eating but i had forgotten again that it wasnt a Big Mac so when i took the bite i was like wtf foo this chicken foo. But na that shit was good foo. Hey fuck my ex wife tho. She a bitch.

Employee who I had my interaction with does not fit the Chick-fil-A brand. She is was not very friendly and when asked to change something on our order was acted as if it was a big deal and was an inconvenience to her. Once we received our food this location is extremely stingy when giving you condiments. If you did not ask for them when ordering they will not give you them. Also our girl chicken sandwich was cold. In general I think the best thing I had on this visit was fries. Do not recommend this location.
I love chick-fil-a, but the last few times I have gone they have forgotten the sauces. Great location and a happy customer. But I just wish I had my sauces.

Hey owners!! There has never been a limit on those delicious sauces, don't start that now. The food is good but better with the sauce. It's already the most expensive fast food. Don't skimp your long time customers.

All the memes and stories about the niceness of chick fil a workers are true. We went through the drive thru on a rainy day. The line was long but went quickly. The guy who took our order greeted us with a smile on his face and was so nice especially for having to stand outside in the rain to take orders. This was my first time at a Chick fil a (I know) so I had a few questions about the food which he answered no hesitation and with some humor.  The food was also pretty good. To be honest a little overrated and pricey but good. I can't wait to come back to try all the sauces. I got the grilled chicken sandwich and the nuggets. Apparently you can order as little as one nugget and as many as 30.

Found a piece of plastic (which looked like a piece that came from a machine) in my orange soda cup. Disgusting af and reporting to corporate. Never coming back. I suggest everyone checks their drinks BEFORE drinking it.. don't mistake it for ice!!!
Today I received the best customer service from Da'Ron. He was very polite and prompt with my order and did it all with a smile! Definitely can tell he cares about the customer.
Don't go to this chick fil a spot.  I've caught the young employees here messing with people's food. They have no respect and have been hiring anyone.

If you are looking for fresh cookies, better turn around and go back home. As an avid CFA goer I can safely say that this location has by far the most unfreshly baked cookies. They are always burned and never warm. They are room temp served non soft baked cookies. Sure, you can ask for them to RE heat them, and they will gladly oblige. But at that point you're basically dealing in second round draft cookies. The employees are great!The chicken sandwiches are great!The waffles fries are usually pretty good.But again - the cookies at this location are always really horrible. How tragic it is to have a Chick-fil-A at my doorstep, and have to drive to an entirely different location because I couldn't get one of Chick-fil-A's notoriously amazing "chocolate chunk cookies" served fresh.
good good love it eat it all day especially at 5:00 it is the best time in my opinion i love it
The food is delicious but chill on the ice yall gave me a large with 85% ice 15% soda

I got horrible food poisoning from them today 20 minutes after eating my meal. I ordered the spicy chicken sandwich worth cheese, fries, and a drink. I was feeling great until eating here. I won't be back.

I have to drive for at least 30 mins to have my chick-fil-a each time can't wait to open the BURBANK location which will be much closer to me then the other locations. But the food is so so so worth the drive and the wait. I like to call it the chicken version of in and out because it's always busy food is delicious and the prices are good.
Gave me the wrong item when the sticker on the box clearly said spicy chicken deluxe, messed up on the delivery order for both sandwiches and the sauces.

I can't believe I'm yelping for a fast food restaurant but dang! The service was absolutely unexpected and above and beyond!Greykia came up to our car when we in a long line on the street. She greeted us with the most cheerful and genuine smile and attitude. We paid with her also and it took no time at all. We then went through the line like normal thinking we would pick it up at the window. Nope! Instead another employee came out with our food while we were still in line!All in all I will keep coming back to this location! Thanks! Keep up the good work

I love Chick-fil-A - ted was so helpful and the service here was on point ... besides the interaction with nubia. I understand a policy but being rude about stands against your company's policy. She refused to finish my order and had another team take over. My order was affected, and had to be adjusted. From the south, Chick-fil-A is the one thing I drive over half an hour for, so I wish nubia hadn't had such an attitude.

Ordered three items at drive through. Drove tenMiles there. Ten back. Discovered one of my items (four piece chicken fingers were missing). Called store. Left message. NO CALLBACK. I AM NOW CONTACTING CORPORATE. Worst Chick-fil-A EVER.
Worst. Chick-fil-A. Ever. I felt like I was at a McDonalds due to the quality of service.

This location never fails to achieve my expectations. Although they do not have a student discount, they do have an amazing rewards program. I ordered a eight-count nugget meal and only ended up paying a little under $5 because of the rewards app! My meal was prepared in an excellent amount of time considering he amount of guests at the location, and it tastes great. Plus, the team member that served me, Nayeli, was very charismatic and respectful.

Wow. Even with a line of like 20 cars ahead, someone was outside taking people's orders and we were still able to order, pay, and receive our food within 5 minutes. The only bad thing is that we're still stuck behind those 20 cars haha. The efficiency is impressive! And when we placed our order I asked for four chick-fil-A sauces and when they brought it to us, guess how many sauces there were?? Four!!! Paying attention to the details among so many orders--also super impressive!

Absolutely amazing! Such great service, genuinely friendly people, hot and delicious food! I made a special request for my sandwich to be cut in Half and their response was "absolutely, no problem!" Love Chick-Fil-A outdoes themselves! Every single location rocks!!!
Top notch service, great food and a clean restaurant. The only problem I could ever have here is that so many other people love Chick-fil-A!
Alycia gave me a wonderful recommendation and she was a sweetie. chick fil a sandwich add lettuce tomato and bacon yum. New fav.
Cat the worker & workers gossip about customers and they are unsanitary and curse in front of kids
Always a pleasure coming here. They are extremely nice and the service is impeccable. An absolute favorite place of mine!

One of the busiest Chick-fil-A's I've been to since it's in the heart of Hollywood. It's a drive thru or walk up window with tables outside only. The biggest issue is the seating area and the tables are pretty dirty. Even cleaning the table tops more frequently would help. But for how busy this location is, I'm always impressed by how quickly they can put orders out. And if you're a self-proclaimed Chick-fil-A addict like me, you should get the app and sign up for their rewards.
The spicy chicken sandwich was delicious, everything tasted fresh, staff was super friendly and service was fast!!!!

Always a good experience here. My food is always hot and fresh and I never have to wait long to get it. The last time I came here my card declined after several attempts and Erica gave it to me on the house. Food is great, service is great and even when the location is crowded the wait is never long

This is the closest chick-fil-a to my place and I go there pretty regularly because.. it's chick-fil-a and I have spent a lot of time in Atlanta where's there may be more chick-fil-a's than Starbucks.  I don't think there's inside seating here but it's cool to sit outside and sip your lemonade in the California sun. The only thing I don't like is the birds flying by for scraps but that's Mother Nature and it's chick-fil-a so can you really blame them?
