Food is great and they are friendly at the location, but it's impossible to get someone to answer the phone. Also, they don't have a way to have items on the catering menu (party trays etc) delivered unless you're spending $250...so if you want to have a nugget or strip tray delivered...good luck. Postmates charges a ridiculous fee for delivery (like $20) and they don't have the catering menu items on Doordash.

So I drove almost an hour because I wanted to try chick fila again. And there was so much traffic but it was worth it. Let me say my food was so good. And I had the best cashier named Elizabeth. She told me about some amazing sauces and how to use them. These people work fast and happy. Even if there's a chaos in the streets they have the lord in their eyes. Lol
worst Chick fil A ever..casher  was making our order very complicate and she didn't pay attension to us.

They were so rude & unprofessional they were having a conversation thru the mic while taking my order she kept stopping to talk to I don't know who but it didn't sound work relevant she was saying " since I'm on the mic I'm part of the conversation" & " I don't care, I don't care!"

This establishment is a nuisance to our community. The people that they employee are the scum of Hollywood and that shows in the way they treat customers and the neighborhood. I've reached out to management several times about noise complaints from their employees partying (blasting music, drinking, & smoking) in the parking lot of rite aid as well as in the neighborhood in front of my building. My husband once saw an employee hit a parked car at 1am and take off. They leave beer bottles and cans all over the neighborhood. The employees will even show up on Sundays and hangout in the parking lot blasting music out of their cars and smoking and going in and out of the business. Management did nothing about my concerns even after i gave them the makes/models of the cars as well as uniform descriptions of the employees involved.  I have  talked to 2 of their directors and all I was told was that they would talk to their employees but yet the behavior hasn't stopped and its been months. When dining at this establishment you can even hear the loud offensive music coming from the inside as well as employees having inappropriate side conversations. My daughter was dining here and witnessed police showing up and looking for an employee. Its safe to say that this particular chickfila doesnt hold itself to the same standards of others, they are all individually owned so it makes sense.

DeAna is absolutely amazing, great customer service. She should be the manager of this location. She helped me with a very complicated order with a smile on her face. She also helped me download the Chick-fila app!

I'm sicker than a dog as I'm writing this review! I'm throwing up and very nauseous. I know I got the food poisoning from this place because it was all I had to eat today. Stay away from this chick-fil-A. I feel so horribly sick and am thinking of going to the ER. I just tried calling to notify them and they can't even answer their phone. I was only able to leave a vm.

OMG, what a chicken sandwhich!!! Just the simplicity of the fried chicken on a sweet bun with that magical dill pickle!!! What a flavor!!! So freaking delicious!! And don't even get me started on those waffle cut fries!!!Only wish this location had a play area for keeping kids like I have heard some other locations do.

What the hell happened to this location?? Employees use to be so kind and attentive. Now...they take your order and are having a side convo with their co-workers not even paying attention to what you're ordering. I had to repeat myself more than three times! Not to mention even the guy working the window who looked like manager didn't even say a word to me when I went up to pay. And shocker, our order was wrong.

This location gives a bad name to Chick-fil-A. As a Texan visiting for the summer, I was excited to find this location only a couple of blocks from the Airbnb I was staying at, only to have that excitement quickly turn to disappointment when I sat down and opened my bag.My portion of waffle fries was small, and worse, they were stale and greasy, as if they'd been sitting under a heat lamp for too long. Worse yet were the chicken strips. Rather the the big, juicy chicken strips I'm used to, I was presented with small and sad little chunks of chicken. My friend's meal was just as bad. Her fruit salad was partially frozen and once again, a skimpy portion. I know everything is bigger in Texas, but this was ridiculous. In addition, the tables were dirty and sticky and trash littered the ground. However, seeing as this location is in the depths of Hollywood, that was no surprise. I'm giving this location 2-stars because I realize that it's extremely busy and offering the best quality is a challenge, but it was still a huge let down from the Chick-fil-A I know and love. I will say the staff were all very nice and accommodating, especially considering how busy they get.

"I went to this establishment for the first time and well it wasn't that fabulous as how people make it seem. The burger that I had was good but not all that, on the other hand the fries were different and good although oily and they do taste similar to the powdered form of potato. Not saying this place is trash or terrible, but it could be that I just went the wrong time of day."

Chick-fil-A is one of my favorite fast food chains and their food is always superb. I always get their chicken sandwich and waffle fries. Employees here are always nice and smiling. Food comes out fast. Seating is outdoors only.

Always a great experience regardless of how busy it is. Thank you, Mitchell, for doing a great job with that morning rush. With all the crack heads running around Hollywood you'd think an outdoor establishment would be literal hell. It is. But  he staff make up for it.

Where can I vote for the best chicken place in SoCal? Never traveled outside though and maybe it different but here is by far the best. Chicken always tender whatever you like, breast, sandwich, drumsticks WHATEVER!!! Service is also always on top level.

No inconsistencies in terms of food quality here: Chick-fil-A just gets food right. Hearty, hot sandwiches, perfectly breaded strips, thick waffle fries, and lemonade that hits the spot are all trademarks of CFA that hold true in the Hollywood location. The major detractor for this location, however, is the service: normally, an apathetic, underpaid associate is to be expected at a drive-thru window; even more understandably so when they're forced to sit in the unrelenting sun for their entire shift. But what truly ruins the experience in my mind is one simple fact:They never even remotely get my order correct.Sure, everything on the receipt is exactly as I ordered, but somehow what I'm handed through the drive-thru window bears so little resemblance to what the receipt reads that I wonder if there's not some wormhole between the ordering line and the window to teleport me into a different dimension. I've lost so much money via orders delivered into my hands missing multiple items that I just can't make a case to go back any more. It's almost comical how without fail, every single visit, items are missing and others are totally incorrect. No matter how delicious the food is, it doesn't matter if I don't receive it. Please, Chick-fil-A, teach your team to read!

I have NEVER given chick fil a a bad review. This place is just dirty! & they don't even say "my pleasure," which completely confused me. That's what I look forward to when visiting a Chick Fil A, the customer service. They are lacking that.Nobody gave off that friendly vibe they were just doing their job. I know that sounds petty but when you think of CFA you think of the best customer service of any fast food restaurant in the world. I feel like a disappointed parent.Edit- my chicken was nice & fresh but my fruit cup wasn't. They put the lid for my drink on weirdly so when I went to take a sip it started spilling from the side & on to me.

The service here is great! Friendly and efficient staff make it pleasurable to come here. The food is always tasty and they never mess up my order. This place hits the spot every time! Keep up the excellent work!

Oooooookay so here is the story, on any other occasion I would rate this place 5 stars great rating speedy service you know the works but today isn't that day. I went to get some food at the restaurant today ( on my lunch break ) and as usual there was the right before work crowd. No problem. I ordered my food with Dylan and that was the beginning of my ordeal. Dylan was polite quick and knew the menu but when I ordered a large fry and a separate meal he or someone assumed I didn't want/need the additional fry order which I would later come to find out was missing.I get to the window pay for my food and drive off and as soon as I got the end of the street I realized the fries weren't there. Should I have reviewed my order yeah maybe, but regardless I know what I ordered and that is what should have been put in the bag. Anyone who has been to this location knows it's a traffic nightmare so getting back to the drive thru is no easy task.I spend about another 7 minutes or so trying to get back around all whilst eating my delicious fries and sipping on the lemonade, when I finally reach the order taker I tell him they forgot something and he laughs off the error... whatevs! I get to the window ahhh the lovely window now void of fries other than the ones in my belly and with a half empty lemonade that would of made Beyonce proud and had Rhi Rhi bouncing around. The supreme leader of the shift is at the window with a look of surprise as to why I am back, I let her know without any attitude that my fries were left out and I had to come back, with a smile and no apology she takes my money and returns to me my fries. Great! Ohh by the way do you mind refilling my drink please... as I watch the smile disappear off of her face as if I was asking solely for the purpose of a refill she proceeds to go over company policy about not refilling cups in the drive thru ( did she ever think that messing up orders was probably not allowed either ). I ask her well at least out of courtesy could she, since I wouldn't of had to come back if my order was correct when I came the 1st time. She  pauses and with all the CS training she has ever had puts on a smile and ask could I at least take the lid off which at that point I thanked her for the service and declined the refill and well here we are. It wouldn't of taken any effort to refill the cup regardless of policy and her position. I am the one whose time was consumed doing a remedial task that was not my fault in the first place. Time is money and my time was wasted today.

Drive thru service was terrible!!! They gave us two punctured soda cups and a punctured frozen lemonade cup, how do you even picture a frozen lemonade cup?? And they charged us incorrectly for a drink when the man taking our order clearly told us he ordered it!! The man at the window was rude about it l!! Horrible customer service worst Chick-fil-A ever never coming back here! Save your time and go to another location

Courtney is awesome give her a raise ! She's funny and amazing with taking orders. I ordered with a fat line and she was just a great entertainer while we were ordering our food. I've never had such great customer service !
Literally came on Yelp! To let y'all know JIMMY IS THE BEST at the drive thru. Super funny and chill. Get the number 2 with whole wheat BOMBBBBB.

Ive been here a few times. Usually for lunch/dinner. Their fries are the best part. Today I came in here for breakfast. The drive thru was long as usual, so I decided to park on the street and walk over to the counter. Their vanilla cold brew was mediocre and too sweet. The sandwich was fine. The yogurt on the other hand.. their nuts had a beat by June 20th, 2018.... it's June 30th. I wonder if they have any other best by stuff they give to customers.

This chick-fil-a is the worst one in the US. It's not worth the visit. Besides the cars wrapping around the building and spilling out on the street causing traffic, they will not get your order correct. I live in walking distance, so I've been there quite a few times and they've yet to get an order correct. They need new management and better quality control. Just make sure not to drive off without checking your receipt and order for mistakes. Good luck!

I am extremely disappointed in this Chick-Fil-A location. I expected this one to hold up the Chick Fil a reputation but the taste here is not like any other that I have been to. I ordered the usual, a spicy deluxe but The flavoring of the chicken wasn't like any other I've had. It was sweet, tart- for a moment I thought the meat was raw but it wasn't just horribly made. I'm a loyal customer but after this experience I'm not sure if I'll return to Chick Fil a let alone this location.Very disappointed.

I was pretty excited to try Chick-fil-A for the first time. Got the food pretty fast. Honestly, it's nothing special. I was kind of disappointed. The nuggets were pretty good. The fries were good too. The milkshakes are amazing. I ended up with a food coma. Who knew 12 small nuggets were so filling? I probably would go get it again, but the nearest one is way too far.

Worst Joint I Ever Tried!!At first I was impressed by the In-N-Out drive thru style & friendly service they had.But within my first few bites, it tasted like someone dumped it in a foul toilet. SMHThis is in LA too. You would think they would have higher standards.They lost my appetite & business.
Will satisfy your craving every time. Everything on the menu is good. Chicken is juicy and very tasty. Real chicken. All sauces are very good. Make sure to get yourself a gallon of sweet tea.

I like this location even with the exception of employees constantly using their phones while customers are waiting in line to order. I guess this is the standard now for customer service because this is not the first time this happened.

Gave this a try based on some recommendations. I was a little disappointed in the chicken. It wasn't crispy enough and they are small portion sizes. The only thing I enjoyed was the sauce. Probably be the last time I eat here
I just got turned away from parking in the parking lot although there was space to go because they now make you wait to do so? Who the hell is running this place?!

I visited this location during my trip to LA. Very unique setting with multiple ordering windows surrounded by a large outdoor seating area. I ordered spicy delx and 8 piece nuggets. The food was great as expected with chick-fil-a!
Spicy chicken sandwichWaffle friesSiracha sweet sauceCoke (not diet version ... come on, nowwwwww!)Not on Sundays

This is the best fast food place I've ever had. Their chicken tastes like real chicken, and their customer service is impeccable. They have a variety of dipping sauces. I define my recommend the Polynesian sauce, and the sweet sriracha!

Ok I had to deduct a point for customer service.Went 2 days ago and decided to grab orders for the office.  Went through the drive thru, and ordered, one of which was a #8 (the chicken wrap).  When we got to the office, we noticed that we did not receive the #8, but instead, an 8 piece nugget.So I called ...At first I was thinking, maybe I read the sign wrong, and a #8 was in fact an 8 piece nugget.  Roslyn answered the phone and I asked her what did a #8 consist of.  She said it was the wrap.  Relieved that I had not made the mistake, I proceeded to tell her that we ordered a #8, but received an 8 piece nugget.  We even received the dressing on the side, so it made no sense.  She asked me to read what was on the receipt, and when  I looked, the girl had written 8 piece nugget.  So I explained that maybe she misheard us.  Roslyn then asked me how could she fix it.  I said I would like to receive the meal that we asked for and that we could return what we were given.  She said sorry we can't do that.Soooooooooo what was the point in asking me how to fix it?????? So long story short, did not receive the meal we wanted and Chic-FilA was unwilling to rectify it.  Unhappy Consumers.

I'm from the South & while it's good to have it here - it just doesn't taste the same. Idk why. I'm not sure if anyone else experienced that. But it is funny to see so many people freaking out about it & the sauces when it's just so casual back home. I guess that's how born & raised in LA residents must feel about In-N-Out? I would skip the drive thru line & just walk up & order. Whole process took 5 minutes while the drive thru was super super slow. Good if I'm feeling homesick but not worth a big adventure in my opinion if you had it back home. Just not the same.
Sitting in the hot parking lot waiting for toe truck to jump my commercial truck ... a worker came out with water ...not bad

I've eaten many places but this is a shock. People genuinely happy to see you. Calm, clean and "happy" atmosphere. It's odd at first with the rush rush and "next" attitude we're used to from other food places. 4 stars because it's very odd at first but now I'd give it 5 stars. Very polite, very helpful....just feels so different. My kids bask in the genuine gratitude to serve you. Prices are pretty good, the food is tasty, the service is above expected. Glad the just opened another close by. "Pleasure to serve you", "can I get you a refill?", "let me get that for you"!? Things you don't usually hear in fast food places but THIS is very comforting. Love it.

Two stars because the drive thru line went rather quickly. However, the food was horrible. I'm an avid Chick Fil A customer (even have the app) and the visit to the Sunset location left me in utter shock. The waffle fries were very salty; grilled chicken sandwich was cold; and the worst part was the frosted lemonade was liquified- as if it was sitting out on the counter for a while.  I've never had this problem at any other locations.
Have an OK experience. The food was fresh and good. But tables, grounds were filthy disgusting but locked bathroom was very clean. :)))
First time having Chick-fil-A and oh my it was so good. I had some waffle fries, nuggets and a salad every thing was so delicious! Don't forget to get there chick-fil-A sauce for your fries!!
My first time trying Chick-fil-A and WOW im shook food is delicious. I tried the number one and number 4... definitely recommend it. Nice outside seating in the sunset
Best chicken nuggets & Tenders Love me some Chick-fil -A Love the spicy Chicken combo also

I've never had a bad experience at a chick-fil-a because the food is just that good. It was my friends birthday and he had never tried chick-fil-a so I'm glad he chose here to eat. This was my first time at this location and I thought it was a cool experience compared to others. Just a huge walk up window where you order and you eat outside. They also have a drive thru but the line was so long. It's a difficult area to get in and out of when it comes to parking but duh the food was worth it. The cashier was nice and helpful. Our food was really quick yet still so fresh. I definitely would recommend this location to others but it may be frustrating if you're not use to LA traffic. We came on a Saturday night so it was a bit difficult to navigate.

I went here thinking about how wonderful the customer service would be, and how good the food would be, and I was NOT disappointed. The fries? Crispy. The nuggets? Amazing. The sauces? Ample. The lemonade? *passes out* Everything was so fresh and hot. The wait time was short.  Gosh. Wow. Thank you, it was delicious.

I was very surprised at how fast and accurate the service was considering this is a VERY busy location. My nuggets were flavorful and delicious, the order of no salt on my fries was correct and overall I am satisfied. Thank you!

Chilling-fil-A is one of the most amazing establishments on planet earth. great food and great service! Unfortunately this chick at the sunset hollywood location changed their policy by being a huge hassle about sauces like mcdonald's did to ya in 2009. Paying a dollar or three more than any other fast food chicken place and you guys are trying to limit the amount of sauce we dip our chicken into. I love chick fil a sauce. i'm not saying I won't eat at this chick fil a but i might try other locations in the hood or somewhere where they have understanding employees that truly get how good chick fil a sauce is.

This use to be one of my favorite places until I recently got food poison from this location! At first I thought my stomach was just acting up, and happened to go to the doctor, and come to find out I had food poison. I feel like they didn't cook the food good or something was old. Also after we ordered the food came out way to quick I should of known but didn't think nothing of it. I had a grilled chicken sandwich with bacon I believe it's called the club! Never again they lost my business.
Great 100% love the breakfast bagel or later in the day love the chicken nuggets with half and half ice tea Get the chik fil a sauce

Two stars cuz i love chick fil a....but the service here deserves one star. First of all...what's with the new rule of only being able to get FOUR sauces MAX? And buying extra isn't even an option?! That's ridiculous. Some people like having options. Some people like having double sauce cuz they like sauce. When i said it's ok I'll pay for extra the girl stopped me and was like well they're no charge but you can ONLY get 4 sauces...excuse me?????? Like you guys are already closed on Sundays and now you're taking away my extra sauce privileges? Rude. Now, when i ordered...half way thru the drive thru a worker ran out and gave me my food. Speedy. But weird. I then realized I should grab a milkshake for my boyfriend. So, when i got to the window the girl said a name and i said no, sorry i already got my food but was wondering if i could buy a shake? She then rolled her eyes and rudely asked well what type? I just said chocolate and she responded with ya. ok. Girl, i don't need your attitude. You work at chick fil a...you're paid to be nice and say my pleasure not ya. Ok.
Josh is amazing. Thank you for such a great meal and a wonderful welcome. Would eat here every day !!!

Ate on Saturday at 11:20am, had lemonade, cold old chick fila nuggets, and cold soggy potatoes. I think they gave me someone's old order, took less then a minute to give me the potatoes were half empty. And the person who put food also handle money! Without washing hands! E. coli. At 4 am full body shivers and hot sweats, painful skin ache and stomach cramps!! lasted all day, impossible to stand up, sit up straight, without bending over in stomach pain, end of the day painful diaharia, unsteady heartbeat

The best fast food chain there is....I got 8 chicken nuggets and a drink for $6. The chicken is always spectacular at chick fil a as it should be. It wasn't too oily and it hit the right spot.You always have to get the honey roasted bbq sauce when coming here. It's on the "secret menu". I'll be back many more times

A couple of the staff there treat you lame, but mainly this one girl will talk way too fast and short with you as if you're an inconvenience for invading their space.  High school garbage.  My God, slow down, relax and talk like a human, not a robot.  One visit, that same girl became easily agitated, making me feel as if I was trying to steal a Large drink, and they mixed up my order... Who steals $2 sugar water???I always check if my order is right, since they occasionally forget to add the sauce.  If you take a quick moment to check your bags before driving off, they usually leave you with a passive aggressive goodbye if you don't drive off quick enough.

Chick-fil-A's vegetable wrap comes YouTube recommended from Mama Tang and Supreme Banana veganized like over a year ago... And I'm always downtown, but today was just a coffee breakfast. So, here I am sitting in the open patio after a drivethru. I couldn't figure how to get into the parking lot. Anyways, drivethru was packed. CustomerService was great... I got the recommended, which was actually vegetarian not vegan. It was a garden pack wrapped with cheese, blacks and corn. And this wrap combo was superb with honey mustard dressing. I'll eat the other wrap half later with ranch dressing. I'm sure it'll be amazing too. Plant-based doesn't have to be just vegetables. The original combo #8, aka cool chicken wrap is a great choice for those diet conscious or gourmet peeps. It might be a couple dollars cheaper than vegetarian too. I'm not sure, you'll have double-check prices... My fast food lunch combo was under $11, and I highly recommend it.
I'm just here to defend Chick- Fil -A ....It's 5 stars end of discussion
Great food. Usually fast and friendly service. Only dislike about this place is because of a super rude employee named Michelle who dosent greet customers/ worst chick fil a employee ever.

I was on lunch break for a few minutes this location was the nearest to my assignment. I knew what to order, which was the number 1, the Ck sandwich. Frist of all the sandwich was very plain without a pickle nor lettuce. Next,  Elizebeth, made it very hard for me to order. I had to repeat myself twice before the order was confirmed correctly, she also fills the ice tea up with more ice than I expected. I felt uncomfortable with Elizebalth. The one saving redemption was Urial that provided a refill of tea for me. A+ to Urial.
Sunset location only. This one star is for the manager that never got back to me regarding spoiled chicken noodle soup. I could've got sick.

So usually I love chick-fil-a but today on the first of the month I am extremely disappointed to start my new year this way. I go to the drive thru to place a simple order spicy southwest salad, pay for it at the front so everything so far is going smooth the girl even repeats my order to make sure it was correct. Here's the best part as I get to the window to get my food for one it's taking 2 long well longer than usual I get my food and I so love eating a salad without dressing like u guys took forever and still forgot my dressing cool thanks i really enjoyed my dry ass salad with no dressing. A simple check would have done the job right but this is a lesson learned to me to never trust fast food workers to get anything right!!!!! Very upset customer.
Good cheap food    The chicken is simple and tasty. One reason I love this place is that they don't need to top the sandwich with bunch of junk
Love this place. Great customer service. Drive through well organized. However, almost every time I order breakfast they miss something or give me something else I did not order.

Overall, customer service at Chick-fil-A is good! They're friendly, patient, and there would be a person outside of the drive-thru taking your order personally despite the weather. However, my review will be about the food. I was really looking forward to trying their food because of the hype I've heard from some mainland buddies. I ordered the chicken sandwich and my BF ordered the chicken nuggets. We both found the chicken to be dry, and agreed that Wendy's chicken nuggets/sandwiches were far better.

This location is hit and miss. Sometimes they get everything right; other times... not. I go here occasionally because it's close to where I work. It's too noisy for me to sit and eat at the corner of Highland & Sunset so I always get food to go. Usually the walk-up service is pretty quick even when there are a lot of folks waiting. Pet peeves: maybe half the time I get cold fries. (Have to remember to check BEFORE I head back to work...) Every now and then I'll get a spicy sandwich when I ordered a plain sandwich. Sometimes the lettuce on a "deluxe" sandwich is wilted. But the chicken is always hot and tasty, both the sandwiches and nuggets.
Chick - fil - A it's always great! I am a sucker for a crispy chicken and some fries. The chick-fil-a sauce is bomb!!

Service was speedy and the food was great, however, the employee Tracy must not hear very well. I go by my nickname "Ku" and I spelt it out for her too...unfortunately, it took a while to get my food because I had no idea she named my order "Cocain." So sad.

Chick-Fil-A's service will never be beat by any other fast food establishment. The system they have set in place here is amazing! They have a work flow and everyone follows it, they have real unity here. As soon as you order your food, its ready at the next window. They bring that stuff out ridiculously fast! And the food is always top notch!Between you and me, I find myself here multiple times a week lol, its just so darn good! The manager Charlie is dope. If only they were open on sundays tho :(

Always a great place to run and grab food. Expect a line though. I really enjoy their breakfasts, especially the biscuit with egg! They are always as fast as they can be, super nice, and get your order right! Location is tight, but well worth the wait. :D

Came here last night to pick up a postmates delivery order and ended up leaving my wallet in the restroom. Noticed about 20 minutes later and came straight back. I came up to the window to a african american woman and told her that i believe i left my wallet in the restroom. she pretended to act suprised and asked me where I had left it after I had already told her the restroom. The restrooms are open to the public but you have to get buzzed in because they are in doors as there restaurant is not. I come back out with no wallet and I go back to window to ask her if anyone turned one in and without going around and asking everyone else working she automatically says no. Then proceeds to ask me what do I have in my wallet. Little ol me hopeless and all nods and walks away thinking that a customer mustve come up on my wallet. After searching the car for 10 minutes and knowing I didnt go anywhere that required my wallet within those 20 minutes of us being gone, My boyfriend goes to the front. He approaches the same african american girl and asks to speak to a manager and she rolls her eyes. He goes around and asks his employees if a wallet was returned or found and they all apprently say no. The manager goes back and looks I don't know where and comes back and says that they do not have it. My boyfriend being persistant and all asks him if they have cameras and if we can check them so then the manager goes back again and comes back with my wallet? wtf??? Someone was really trying to come up on my wallet at this location. They could have all been in on it for all we know. Stay away from this place.

I love Chick-fil-A but this Chick-fil-A Heather feet with straight up there you know what I order three  meals they only gave me two but give me the drinks for three when I went back to get my chicken strips they acted like I want something for free I really just want what I paid for attitude attitude attitude, Oh yeah you forgot my cookies tooo went back again there just sitting there waiting for me to come back, thank God they forgot my chicken strips or I wouldn't have got my cookies shotty service at best thanks for nothing

Chick fil a is chick fil a no matter where you go. For the most part staff are great but are horrible at controlling the drive thru. I get it there's a lot of people but don't let some of these impatient selfish customers get in front of someone ahead of them. Other part I hate is knowing how popular and busy their locations are.... WHY NOT OPEN MORE LOCATIONS?!Sometimes I avoid going just because I don't want to wait 20-30 mins in drive thru to get food. Come on chick fil a get more ambitious and open more locations. FYI being religious is great and all but in the year 2017 and being in the USA, keep that private because you offend a lot of your customers. There's a reason why the constitution separated state and religion.

Love me some Chick-fil-A! So sad there is only one close to me in Los Angeles and the traffic in this area is always pretty bad. I had some extra time on this day so I braved the traffic for breakfast. I had the chick'n biscuit with cheese and hash brown tater tots. So good! The chicken is always cooked perfectly juicy and crispy. The biscuit was super moist and fresh. The only deterrent is location but I will for sure return, lol.

The customer service here is the worst. The last two times I have gone to this location my order has been incorrect. This very last time I ordered chicken nuggets because they were out of regular buns. I was ordering drive thru. I get to the window and check the bag for the sauces. Not there. The guy at the window is insisting they are in there though. He eventually gives me the sauces I had requested and I drive off. I take a drink of what I thought was a coke. Nope. It's unsweetened tea. I open the box to eat the nuggets. Nope. It's chicken strips. It was still good, but nothing in my order was correct. The other time they messed up my order they wanted to charge me for the mistake they had made. I guess all the students from the high school across the street work there cuz they don't give a f*** about customer service. Two stars because the food is always tasty.

I would give this dive SEVERAL minus stars if I could.  (Say, why can' we!?!) The only thing worse than their food is their politics.  I have no idea what that was in my sandwich, but it was not chicken.  The bread was really just tasteless, baked air, and the waffle fries also had no taste, except for the awful sauce sent with it.  I didn't think there was any chicken place worse than KFC, but this is it.  It is even worse than KFC, and that is saying a LOT.  It is the WORST non~chicken, non~food sandwich EVER!  I had an aftertaste in my mouth for hours after eating it and an upset stomach that kept me up half the night.  I will refrain from describing the rest of the aftermath, but it was not pleasant.  So, thanks, but no thanks, never again.  It is so sad to see that most of the world has absolutely NO idea what good food actually is.  I find it absolutely APPALLING that so many actually think that this is good food, that it's even food.  No wonder our world is in the state it's in.  After all, you are what you eat.
Order their nuggets, grilled chicken wrap, and their chick fil-a sandwich.... very juicy, great flavor.

I've been coming to this outstanding Chick-fil-A for years. There are on the ball w/ excellent customer service and the food is ALWAYS mad-fresh.THE GOOD- Chick-fil-a APP is wonderful for regulars: download onto your smart phone and rack up free goodies- very tidy- polite staffTHE BAD- Closed Sundays :-(- Parking can be tricky

Don't go here!! I found hair in my chicken strips! That's so unsanitary! They never gave me a receipt when I payed in the drive thru so I have no ticket number, there for they wouldn't help me online. What kinda shit is that??? I need a ticket number? Plus..forgot to mention, I noticed my chicken kinda looked pink. That's not cooked properly! You guys really need to get it together !
Chicken sandwich was amazing. Fries were undercooked and didn't give me the correct sauces I ordered. Hopefully next time they'll do a better job and I'll change to 5 stars

I used to live in Orange County where Chick-fil-A was easily accessible and then I moved to NYC, where I was still lucky enough to have a Chick-fil-A at my college cafeteria :) I now work in Hollywood, so I'm blessed to have a Chick-fil-A near me because they're super rare in the LA area. First of all, I'm a huge fan of Chick-fil-A and I seem to crave it even more on Sunday's when they're closed.For breakfast, I usually get the chicken biscuits with some mayo and their chick-fil-a sauce. For lunch (depending on my mood), I'll order the chicken strips or the original chicken sandwich sans pickle + waffle fries (THE BESTTTTT) + lemonade or a sweet tea. All their sauces are amazing!! Not sure what's in the chick-fil-a sauce but it is delicious.  This particular location doesn't have indoor seating which kind of stinks, but the staff is super friendly and the drive-thru system is pretty efficient so 5 stars. This is the only Chick-fil-A that I know of in LA, so I'll always be coming back.

I've had enough. Look, I love Chick-Fil-A, everyone loves Chick-Fil-A but this location is not a Chick-Fil-A.Sure it looks like one, has the same name, has the same menu, but be warned it's a hot mess.- Traffic - You mean to tell me they can have FOUR employees to take your order but they can't delegate one person to directing traffic? Words can't express how bad the Drive-Thru structure is with this location. It's a loop that exits out to the line that piles up on the tiny street. And because people are hungry and greedy they won't let people out of the Drive-Thru. We were sitting in the Drive-Thru after already getting out food for 15 minutes the other night because it exits to where the line starts on the street.You NEED an employee at the end of the Drive-Thru to direct traffic and stop cars from bunching up so people can exit.- Service -You know ho everyone claims that Chick-Fil-A is the nicest place in the world? And their staff is exceptional? Sure maybe fire the Valencia branch. But this one? They are h o r r i b l e. Now I know how crappy it is to work in the food service industry and I can't imagine doing it in the heart of Hollywood. However the whole staff really needs an attitude check, at the very least those who take your order at the Drive-Thru. They mumble, they are typically very rude and they're always talking to each other ignoring customers and swearing. Then they walk up to your car and act like you're inconveniencing them. Not what you except from Chick-Fil-A.- Location -Sure food is food and you can't exactly change your environment but every time I go there it's overrun by homeless people. The seats are never clean and they don't seem to wash the exterior of the building.-Finally... the Food -It's really hard to mess up Chick-fil-A because every location has the same ingredients and the same menu. However it's pretty obvious that the people who work here don't care about the quality of the food that they sell.The fries are almost always cold and extremely hard. On two occasions I've gotten food poisoning from their chicken sandwiches which were not served hot. This past week I found a few long hairs on one of the sandwiches. And the sodas are always flat or not mixed properly.I understand how difficult it can be to work in fast food especially at a very busy location as I have done it many times in the past, but when you combine all of these problems did you Chick-fil-A is it no better than your average McDonald's.If you are really craving some Chick-fil-A go to a different location.

I'm from the south and I love me some Chick-fil-A! This was my first time coming to the location on Sunset Blvd in LA. I came to the drive-thru this afternoon and there were easily 10 cars between the two lanes waiting. I wasn't sure what to expect time wise. I've got to give this crew mad props, they killed it today!! I was through the line in less than 5 minutes! I don't eat fast food very often but I can tell you, it doesn't seem very fast anymore... this location had it on point! Maybe this is how they always do things, I don't know. But regardless they deserve recognition. Everyone was super nice too, wish I could drop some names. I don't write too many reviews but I definitely felt they deserved it today! Other chains need to take note!!

I asked for all dah sauce, you know what they gave me, just some ranch and Chick-fil-A sauce. What does ALL DAH sauce mean??? It means I need every single sauce that Chick-fil-A makes. Don't do the customers wrong like that. Stop playing and get the job done. Have some respect for the legend S. Truett Cathy #toomuchsauce

The food is great!  I love chik fil a but what I dont like is when I paid for food that doesn't end up being in our bag!  You have one job in this world and that is to make sure that when a person pays for some cookies that you give them cookies in their bag.  You don't even have to do any math except for counting how many cookies needs to go in the bag and all it takes is the effort of picking up those cookies and placing it in the bag.  2 chik fil a entrees and 2 cookies how hard can that be???  I have to deal with Hollywood traffic, drive-thru traffic, and then deal with an incomplete order?!  People go through the drive thru because they don't have time to get out of the car and definitely do not have time to correct someone's mistake.  This happened so many times at this location and I think it is time I warn others.  I honestly think they do it on purpose and mess up people's orders so they can save money and resources... people drive far for some chik fil a and the least thing the person at the drive thru window can do is get the order correct and do a quality/quantity check what is in the bag before handing it to the customer.  Like I said, I love chik fil a but if you come to this location, no matter how long the line is behind you - check your bag.. check every single item.  Take every single item out in front of the girl or guy at the window.  I don't trust anyone,  not after they robbed me of 2 of my cookies!  Haha!  times are hard 1.79 each for some cookies, I better see them cookies in my bag :D

I have never had a good experience at this Chick-fil-A and today was the worst.  I took the subway there fresh and early to use my September app coupon for a free breakfast treat.  I got there around 10, ordered an Egg White Grill, a Chicken Biscuit, and large fries.  Used my coupon.  Picked up my order and did a cursory look into the bag to see if everything was there.  The large fries were on top so I moved them to the side, saw a sandwich type thing wrapped in foil and something else underneath.  3 items, all good, right?  I take the subway home and am salivating at the thought of trying out their breakfast items finally.  Opened the bag, laid it all out, and there was the Egg White Grill, the fries, and -- a box of tater tots!!!  What the hell!  They had given me freakin tater tots instead of a Chicken Biscuit.  Unbelievable.  You'd think this happens at other fast food places, but not Chick fil A.  I wasn't about to take the subway all the way back to Hollywood to complain so I just stewed in my apartment.  Thanks a lot, Chick fil A.  This location is the absolute worst.  It's pretty much the ghetto Chick fil A, with crappy outdoor seating and a clientele that smells like Hollywood.  The crew working here has occasionally been rude to me, which has never happened at any other Chick fil A.  And the line ordering scheme is terrible.  You have no idea where to line up.  There are multiple ordering windows, but no indication of where to actually queue up.  People are getting into line from both ends of the counters at once.  They can easily fix it with a sign that says "Line starts here + arrow".  Instead it's chaos.  Oh, and the Egg White Grill is not tasty.  The grilled chicken was shrunken and does not go well with the melted breakfast cheese and the unflavorful English muffin.  The tater tots are good, but man, such a tiny box.  The fries were stale 20 minutes later.  I actually threw half of them away because I can't eat that much potato in one sitting, but even if they hadn't given me "bonus" potatoes, the fries were not yummy.  Just a terrible experience.  I'm gonna have to find another Chick fil A.  :(
I love to get the chicken nuggets the eight piece with the Chick-fil-A sauce, the drive-through is so quick and easy. And then plays are so nice and friendly appreciate it.
Their computer system is down I've been stuck in the drive-through for an hour they really should be warning people before they get stuck in the drive-through I just barely place my order

How have I not written a review for Chik-fil-A yet?!? This place is great! And the food is incredible! I don't know what exactly is in Chik-fil-A sauce (I'm pretty sure it's just a type of honey mustard), but it is DELICIOUS! The "Original Chicken Sandwich" is SO good, I don't understand why they even have other items on the menu. Not only is their food very, very good, but this place runs with an efficiency you will not find at another fast food joint other than a select few In-N-Out burgers. Seeing a line of cars wrapped around the block would usually be a death sentence at another restaurant drive-thru, but not at Chik-fil-A! They are great at keeping the drive-thru line moving so regardless of how long the line is you shouldn't ever really be waiting for more than ten minutes. They also have a patio seating area, and counter ordering, which is just as fast if you decide you'd rather not eat in your car. They also have their own parking lot, which is small, but still nice that it's there. So, this place does have its drawbacks. What are they? I'm glad you asked. As I mentioned the parking lot is small, and difficult to get to. If there IS a line wrapped around the block (don't worry, the line will move quickly) you may not be able to get into the lot. There's no "indoor seating", there is a patio seating area. And while it is Southern California, it would still be nice to have some sort of actual boundary between you and your food, and Sunset Blvd. Also, on the occasional days where there IS bad weather you don't want to sit outside. But none of the drawbacks cost this place a star. Because it is Chik-fil-A! Get the Original Chicken Sandwich, with Chik-fil-A sauce!

The food is OK, can't say it's bad. I had the Chick-fil-A sandwich and the Spicy  Deluxe and both were pretty good. The atmosphere is very busy since it's on the corner of sunset and highland right diagonal of Hollywood high school and they don't have inside seating. All the tables are outside covered with umbrellas.
Breakfast ends at 1030?? It's 2017 get with the program! McDonald's is all day! How hard is it to keep the menu going till at least noon especially in Hollywood?
Good chic fil a with fast efficient ordering system.   I haven't had a time yet where they've messed up my order and because they have the double line it's much quicker for your food

Awesome food and service! The staff is so genuine and helpful! Food is always fresh and drive thru moves so quick!! It literally takes me 2 minutes to get through the drive thru when In-n-out takes 15+ minutes every time!

My wife and I love chick fil a. We got gift cards for our wedding because everyone knows that. This location in Hollywood is the worst we've been to:1. 1/5 location. Due to location, it's all outdoor and there's a strong smell of marijuana (patrons, not really their fault)2. 1/5 service. They couldn't get our order right. We always get meals with cups of water, aka just the entree and fries. We've never had a problem here but the person kept putting bottled waters on and trying to charge us. We explained it to her probably 4 times that we just wanted a cup and not to charge for the water and she kept telling us our total was still the same. I eventually said maybe this location won't give free waters because it's Hollywood, so I had her scan my app that gives one bottled water free, and she did but it didn't change our total and she charged us the full price for both bottled waters. By this time there's a huge line of impatient people behind us so we had to go pick up our food.3. 2/5 food. They were fast as always, but the food didn't taste fresh or crispy like it normally does.Disappointed, but it happens. Just this location. 5/5 every other chick fil a.
This was a very nice location if you like outdoor seating. The service was lightning fast.

I really don't get the "hype" about this place.  Aside from their very politically incorrect leanings that are to be considered at best disturbing, this place serves very lackluster and ordinary food.  My Mom and I ordered the chicken nuggets.  Their idea of "nuggets" are inconsistently sized thumb sized pieces of hard, dry chewy and not very flavorful throw-away chicken pieces.  The waffle fries were bland and not cooked enough.  The ranch dressing was thin and watery.  If these are the size of "nuggets" I would hate to see the "tenders".  I have a very small appetite and I could not get filled up by what I ordered, nor did I want to order more.  Oh, and this is a place centered around it's drive thru so if you want to park and eat you have to cross where the cars are moving in the drive thru line which is odd and dangerous.  There is only outside seating so if it's hot or rainy forget it and I honestly don't see how the stuff they are slinging would hold up in a to-go bag for very long.  Again I'll say I don't get the hype.  Way too much money for just the most ordinary chicken imaginable and then we add the politics and forget it. Never again!

Generally, this chick fil a is great. But when i went today my nuggets were not as fresh as usual, and i got a total of FIVE fries. FIVE.  What the hell did i pay $8 for FIVE fries. I just can't deal with it. I'm still hungry. And also they only gave me ONE chick fil a sauce. But i guess it makes sense, i only need one for five fries. I asked for zesty buffalo and ranch sauce as well, and i didn't get any of those.

I am sick and tired of this chick fil a giving a bad rep to their name. I love chick fil a.  However, I do not like this location. My first bad experience was about 3 weeks ago or so. I ordered the spicy deluxe meal and when I get home what do I see? A spicy plain sandwich. Hello? Did the drive thru girl taking my order not hear me correctly or did she just not care about my order. Either way, it was wrong. And just so chick fil a knows, every single one of you're drive thru employees frickin SUCK. So I call CFA to let them know about the situation. Manager apologizes. Asks me for my address to send coupons.... weeks later, still no coupons. Also I forgot to mention. We totally ordered dr. Peppers and can you tell me why we got unsweetened ice tea?  Absolutely unacceptable. So today, I come to CFA to give them a second chance and they messed up my order yet again! (Not shocking) drive thru girl (named Natalie) doesn't greet us, rude as hell, not the type of customer service CFA should be giving. She takes our order, tells us to move forward. Worst employee. I did not appreciate her terrible customer service. So my boyfriend goes to the window which we shouldn't have to do to get our order changed and there was others waiting for their correct order as well. I am very is upset with this company that I once talked so highly about to all of my peers. This CFA needs better training on customer service. Maybe the 3rd time visiting will be a 5 star service restaurant.... but I am not willing to risk my time with this company anymore.

This is by far the worst food ever. The fries were absolutely raw, they were just dunked in oil and pulled out. This made me so mad, because I did not want to get in line to get new fries and let my sandwich get cold. You guys suck!

Look, I get that it's fast food but this chick fil a has the worst service, they always mess up the order and the food is always cold and old. Maybe my standards are high but I'm from atlanta and chick fil a is known for their kind employees and great service. Well this location definitely isn't living up to their standards. Guess I can't go back

THIS HAS GOT TO STOP!Every other day or third I eat here. Food is good but every time I ask for extra pickles. I ask for a side of pickles. I ask for 8 pickles--whatever way I order extra pickles-I NEVER GET EXTRA PICKLES!!!!Get it together folks. The last time my fries were still RAW!!Get rid of those college kids n hire people that really need jobs!!

We order and we ask for a lot of ketchup and salt.  We emphasize... A LOT A LOT A LOT OF KETCHUP LIKE AT LEAST 15.  They give us 2 every single time and always, always when we get to the window we ask them if they put a massive amount of ketchup inside and they say yes.  We drive away and find 2 ketchups and we turn the fuck around- always the same story.  We ask for more when we have to park and go inside. We explain that we asked for 15 when we ordered so they could charge extra if they really want to.  The guy tells us he has to get a manager approval and the manager says, "I sure as hell don't feel like losing my job today" and hands us one ketchup.  The food is good, but FUCK THAT SHIT. I'll go inside and squirt that shit in your face and let you know it wasn't an accident. Ketchup.....really, the economy is not THAT bad.

Not only is Chick-fil-A the best option for great food, but it's consistent, fast, and DELICIOUS! If you don't have the app, DOWNLOAD IT IMMEDIATELY! I place my order on my phone walking home from school, and it's hot and ready to go by the time I get there! AMAZING!

When ya spend $12.06 at Chick-fil-A, ya expect ta get a sauce er two. Even if ya don't order any they should throw some in so ya can put it in yer sauce drawer. Did I get a sauce in my order today? NO I DID NOT! Today was a real tragedy y'all. It's like 7/11 happened all over again! (Never forget) When I pulled inta Chick-Fil-a on my horse, I thought life was good. I was happy y'all, so happy I decided to splurge on a shake. I even asked the girl takin' my order what the best shake is. Don't worry I wasn't hittin' on her. I just needed to know tha flavors cuz I do not know why, but they ask you fer yer order before ya even get ta the menu now! Like how am I supposed to know what to get? I haven't even read tha menu yet! Anyways.I ended up gettin' Peach flavor cuz Gabby tha order girl told me it was the best. She was wrong, but that's beside tha point. Peach will never be the best flavor of anythin' not even peaches.Maybe Gabby was hittin' on me. Maybe she meant peach was tha best flavor because she's a Georgia Peach. Well I'm sorry Gabby but I do not objectify women like that. Or fruits.Y'all I believe in tha good lord which is why I worship here at Chik-fil-a on Sundays, but today I did not receive a blessing, I received a curse.NO CHICK-FIL-A SAUCE WITH MY ORDERI had ta eat that chicken dry. The only hint of moisture was the pickle underneath tha bun. I did not receive tha mana from heaven known as Chick-Fil-A sauce so all I tasted of my meal was sand.I do not know how this could possibly happen to a good Christian man like me. All I know is that this is $12.06 I coulda spent at Best Buy er walmart. I will return to Chick-fil-a, but I will not be getting the peach milkshake. And I will check my bag for sauce, because I do not trust y'all no more! "My pleasure"(I put it in quotes like its sarcastic and passive aggressive)mason brooksyelp elite

Location is a bit busy and hard to get to, but the area is that way. Welcome to the West side!Love the spicy chicken sandwich, always warm and tasty. Friendly staff and quick service. What more do you want?

Ok... I'm from the home of Chick-fil-A, Atlanta. I know what this company wants to project regardless of where their brand is. No one made eye contact with me. I had to repeat my order and they still didn't give me a meal. Not a single smile. Not once did I hear "My Pleasure" the entire time I was there  (15min) to myself or anyone.
4 stars just for existing here... always fast and food is consistent. My favorite "fast food" place, without question. Quality. May not be as good as the South's Chick-Fil-A's... but I'll take it.

The only location to ever get my order wrong and the lady who took my order gave me the impression she didn't want to be bothered. I didn't say anything when she messed up my order but sheesh this place is not cheap. Be nicer and get my order right

Always friendly staff. The poloynesian sauce is so good that I get LOST IN THE SAUCE. Lol. I like the chicken tenders. They're crispy on the outside but soft & tasty on the inside. The WAFFLE FRIES!! So yumm I really like this place better than any other fast food place.

Beware of any advertising promotions at this locations.  I was mislead and lied to by two employees about a promotion that was "buy one get on free."  When I came back a week later to order my "free' food the manager laughed at me and only offered me a cookie.   As much as I like the food, won't ever be eating here again or any other location.  Very disappointed.
Wow legit fresh chicken!!!Line for drive thru is packed and there aint nowhere to park cos their lot is teeny tiny. No indoor dining space cos the patrons here must be uncouth sometimes.

I have been to many chick fil a.  This one is the worst. Missed up my order tonight Friday night. Asian manager early 30"s , has zero customer service skills. Really rude and does not care about missing up the order. Instead gives me a bad attitude..  I am familer with chick fil a owners taking lots of pride in great customer service. Well the manager on call tonight lacks those skills. Needs to be properly trained or he will keep hurting this location , he is poison at this point. Will never come back to this location.

I used to go here on my way back from work. The chicken tenders and waffle fries with the zesty buffalo sauce was my favorite!!!! I'm very impressed with how smoothly, efficiently, and quickly the drive thru is run. This Chik Fil A is the only thing I miss about my old job. If only the Chik Fil A near me on Westwood would get a drive thru,  deep sigh.
Great service!! Great food!! Great atmosphere!! If you're in West Hollywood or anywhere near. I'd highly recommend you visit this Chick-Fil-A.
I came here a lot when I lived around the corner and I always had great service with a smile, and great food too! This chick fil A is the best!

For the most part, everyone was nice and kind. Disappointed with employees not looking happy at the drive thru lanes and that when I asked for some dipping sauce the employee was VERY hesitant to even give me any and said that we were suppose to ask when we ordered. I was never offered any sort of dipping sauce from the beginning. If I was suppose to ask when ordering, then that should be addressed, but if I ordered inside, I would have been asked if I wanted any sauce. The other locations had better employees.

Who doesn't love chick-fil-a omg it's seriously the best fast food franchise ever seriously!! If I can eat this everyday I so will but I can't because my type 2 diabetes. The only reason I give this a 4 star is because the cashier was just being rude and did not know what customer service was gave me that Latina attitude, but luckily the food was so good I totally forgot.

I used to love chick fil a and then I gave my dog a bit of it she got so sick I thought she was gonna die. Few days later I decide eh might've been something else I get another sandwich then I get diarrhea for a few days, could barely move talk about food poisoning. I don't know if they did something to the food both times or they're just dirty over there but never going back.

The service and food is great here but that's not what's wrong with this place.  This particular Chick Fil A has created a disgusting and overcrowded atmosphere. The lines for the drive thru make it impossible to drive on McCadden at Sunset Blvd. Their parking lot isn't really a parking lot because you cannot access it due to the lines of cars every which way but there are only 4 or so parking spots anyway. The customers and staff take up any parking nearby and customers throw their trash out onto the street. Every day the streets are filled with chick Fil A trash. EVERY. SINGLE. DAY. There are multiple dumpsters and trash cans nearby but no one bothers to use them. These people and the people of Chick Fil A are why Hollywood is so dirty and run down.
no need for a review when its open till 3 am! i'm too shoooooooook, this is the new spot.
Very disappointed with the customer service. Employee named Olga was being very rude!!
Great service! This place feeds me at least once a week. Smiling faces always await and the food is always fresh!

I LOVE CHICK FIL A.I usually always go through the drive-thru because it's easier that way. You enter the parking lot through McCadden and Sunset. There are two drive-thru windows to order from, which makes the process faster. The line goes pretty fast so you're in and out pretty quickly. The people at the window have always been courteous to me each time. We always get the chicken sandwich, waffle fries, and sweet tea. GET THE CHICK FIL A SAUCE. It goes with your sandwich and fries. Their sweet tea is better than McDonald's sweet tea. Their waffle fries are always perfect. I wish there were more locations in Los Angeles!

Just a quick updated review.  Really my only complaint about this location before was some unfriendly folks working the window.  They seem to have really cleaned that up and everyone is great now.  That is important to me.I go here often and they always have great promotions.   They give away a specific  breakfast item, a different item, Mon.-Fri. what seems like twice a year.  And on some days they post that if you buy food on a certain day and keep the receipt and return on a set date you get the food on your receipt for free.  I bought breakfast here the other morning and inside there was a card saying I could come back for a free biscuit.  That's what I'm talking about.  The food is fresh, orders accurate and this is a VERY well run location!  P.S. if you get a long receipt, go online and fill out a brief survey to get a free sandwich!

I've always been a fan of Chick Fil A. They are definitely a go to fast food joint for me. The food is consistently good and the service is generally pretty good as well. Tonight I went to there and they forgot to put a sandwich in the bag. I should have checked it, but did not until I got home. I just assumed that they had put everything in that I had paid for. Annoyed that I had gotten all the way home without some of the food that I paid for, I went back to get the missing item.Upon returning I asked if there was anything that the manager could do for the inconvenience. He then came over and said "I can't just be giving away free food." I thought that this was pretty disrespectful considering that I had just spent about $40 there and had left my food at home getting cold so that I could go back for the missing item. Overall I was just really disappointed with the service here and will probably think twice when deciding where to go next time I'm in the mood for a fast food fix.

This review is specifically a compliment for the drive thru procedure I've seen implemented at this location over the last year.This, like many other fast food locations in the neighborhood, was a stressful nightmare to be avoided. Lines that stretched into the street blocking traffic at every open hour, awkward merges with people approaching from the other direction, irritated drivers weaving through drive-thru traffic trying to get down the street.Things are not perfect, this location may handle more traffic than any Chick-fil-A in the country, but management keeps this location adequately staffed to move cars through the ordering and payment process better than any restaurant I've seen.Bravo. The food is... Chick-fil-A. Give it a try... it's the same everywhere.

First time ever trying this place. It is always onour way when we are inthe area and decided to finallytry it. Drive thru was packed and very confusing, so we parked and ordered in front. HORRIBLE customer service and I mean HORRIBLE, the girl was in the worse mood anyone can be, she wouldn't let us decide on what we wanted and when I asked my husband something she kept getting involved and kept saying "what?" When I wasn't talking to her first of all, and when I was talking to her she also replied with her "what?". She gave us so much attitude and didn't even want to tell us what drinks she had, excuse me for never trying this place before. Would I eat this again? Maybe, fries were soggy, food was good. We might eat it again but I definetly wouldn't go back there. I would rather stop by any other place in the area.

I went through the drive-thru. Asked for unsweetened tea. They gave me sweetened. I ordered chicken tenders. They forgot the dipping sauces. I'm in tears now. The tea mistake was one thing. But forgetting the sauces? Whhhhhaaattttt?!?!I mean, they never even asked me what dipping sauces I wanted. The dipping sauces are everything! I'm sobbing while I eat my chicken tenders with ketchup now.
Good place to eat . Will go back . Love the service and food . Location great clean and will return .

Worst Chick-Fil-A I've ever been to. The line was extremely long, it took forever to order, the lady taking my order messed it up, I did not receive the right food even when my order was "right", I also used a treat from my app that I did not receive, and it is no where near as clear or organized as other Chick-Fil-A's.

So, this was my first time eating at Chick-fil-A. The drive-thrus were long, but I came by train so parking wasn't a problem.  I was there around 12 PM, and had no problem finding a table. However, it did fill up quickly. I ordered the Spicy Chicken Sandwich combo. The chicken was juicy and a good size, but it could have been Spicer, I think. The waffle fries were the standard waffle fries, but it was a good amount. Kudos for not skimping on the fries. Also, people had told me to try the got the Chick-fil-A sauce, and it was indeed tasty. Free refills on drinks. Yay.My order came out a little over $8. I think that was reasonable considering what some other restaurants charge for fast food.

This location was nice the other night but today they sort of rushed us to order then forgot our drinks and we hopped straight on the freeway then noticed but it's just too much traffic to get off and get back on we are bummed we don't have drinks though

Went there a few weeks ago with friends for a late-night snack.  As we sat at one of the outdoor tables, a RAT went by our feet.  I complained to the staff, including the manager, and was met with laughter.  I left a message for the owner letting him know of the rodent problem and never received a return call.  NASTY.  AVOID.

The food and prices aren't the best, but damn their service is amazing.  All the workers have manners and were genuinely nice.  There isn't indoor seating but their drive thru is fast.  5 stars for their amazing workers and service.
wish I could eat this everyday and not get fat lol but seriously, best fast food around!

Worst chick fil a in southern California don't come here the management have extremely poor customer service skills they messed up my order the first time I went there but I gave them another shot because I love Chick-fil-A have been eating Chick-fil-A for over 20 years so when a second time and they messed up my entire order which was for a substantial amount of my co-workers and myself the management that was there I spoke to Oscar he really didn't seem to care about what happened to my order he actually even walked away from me as I was trying to explain to him Liza also did not care the only person that seems to kind of care when I talk to them was Karen but even then all she said was drive back over here and we'll replace your meal I don't live close to this Chick-fil-A I only went there because we were doing a job in the Hollywood area I normally go to either Northridge or the one in Oxnard do not go here save your money go somewhere else it will be a waste and that was supposed to be contacted by a Jeremiah cillpam but he never called me as well

Customer service was amazing. Food was HOT and FRESH!! Diversity in the workplace for sure. You can tell that the managers are on top of their game. Will recommend this place to anyone. Will come again!

The drive thru line was extremely long. I decided to go inside instead, which I almost never do. I was pleasantly surprised that there was no one waiting. The cashier greeted us as we approached the counter. Once we placed our order, they told us that once our food was ready it would be taken to our table. Most chickfila restaurants that I have dined in did not offer that service. Within 5 mins or less our food was bought to the table. Fresh and hot as usual. I love the spicy chicken sandwich. It's my favorite thing from the menu and it never disappoints. I also ordered the grilled market salad minus the blueberries and blue cheese for my mom. Usually she's hooked on the salads Wendy's has to offer. But today after 2 bites of this said she said, "This is better than Wendy's!" I wish I had before pictures, but it was too delicious.
I don't get it. There's always a huge line and cars backed up at the drive thru. It's a very average sandwich.

For a fast food place the quality of their burgers is perhaps the greatest. I had a #1 upgraded to large and got the lemonade. The chicken sandwich was perhaps the juiciest I have had from a fast food place and the fact that it was a very simple burger but still so flavorful won me over!! I had came to this place once before but I have to admit it really didn't impress me... this time around it was a different story! Will definitely be back when I'm around the area.
I love the chick fila here. Although they don't offer in door seating they do have a restroom available to customers upon request. They're chicken sandwiches are a must

Thank goodness Chik-fil-a isn't on every street corner, or else I would be spending my money here everyday.  Fave.  Great quality chicken for fast food imo.  This CFA is also ran very quickly and smoothly. They usually have at least 3 people outside taking your order, so the lines go fast.  The employees are super nice too. Bonus is that they have a parking lot and a comfortable outdoor eating area.
BEST CHIC FIL A I HAVE EVER BEEN TO!! Amazing staff, fresh chicken and overall 10/10 !!! Love this place! I would HIGHLY recommend to anyone!

Wonderful experience. Been living in LA all my life and not once had I been to a Chick-fil-A until today. It was a windy afternoon in Los Angeles and I thought of scooping the homie Alfred up from Glendale after my shift had ended, and thought that today would be the day to try Chick-fil-A. The drive (including the traffic) wasn't much of a problem as we were bumping ignorant rap music throughout our journey. When we had reached our destination, we both ordered, and literally no more than 15 seconds after we had ordered, our food was ready. When I reached into that bag, the first thing my tender fingers came into contact with were those remarkable waffle-cut fries. Not salty at all, with a crisp layer until you hit the smooth potato-ey center. Now for the climax. That first bite of the spicy chicken sandwich had me shaking my head in disbelief: I had entered a realm where a fast-food powerhouse had blessed me with real chicken. As I came to my senses, I realized that it was all real. God bless this establishment and the fine young staff operating it.

Ok I have never received such great customer service like this place!! My order is always accurate and is always given in such a quick time !! Everyone is friendly and very quick ! Amazing food !! Love love love

I enjoy coming here after a hike around Lake Hollywood.The spicy Chicken Deluxe (#4) is wonderful.  I get it every time!  The criss-cross fires are great.  The Chicken Dipping Saucer is great.This location is super busy.  On the good side, they take your order efficiently, they take your money efficiently, and when you pick up your meal, that's efficient too.  I've been here numerous times, and have _never_ got an order wrong.I just can't figure out why we don't have one of these in Glendale/Burbank.Anyway, I eat here frequently; reasonable prices, excellent service, nice people, delicious meals.

Was not impressed especially when my non complicated order took forever. And my food was luke warm at best. That's is not to take away from the very nice guy who took my order and even gave me an eta on when my food would be ready. I don't see myself going back for the price that I paid for chicken strips.

If you want a chicken sandwich that taste like real chicken this is the place to come  ...the waffle fries are so crisp and delicious and I love all the sauces the have . Drive-thru service is on point once in a while they'll forget a sauce which is disappointing because I can drink their sauces . Lol  but other than that everything is always delicious and they never forget anything like other drive thru  spots . P.s the yogurt with granola is yummy and you can also have it with. Chocolate chip cookie

It would be great if when I said "thank you" I received a, "you're welcome." I just came through the drive through and the girl working the window taking the money has an attitude and that's so unfortunate considering Chick-fil-A's usual excellent customer service.

Not only is their sandwich awesome, but I'm throwing a large event and Pedro has been the ONLY vendor I've dealt with who has followed up and gotten out order completely correct.  He's been so professional I wish he could teach his craft to the dj, photographer and venue we've been dealing with.  Thank you Pedro. And THANK YOU chick fil a  for a consistently perfect product

Over here happy I can get my Chick-fil-A on right in the hood.  Location is dope, drive through is fast and convenient, outdoor patio on point.  Grateful to have a Chick-fil-A right here. Thank you J!!

I'm a southern boy, and I grew up going to ChickFilA with my parents, so a visit to this place is like time travelling to my childhood. ChickFilA is so consistent in its high quality food and great customer service. This Hollywood location is no exception, and I have to admit I love hearing the employee say "my pleasure" after handing me my order. BTW, the new phone app is awesome! You can order your food ahead of time and pick it up as soon as you get there! My advice on this particular location is to avoid the drive thru. They are pretty fast, but if you order on the app and then park you'll be in and out much faster, and you can pressure them to give you more sauce. COME THRU with that ChickFilA sauce!
The lines are always ridiculous but the food and service will never disappoint! Customer service is always the best! Just wish they were open on sundays! Love it!

Tried this today at lunch for the first time in my life and it was very good.  The fried chicken was very moist and the skin had a nice crunch to it.  Just the right amount of spice.  Their fries are a little blank, but their dipping sauces were A+!  Very very long line, but worth the wait on special occasions.
I love breakfast here!!!! It's always good!! The kids love it and we do too!! Breakfast is the best!! We also really enjoy the grilled nuggets and the waffle fries!!
My favorite place to eat! I love that it stays open till 3 am on Fridays!!!  And the chick fil a sauce is bomb!!!!

Went for a quick bite in the morning. The staff was friendly and nice. Our chicken sandwiches were warm and felt fresh that they just made it. Overall everything was delicious. My favorite is the waffle shaped fries which were really good.

We ate here a few times. We were excited when they announced it because we loved their food and restaurants on the East Coast.Since they are so conservative and we disagree with their views on social issues, we avoid this place as much as possible.The location is easy to spot, at the corner of Sunset and Highland. They have parking and decent outdoor seating. Customer service is good.Food is above average for a fast food, better made, we like their chicken sandwiches (have to have that pickle inside), the meat is tender and tasty. Their waffle fries are good and I love their tart lemonades. Prices are too high for fast food type joint.As we all know, they close on Sundays. I'm not 100% behind this place, but food wise, it's an OK option if in need.

This review is long overdue. Chick-Fil-A restaurants are scarce in California so this is the closest location for those in the LA metro area. Grew up in the South so have eaten it hundreds of times. The fold is always solid. Never had a bad meal here! The chicken sandwiches and nuggets are so tasty! The Polynesian and BBQ sauce compliments any meal well. I'm guilty of taking more than a few to use later haha. ThWhether breakfast, lunch or dinner, can't go wrong here. Usually stop here in the morning before work and the staff is very friendly. I will say avoid evenings as the line is usually hanging out on to Sunset.

Having lived in San Francisco for about 93.33% of my life and Manhattan for 5%, I didn't really have a Chick-fil-A to go to (except when they made one in Manhattan this past year, which really wasn't close to me, though).Now that I've just moved to Los Angeles, it's conveniently located on my drive to/from work. Good for when it's late and I don't feel like cooking. Parking is not terrible like the In-N-Out a few blocks away and service is much faster. Definitely a go-to chicken sandwich spot for me.

This Chick-fil-A is both a blessing and a curse. I hate that it is located in the middle of Hollywood off two of the busiest streets in Los Angeles. However, I find myself almost always going every time I drive by it.The drive-thru line can get a little crazy at times. There's two lanes, which is good, but they are almost always super backed up. Sometimes it's so backed up that it runs onto Sunset Blvd and causes traffic. The employees stand outside to take your order, and you can pay with their portable devices as well. If you want to dine-in, this location has its own parking lot, but it can get hard to get into because the overflow of drive-thru cars. When I dined in for the first time a few days ago, I realized that this location does not have indoor seating. You order at a cafeteria-like window, and then they call your name when your order is ready. They have a decently sized outdoor patio with a bunch of metal tables and some bar seating. I hate that the line is always long, the location sucks, and there's no indoor seating, but I have to say that this location has had some of the best Chick-fil-A I've ever had. For some reason, I'm not sure what it is, but their food tastes better than other locations I've been to. Maybe I'm crazy or maybe it's because after waiting for so long at the drive-thru it makes it THAT much more delicious and worth it. It's just amazing.

Love me, love me some chil fil a!This is my and hubby's go-to drive-thru breakfast spot. We probably stop by here 3x a month for breakfast wrap, bisquit and muffin plus coffee. I really like their coffee, plus they have tons of different creamers to choose from and if you order via drive-thru, they'll even mix in your creamer for you -- how sweet! Oh, and try their yogurt parfait, it's so yummy, the yogurt is restaurant-quality and loaded with granola and fruits. I've ordered through them, too for catered lunch meeting at work and it is always a hit. They would even whip up a vegetarian wrap if you ask them. The delivery persons are always nice and courteous, and they don't ask for tips! Their receipts don't have a "tip" section. Check out their menu selection for delivery/catering, your co-workers will thank you. And the total charges are always on the lowest end of our budget.
