He then takes my order provides me with not only exceptional service but REAL service a lot of these employees aren't giving & He taught us something new about one of our cards. Thank you JEAN and keep up the good work!

Never thought I'd say this but this is a horrible chick fil a. I've visited over 12 different locations and I am a very loyal customer but this is unacceptable. The drive thru is a horrific nightmare and they need to get their logistics right.Also, after getting my order and coming home I saw that half my order was missing - no Mac and cheese and missing a fries which is the main reason I came to try the new menu item. Being beyond disappointed, I called the store manager and she said I have to return for a refund when they should be able to process it in their POS system. I forgave the couple dollars but what shocked me is the manager said she apologized for the employees making mistakes that most of them do not have prior food handling experience!!!! This is a bad look for the chain and I certainly won't support nor come back to this location. They need to get it together and I have never had a horrible experience from logistical nightmare to my order being made incorrectly.
0 stars bro are kidding me 10+minutes to serve up two cars in the drive thru! Never again!!!!!!!!!!!!

THIS CHICK FIL A IS BOOF AS F! Super poor customer service qualities, little bit of space inside, and you can't even get inside the parking lot because you have to wait in the order line to even reach inside since all the entrances say they are only exists! SMH they needa fix they service up, especially as a new one and this is my first attempt coming here. So sad!

They gave me old food. I wasted my money. Very dissatisfied with the quality today. Normally they are better but not coming back to this location because they don't keep up with the quality although they have just opened.
As I was leaving Candice approached my husband and I she offered to throw our trash away and as we were exciting she offered to refill our beverage, super nice very attentive:)
I know where all the rubber chickens from vaudeville ended. What a lousy restaurant this is Can't imagine why people waste their money on this junk.

Just visited this new location on Saturday & waited in line forever just to get my order messed up 3 times.I ordered a veggie wrap (which i've ordered before) and they gave me a chicken wrap. I got back in line and explained it to the guy taking orders in line, he ran in to get a new one...came back with a chicken wrap wrapped in lettuce. He said we'd get an extra order of fries to make up for it. We waited another 10min and a manager came out with a veggies wrapped in lettuce. I just left with this and ate it because I couldn't wait any longer.They didn't give us extra fries but the manager did give me 2 coupons for free chicken sandwiches...I don't eat chicken, hence the veggie wrap.This all took 45min-1 hour. $10 salad wrapped in lettuce w/ cold fries.
Friendliest service ever! They were really busy and staff could've been stressed but they were super nice! So happy this store opened!

Literally been in the drive thru lane for over 20 minutes and still several cars away from receiving food. They need to study other successful locations to figure out their flow. I will never come back to this location again after this first experience.

Worst experience at a Chick-fil-a ever!!!I went to the drive thru & they had 3 people taking orders (over kill it wasn't even packed) I paid with my card & the guy asks for my name. I say Francine. So I wait in the damn drive thru for like 10 mins (there's only 2 cars ahead of me) the first car is done. Then I wait forever while the lady in front is chatting it up. I get to the window & the lady says "for Sal?" Ummm no. For Francine. She's like wait... what? I said FOR FRANCINE. She says the lady in front just said her name was Francine, I confirmed twice. I say ok... well idk but my name is Francine. Can I have my order? She asks what I ordered & then is trying to figure out what to do.Enter supervisor.... she asks what happened & the first woman at the window says "the lady up front has her order. I confirmed she was Francine twice. But this is Francine" the supervisor says "well Francine just got a free meal the lady paid for your meal" I correct her & tell her no... I paid for my own damn meal & the lady was given my order. She looks confused as hell. NOT HARD TO FOLLOW. I paid for my meal. You gave it to the wrong person. Make my food again & I'll be on my way. She asks. So what do we do? What do you want me to do? At this point I'm over it. I say give me my money back & I'll leave. She's like ok do you have your receipt? No I don't & why is that you ask... cause the lady in front who got my order. Also got my damn receipt!!! I paid with a card so hopefully my info wasn't on there. Cause then I'll really be screwed. She's like ok. Give me your card. Honestly. All they had to do was make another order & send me on my way. Super unprofessional & unorganized. I get it. They just opened. But they should have been trained properly on how to run the drive thru window.

I absolutely love Chick-fil-A and the fact that they are opening right across the street from my church is amazing. They have gone out of their way to meet with us and establish a relationship. New and clean facilities, location. I don't have to worry about parking cause I can park at Core Church. Super excited about this. Parking is a little bit crammed but I don't have to worry about it lol. Great staff that strive to please the customer. Been here twice and I'm already impressed. This this current debate with  Popeyes, to me Chick wins hands down! Anyways I will be coming here for years to come. I love the Spicy Deluxe sandwich and now they have Mac and cheese as well! Along with their shakes and the cookies! This is a great place to come and have a great meal that is served courteous members.

I'm so happy that there's a Chick-fil-A on my way home from work and school. I feel for the employees though. It's not a very convenient location for a very popular drive thru place. I can see it easily become a cluster mess during peak hours. Be nice and patient to these employees, folks.

Like every other Chick-fil-A, food is amazing and the employees are amazing. But, this location has a fatal flaw. At least it does right now. There is one way into the parking lot or to go to the drive-through. So whether you want to just go in and eat or use the drive through, you're going to be waiting in ONE LONG AND SLOW line. And unlike other Chick-fil-A's this line is not going smoothly. It does not go as fast As others seem too. So if you go here make sure you don't go when it's busy. And the entrance/exit on the La Cienega side is blocked so you can only leave from there. Apparently they said the city does not want the street to get congested. So the back alley and side streets will become congested instead.

Love it glad they are FINALLY HERE YEAAA only bad thing my sauce has not been right so make sure to check ur bags but the service is excellent as usualllllyy now these workers actually deserve $15-$16 per hour McDonald's nooooo Chick-fil-A yaaazzzzz
Came here today with my friend and wow !! The food was amazing as always and super crowded but they went beyond and had amazing customer service
Just opened yesterday. Very clean. Very friendly. Latrice is so nice! So glad I'm just a couple blocks away. This will be my new spot!

I've never not been able to order regular entrees from a chick fil a drive-through during breakfast hours... I didn't find out that this location will only sell regular entree items if you walk inside until was already stuck in the drive-through line..... not to mention the the drive-through and parking lot situation is pretty horrible....

I've waited so long for a Chick Fil A near my house and i was so excited for this to open, only to be greatly let down. They messed up our order so bad and had us wait in the parking lot for 10 extra minutes. Forgot the drink, took down the wrong sandwich and didn't get our separate orders. The trainer was kind of rude as well. 2/10 unfortunately :\

Smaller location than some of their other locations with limited seating. There were some opening day hiccups. I came here with several of my coworkers. They messed up some of our orders but quickly fixed it. It was crowded but the wait wasn't too long.
This location is open! Yay for more traffic on La Cienega! Wish the flow was on the other side of the street, not directly on the side of traffic from the 10 Freeway. Love this place tho.

Well I actually got up early to go to the grand opening to get some chick-fil-a. And I must say it was very nice to not have to drive so far to have a great chicken sandwich. My girlfriend ordered the chicken strips with a side of the amazing Chick-fil-A sauce.The inside wasnt as large as some other locations but very beautiful.We got to meet with the owner as well as have our order taken by her and she was very sweet, endearing, and accommodating.Thank you so much and we wish you a happy and successful grand opening.
Screw all Chick fil a. All they do is mess up traffic in the area.  Food is trash and appears to be microwaved.Would give negative stars.

The gentlemen who I think it the manager or supervisor (Asian guy) was very friendly and gave great customer service at the drive thru. I've only have pleasant encounters and enjoyed the food served here. Good job

This review is not about the quality of food at this location but rather to write about the Manager James at this chick fil a. Other day I had ordered food and requested to have my fries upgraded at no additional cost. I was waiting outside and didn't expect for them to really do it. James had came outside in a very upsetting behavior and starting going off on me. He had called me a theft and a liar about my request that I am stealing from the company. I didn't mind paying for the upgrade at all it's just the fact he belittled me in front of customers with his voice and tone. What I did was I paid for my food and just wanted to see if they can do it. If not, I would have paid for it. James is an complete embarrassment to all of chick fil a's location and he should never speak to a customer like that ever again. By far the worst chick fil a in all of Los Angeles. Avoid this location and go elsewhere or James who seems to hate certain people will make you feel embarrassed in front of customers out loud.
This place is almost never even open, and whenever it is open, it's always past breakfast time to where you can't order breakfast at all.

I have to give lots of props to the people that work here. Only drive thru currently but there were many employees taking your order. If credit, they take payment when you order. They also note your car so that the people bringing you your food know how to locate you.
My order is consistently incorrect, which is disappointing:/Yesterday I ordered a meal, it was missing items. So I ordered again and it was wrong a second time:/

Great customer service - best in the neighborhood that I've experienced since I moved here. They've gotten my orders correct consistently and the food has been good. Can't ask for more. Also much better experience than my times going to the CFA on Sunset... comparatively, that location sucks.
Went through drive-thru and ordered salad but they didn't give any dressing for it. Until they get things right this one star is staying.

I go to this location since it is close to my home and work. But they've mixed up my orders quite a few times already yet again I keep giving them a chance. In My recent experience they over charged me $8 when I paid the drive-thru employee and they tried charging me AGAIN when I pulled up to the window. They didn't want to give me a refund. Instead they told me to call customer service. Highly annoying! They need to get it together. I'm not going to this location anymore.

It's Chick Fil A, so it can't be that bad. 3 is too low, but 4 is a little to high. More of a 3 1/2. They have gotten my order wrong before, getting in and out can be very tricky, the area is ghetto, and it's always crowded. Food is fine though, it's Chick Fil A.
This place is awesome, the food alone is worth it, but if you go inside, it's like a little piece of heaven, courteous staff, clean, great for families.

Okay I've given this location chance after chance....but something is not right about what they are serving. The chicken does not take like Chick Fil A chicken. It tastes like processed meat. Really cheap in quality of food. I've lived in 3 different states and this is the first Chick Fil A that I've experienced this with. Note to management: stop trying to cut cost on food quality just because you think a poorer neighborhood won't notice. Yes their health matter too.
Hands down worst chick fil a location EVER!!!!   They have never gotten my order right and their food quality is sub par!!!   Go to a different lication!!!!
How do you forget hash browns with a meal order? I got it on my way to work or else I'd go back and ask for it. Yeesh

I'm so disappointed, every time we go to the drive through on the new western location our order is always wrong , this stuff is not cheap and management should really train their workers for better performance and service .

I love Chik - fil- A. I know I'm not supposed to because they're kind of homophobic and all that but their chicken sammichs just have a way of hitting the  spot. The food I was served  at this location however, didn't hit the spot. It was so far off that I couldn't finish my meal. Fries were cold , immediately out of the bag and the chicken tasted like it was a day old and reheated under a heat lamp. Won't be coming back here , plus service is lousy too and not the usual cheerful attitude.

I've been a patron of Chick-fil-A for years and never had an interaction that wasn't pleasant- Until I started being a patron of this location that is. I have never been more consistently disappointed- in this review I'll detail my experiences from my two visits Monday and Wednesday mornings. I generally arrive around 10:10-10:15 on my way to work to grab breakfast. On Monday, I pulled into the drive through and although the line I happened to be in wasn't moving as fast as the other- I didn't mind waiting. But then I noticed an additional cashier appearing in the other line, and I watch as three to four cars that arrived after me have proceeded to make their way to leave. When I ask the closest cashier why there was two people assisting a line that's already exceeding the productivity of the other line? She just shrugged and said "Idk what he's doing- he just came out here" instead of taking the time to survey and assess the scene and communicate effectively with her co-worker. By the time I get to order it's after 10:30 and they refuse to serve me breakfast although I arrived in more than enough time to have ordered and left had they only been paying attention. On yesterday, Wednesday, I arrive and there's hardly any line and I'm thinking "wheww- this finna be a breeze" but as I'm waiting to order some male employee walks out and hands a drink to one of the female cashiers taking orders in the drive thru, and proceeds to begin a conversation with her. I don't think anything of it until I notice the drive thru cashier in my lane literally walks past my car- TO GO JOIN THEIR CONVERSATION! Then she proceeds to take the orders of cars behind me, completely forgetting me and my roommate who've been waiting nearly 15 mins at this point. What in thee actual fuck.. and it isn't until two cars have passed me in the left drive thru lane and cars behind me are honking that she walks up to my window and asks why I'm not pulling forward. She gets annoyed that I'm upset and rushes to take my order and doesn't even bother to ask for my name before she rolls her eyes and walks away.. I told an employee that I recognized from being on the inside a few times that always went out of their way to converse with me, that'd I never be returning and it was her that implored of me to write this. So yea, thanks for tarnishing my image of a brand that I formerly perceived to be the epitome of customer service.. fuck y'all

second time its happened to me at this location! i go through my order and of course an entire entreé is missing . no straws in the bag , although i specifically asked for them to please put them in the bag. annoying!!!!

There has never been a time that this Chick-fil-A has ever had my order right. Every time I order thru Uber eats, they can never just read my request. Each time I have order either they have messed up my meal or do not provide sauces nor straw nor napkins. Their customer service sucks.They will loose clientele.

Sadly just don't go to this location.. everytime I come in the morning it takes an hour.... And no.. I'm not exaggerating. An hour. Ordered inside at 10:12am & it's 11:17 am right now. Just ridiculous.. we always just have to ask for a refund. Can't come to this location anymore.
Been here twice for breakfast and had to wait over half an hour for FAST FOOD. Messed up my order one of those times too. Seen people get refunded for waiting so long way too much here.

When this place opened it was so good! As time has passed the food is really burned or soggy. My family & I have received wrong orders as well & it's unfortunate. Sometimes they'll take our order & when we receive our food something is either missing or out of stock. It'd be nice to know beforehand. We just haven't had a good experience here lately. Not all but some employees come off immature & rude.
I always order drive thru or UberEats from this Chick-fil-A and I've never had an issue with my order. Sandwich and fries always slap.
Love the food but they put regular sandwich on my order of spicy chicken combo... so sad cause love to have it. So disappointed 11/26/21

Spent about 30 minutes in drive thru for them to only give me half of my order correct. Ordered one bacon egg and cheese biscuit, and one sausage, egg and cheese biscuit. Instead of bacon, they gave me the chicken, egg and cheese sandwich.

Omg... we  ordered here on Saturday, 10/29/21 around 11:30 pm. We picked up for doordash on this location and figured we gotta grab some food because might as well! AND GUESS WHAT?! THERE WAS A PIECE OF HAIR IN MY HUSBAND'S SANDWICH!!! We didn't have time to complain and go back to the restaurant because we have a door dash delivery to drop off....... obviously he didn't eat his sandwich but like wtf ??! Also, they didnt have a caution wet floor sign inside the bathroom, they only had it outside by the hall, once i got to the stall i almost slipped because the floor was freshly mopped. ‍‍
The food is good but every time I order they forget something.Like last time I ordered a salad with fries and they forgot the fries and they still charged me.
The team is so nice and friendly thanks Cynthia you the best you make my day thanks for the lemonade god bless!!
Update! Management was extremely generous in response to this and has been nothing but phenomenal in their communication. This was definitely a late-night error, we were all tired!
Ordered a pretty hefty meal just now And I was excited to get the peach milkshake because I knew it was going away soon so I ordered it and I got vanilla instead...

Didn't like the employees attitude she was in a hurry didn't greet us laughing while trying to order not like like other chick fil a just a poor job over all ,cold fries still mad . horrible. Everyone working on August 31 just one of the girls outside was nice at the the drive thru she tried taking my order but the other girl already did it she needs a raise she's the only one without a bummy  face ,even tho she has a mask on respect to her over all not good place don't waste your time coming here horrible customer service . Service over all . Your burger will come out like this . Forsure won't come to this chick fil a again ‍

So they have this sign that tells us that they will open up at 10am but it does not say they will not have breakfast for the 30 minutes that's left of the normal breakfast time so if you expect to get breakfast don't come to this location they say it's because they are short staffed but your still open during breakfast time so it makes no sense but it's your business I'm just the consumer
I expected if  from McDonald's but NEVERRRRR from Chick-Fil-A!! How am I supposed to eat my chicken nuggets with out SAUCE ! --.--Disappointed! Smh Order number # 2732

Ordered drive thru and the young teenager was so in a hurry she didn't get my ordered right just to go to break and made me go pick it up inside, my point is if your coming here for drive thru go somewhere else you can literally wait up to an hour save your time (:
Great service whenever I come to this location. .y orders always come out hot, quick, and correct - including all the sauces I ask for.

Drove here becaue the Hollywood and sunset location had a line down the block ...  I get my food get home and this is what I have as a large fry serving .... Unacceptable this location and the sunset location do the same shit ..... give proper portions for what we pay ....
Always very kind and helpful and this location. Super quick and easy to get my food. Alejandro made sure our order was correct before handing it to us! Very satisfied with my visit here today.
This location always messes up my order. They are the worst. Double check everything before you leave!
If I had a choice, I would give this place a no star! Who the heck delivered a salad without a dressing. Yuck!

I'm not sure why the drive thru people don't have a menu to show you when you are ordering? It's slows down the whole line every time someone has to wait to get to the front menu. If you're going to have people standing outside taking our order why wouldn't they be supplied with a menu? Dumbest thing I've ever seen a company do.
The hubby convinced me to give them a try and now I'm hooked on their salads. It feels a bit overpriced for me but was pretty good.

Had not been to Nathan your best employee I would give you guys zero stars . Mind you i didn't know the guy personally but he got the customer service  skills like i said before on my first reviews him and Danielle both equally customer service oriented people .Please refill your hand sanitizer station !

So the stars reflect the work of the employees and quality of the food. I come here all the time, the service is great, food is always fresh. Weirdly enough they got me order wrong one time, but I subconsciously wanted the soup they gave me anyways. Gods hands man lol.My only concern is the last time it was raining hard, employees were out working with customers.Even with umbrellas, I'd like to let management know to keep your employees inside and safe during the panoramic!!!Huge emphasis on the great food and service tho!

I order a bunch of chicken nuggets today made it home only to see no dipping sauce for my meal.  Not a single sauce!!! To dip or not to dip obviously   not to dip!!! since there's no sauce.  They lost a customer permanently.

Great service honestly! After me and my sister had a horrible experience at pollo loco we decided to leave and return our order and get Chick-fil-A and we had great service one of your employees took my sister back to her car with his umbrella because it was raining. You guys did great in choosing your employees

This location is trash. Do not leave without double checking your order. The past couple of times I've come here they wait until the last minute to tell me they're out of something I ordered. They tell me at the window. This evening half my order was forgotten, but of course I was charged for it. I don't even want my food anymore.
Only come here for the iced coffee, I've had my order messed up multiple times now, I appreciate the effort to expedite the drive through, but what's the point if you mess up the orders

I love Chick fil A a huge fan but this location is a complete letdown. Yo, the owner! Franchisee please get your act together. I was happy this place opened near my home. I come here at least once a week. The service is blah. Employees are indifferent, (all other locations employees are helpful, happy, and at least fake it. That's what you are known for) But the thing that got me writing this review is the fries, man, the fries. The first time I get my fries and they are filled halfway. I'm like ok I'll give them the benefit of the doubt. When it happens over and over again. Even after I let the drive-thru person know then I'm pissed. Today I order my fries look at the pics. They are filled halfway. Complete let down.
Very, very bad customer service.  Never used to be this way.  Cold food and poor customer service   =   I WON'T be back.

The employees you have now aren't the nicest. I was a fan of this place but unfortunately after the service and vibe Star,  Eddy and Leslie gave me.... I used to have that memory of chick fila being top notch in their service but I guess they lowered their expectations now. When they opened they had a lot of adults working I guess they were the bosses because now all they got is unprofessional young crowd.
Worst location ever!!! My food was cold asf!!!! I went back to let them know and turns out they gave me the same sandwich!

The drive thru attendant was a little sh*t head - I definitely won't be coming back to this location... they even refused to give me whip cream and a cherry on my milkshake.... These people were ridiculous so disrespectful and such a joke !
Went thru drive-thru around 1-1:30pm today (Fri 11/6), found several small white hairs in fries. Looks like small dog hairs, probably from someone's clothing. Need better quality control.
Chris Low is an amazing staff member!! Very sweet and cordial! Every experience has been great and we are always satisfied with the quality of the food!

Always consistently good. I get the chicken nugget meal with a large fry and medium sweet ice tea. Their chick fil a sauce is to die for. The sandwiches are also good. It has never let me down. When its busy, this location has multiple drive through lanes and workers there to get your order down and out to you as fast as possible.
service quick and easy , food was great except the 30count nuggets VERY salty and greasy

It's been a month since I've visited this location and I have to update my review because I must say I was very impressed. My food was amazing, the mac and cheese was on point tonight, the employees projected great attitudes, smiles, and service. I wish I would have asked for the name of the gentleman who assisted me at the last window for some last minute sauces.. am going from a 1 star rating to a 4. I will update my reviews in the future for my next experience! Great job to the team working tonight at 8:37pm
They stole about $35 from me. I've left several messages for a store lead to contact me. No response.
Love the food and the service is awesome! I really like how they offer free food from time to time. My biggest advice is do not every go to the drive thru around 6pm as it gets crowded.

Got there to pick up a postmates order and the workers were dancing playing music. I walked in to check my order and the floor was wet with no caution sign. The manger was there and also looked unorganized. The location is very teen ran. Never coming to this location!!

This place is an absolute mess, they can never seem to get your order right and I have to come back 3-4 times because of missing items. They are really quick to mention that it's extra for sauce but can never remember what you actually ordered. Make sure your throughly check before leaving the window because they WILL MESS UP YOUR ORDER EVERY SINGLE TIME.

Yum Their lemon slush (?) is so good and refreshing! It has a tangy yoghurt taste to it! I got my usual order-waffle fries well done and spicy sandwich with jack pepper. Also like how they give purrel wipes!

Went there after work since my wife and i haven't had Chick Fil-A in awhile but they forgot our 12 CT Chicken nuggets and have us honey mustard not roasted honey bbq sauce.  They almost forgot our ice cream until I said something.  Plus the large fries I got was only filled about 1/2 up.   What happened to your service Chick Fil-A? Horrible.

ABSOLUTELY DISGRACEFUL.Alright, so last week, I went to chick-fil-a FOR THE FIRST TIME on the way to get my boyfriend to work. At this point, it's 11:11pm, his shift is at 11:30 and we have no time for error and need to get there fast as he's an essential worker at a nursing home! We ordered 12 nuggets and asked for 3 bbq sauces and 3 chick-fil-a sauces. Simple, right?Well, clearly it wasn't that simple as they charged me for TWENTY SIX SAUCES. I was in a rush and didn't realize my total was double the price of the nuggets.I called customer service the next morning and was told I'd get a call from the manager of that location in 2-3 days. Well, 7 days went by and nothing. No call, no email.I left an online complaint 4 days ago and yet NOTHING has been done to correct my double charge!!IM SO BEYOND UPSET THAT MY COMPLAINT WAS BLOWN OFF AND THIS WAS MY FIRST TIME EVEN GOING TO CHICK-FIL-A!!!!For a business that prices themselves so heavily on their customer service I sure as heck got the absolute worst!I'm annoyed that no one reached out and nothing was done to correct this issue. I reached out to the customer service phone line, I reached out online and wanted to keep this off of yelp but clearly this was my last option.Oh, and my name is not WILSA so there's another little annoying touch to my experience.

First time visiting this chick-fil-A location and it was a truly great experience! I ordered 2 cold brews, one with vanilla and one without for myself and another member of my family. Unfortunately the coffee cups were not labeled as to which one had the pump of vanilla. When I asked the person helping me if he knew, he apologized and said he didn't so he made us another cup of cold brew. He was very kind and understanding of the misunderstanding and solved the problem immediately. I think he was a manager because he was wearing a blue shirt. Truly wish I got his name from his name-tag to thank him, but he had peppered hair and was very helpful. So thank you Chuck-fil-A for a wonderful experience! I will definitely be coming back!
The food here was ok but one of the drive through restaurants food was very salty and personally to me wasn't that edible because of it.
Kenny at the drive thru today had quality service and was so nice and attentive despite the hot weather. We also made a few changes to our large order and he was so accommodating.

The food is tasty, but you have to check your order before you leave. Too many times they have gotten my order wrong. It's not just this location though. I've been to 3 different locations in the past two months and every time they got the order wrong. I don't know what's going on with their employees. Is it the pandemic? Or is it their training? ‍

I must say that I am extremely disappointed. I drove about 30 mins out to grab a late night snack. Let's just first starts by saying the line was long and the service took even longer. I asked for a sandwich and a milk shake and was told that "we are out for tonight". So my next question was when will you have it because I found it very stupid to cut off products because someone didn't properly order inventory. So if you're ever in need of food last minute this chick fil a is not reliable!!! Save your time and gas. I would recommend calling first. Other chick fil a would never...

I was really glad when I found a Chick-fil-A was going to open near where I lived. Prior, I had to go all the way to Sunset branch. However, like many other comments, I have to agree that the food is great, but the service is horrible. It seems like the drive-thru is run by bunch of teenagers that are too immature to hold a paying job. Although, I do not expect some sort of 5-start services at a fast-food restaurant, I do expect them to not get my order wrong, give an attitude, or make me wait while they are too busy flirting with themselves. I don't understand why there is a need to have 3 people standing at the window when none of them actually want to move.

Food is good as always, but I've ordered with DoorDash several times and have not received ANY sauces with my order. This last time I ordered $25 worth of food, 3 separate items, and asked for a total of 6 Chick-Fil-A sauces but didn't even receive ONE.

Good healthy as you can get for fast food. Love the breakfast sliders and the frozen lemonade. I've been to this location many times since they've opened. Staff and security guard in the parking lot always pleasant.  Same compliments for Whittier, Montebello, Sunset Blvd locations.

I like chick fil a for their spicy feud sandwich, frozen lemonade with a side of chicken nuggets and the sauces. I think they have great service and I like the chicken. However the OG Chicken sandwich is just ighhht not a huge fan of the regular sandwich but everything else is fireeee

I must begin by saying, I have had unpleasant experiences all 3 times that I have been to this chick filet. Yesterday around 3pm was just outrages and I must share the awful experience. I was working for Doordash and I was sent to pick up chick filet. The last 2 times the employees were rude and not helpful at all. I approach the women at the entrance and she tells me that they will call out my order when it is ready. I went to wait in my car and right away my order was called. I waved at the employee holding my order and she looked very unhappy to have to walk it 15 feet to my car. When she hands it to me she tosses it with attitude. And I mean disrespectful attitude. I proceed to ask her why she was acting this way. She said "Your are supposed walk up and get it" I said okay sorry but I didn't think it was a big enough deal for her to be rude. She then said "Go fuck yourself" and threw her arms up while walking away. The manager came out, who was very nice and even tried offering me a free drink. A customer in her car next to me even confirmed that the female employee had done what I said. Check the security tapes as well if you need further proof. This sort of service and disrespect I would expect from an inner city Taco Bell, but never from a Chick Filet, especially a new location in Hollywood. Regardless of anything, no employee should ever tell a customer/food courier to "go fuck themselves" just because they had to walk the food to my car. Not to mention, last time they asked us to wait in our cars. So it is very confusing. I just needed to share my experience, in hopes that this employee cannot continue to disrespect customers. I want to be clear that the manager was helpful and did his best. I love Chick Filet and they always have great service, but NOT at this location...

So is chick fil a place to get food or a place where employees blast loud their music and start dancing completely ignoring the customer and the orders? Unacceptable. Everytime I go to chick fil location 1011 n western the employees are extremely rude and always getting my order wrong and then yelling at me for not "telling my order" right when I do multiple of times. I have a recording of the staff ignoring me, yelling at me for not stating my order correct and then blasting their music and literally having a dance battle IN THE KITCHEN! Unacceptable . I wish I could give zero stars . A dance battle in the kitchen, really?!
Sometimes good food and service, and sometimes your large fry looks like this and the drive thru cashiers cut you off before you can finish your order :/

Visited before COVID-19First time to this location and all we could think was how sketchy it looked late at night.  Good thing for drive-thru.  We were famished after attending the theatre and the chicken sandwich hit the spot.  The fries aren't bad.  The chicken could be a little more spicy.  We were full afterwards and that was good enough for us.Plenty of free parking.Prefer the Northridge location (which is busier due to near Cal State Northridge), but since this place is closer to us, we will definitely be back.

I told my friends about this restaurant and I visit this place often. I get very good feedback from my friends. The dishes they serve are great and the team is very friendly and cooperative. Whenever we eat in this place we have a splendid time.  I warmly recommend this restaurant. My favorite food from the menu is the chicken nuggets and their sauce but overall I loved their menu.

This week I witnessed police officers refused service as they entered this location. That is absolutely appalling that an establishment known for their courteous workers, would treat hard working hungry, young men, with such disrespect. Instead these chick fil a employees joined a group of passing protesters . I hope these individuals get fired. I emailed their corporate office in hopes their employees get trained to serve officers that put their lives in danger daily, especially now. Please boycott this location until these employees get reprimanded.

Poor costumer service from this location. I see now why everyone prefers to drive to their Hollywood location. First the guy taking my order forgets to add a sandwich, second I drive up to the window and a female and male employee are on their cell phone.  Neither of them washed their hands after using it. To top it off when I get home one of the spicy chicken sandwiches only had the chicken and the bun. You guys really need to step it up in this location it's making the brand look bad. Try hiring adults not kids that should help.

So pissed off im a regular customer and I was so upset when I got to the window because I kindly asked if I can redeem my points for a sandwich and the employee named Zach Thomas straight up said no !  And that to be was upsetting to see a " manager" be like that.  If the other employees never have issues redeeming something  at the window.  He couldn't even take orders properly. He had a bunch of peoples orders sitting in the window that he couldn't even manage.

Come to the drive-thru if you want to get half of the items you pay for, and be given the run around for 3 weeks....and counting.... for a refund. Definitely not coming back to this location. The store owner can't bother to call me back to resolve the issue....

I'm so happy that this location finally opened up close to my house! I wanted to emphasize that my man Kenny really knows how to bring the famous Chick-fil-A hospitality. He's always in a good mood and he makes coming here just that much more enjoyable!

I'm so glad they opened a chick fil a right down my house! This Chick-fil-A is probably the most convenient one for me. I will tell you that this Chick-fil-A line is super long but it's not an issue if you have time. Always their service is usually really fast as well so it may look long but you won't have to wait for a long time. I recommend getting their nuggets! Their nuggets are the best and their Chick-fil-A sauce is the perfect sauce to make that meal even better.

Honestly the only problem I have with this location is with the drive through service.  They are bad at giving out sauces even if you request them.... On going problem at the location other than that everything else DENK.

Love the flavors  but they this location cannot get the app orders straight. The app is convenient and allows you to enter your payment and place orders for pick up. I ordered a simple dinner including original sandwich, fries and shake. The app confirmed my payment and vehicle I would be driving for quick curbside delivery. I drove to the location.  Checked in and app was not  working, the location was having trouble finding the order. I checked with the staff and oops! They cannot find my order. I waited for a while and they could not resolve it. This was a wasted trip and left without my order. I hope they can improve the app and order execution. I guess it's going to be Dave's Hot Chicken for now.

I just left this EXACT location today -I got my order at 12:40ish- and I RARELY ever leave reviews however the heavier set young lady at the drive through who hands the food to the gentleman standing outside was INSANELY rude. The girl- not the young guy. The first kid got my wrong which is TOTALLY ok, I don't ever freak out when that happens- I pull up to the counter where the girl was giving the guy outside my food and I said oh I have to order a regular fries and she stops, glares at me for a good 5 seconds, glares at him, rolls her eyes and puffs a big sigh and throws the bag of fries at her co worker to give to me. I had my debit card out to pay for this transaction and the kind gentleman outside just told me to have a wonderful day. She should not be behaving that way towards customers who were kind. I wish I saw her name tag but she had dark hair, heavier set and she rude. I got my drive through order around 12:40pm today. Disgusting behavior from one employee and amazing behavior from another.
decided to stop by bathroom was kinda stinky but whatever, dude named bradley was really cool and quick with the service

Hands down the best service I've ever gotten from a fast food restaurant I ordered online and an hour later didn't come and I called and they said the meal was on them I just had to come down there and pick it up and literally an employee named Alex gave us what we ordered and more this showed to me that there service was literally the best

Viviana at the drive thru was super nice and friendly. Lovely service! The ladies at the drive thru tonight was also very friendly & polite. I'm happy that there is a Chick-fil-A so close to my home now. Thank you for the great service :)

Tonight on March 2 at around 11:12PM my friend and I decided to go and buy some chick-fil-a for a midnight craving. Once i pulled up to the drive through, my friend and i were waiting on a "hey can i take your order" or a greeting of some sort to start our order. While waiting, my friend and i were having a good laugh amongst ourselves when we hear Leslie(male) say "alright so are you guys gonna order or keep messing around. Im the manager and if you keep messing around im going to ask you to leave" My friend and i quickly looked at each other in shock because of how rude he came at us. And this is chick-fil-a "known for your "great" customer service." Once pulling up to the window, he told us that he didnt appreciate what we were doing back there. I politely responded with "we were having a good time amongst ourselves, we never heard a 'hey can i take your order' if not we wouldve immediately stopped and would begin ordering." His response was "i heard squeeky voices." And i told him "yes cause we were talking amongst ourselves, like i said, i was never greeted to begin ordering." He cut us off rudely said to forget about it and walked away. I definitely did NOT like the way i was treated. He belittled us and made my chick-fil-a experience one of my worst and will be one of my lasts. This is coming from a "guest" who is a daily buyer. You guys seriously need to figure out who it is you are hiring because for him be in a manager position and treating people like that is not right for your image.

First review at this place. Today I'm giving five stars because my wife and I got out of work early to spend time with our daughter, but our original choice was closed due to renovation (lemon tree on western). Daughter is super upset and disappointed, crying her eyes out and where do we go? We thought maybe McDs would be good plan B since they have a playground, but no their play place closes at 6. More disappointment! So we were ready to give up and decided to just order drive thru, but wife recommends chick fil a because she's preferred a chicken than a burger. So we go to the drive thru, and baby is still crying (she's two), and we're thinking of what to do at home to entertain her, when suddenly wife glances into the windows and sees kids running around and just gets out of the car, pulls our daughter and walks inside. I finished the order at the drive thru, parked and went inside, when to my delight I find my wife watching our daughter playing happily in chick fil a playground. THEY HAVE A PLAYGROUND! And she's happy! Wife is happy and with an appetite and I'm happy and really hungry, but at least we have chick fil a to thank for saving our Monday night. We're so glad you guys opened here. Food has been great, service is ridiculously good, and..... you have playground. What more can I say?
I recently visited Chick Fil A and the cashier Viviana had great customer service and was very attending. Love this Chick Fil A

This chick fil a location is always clean and well kept. The quality here is top notch and for the price it can't be beat. Honestly go try this location it has the best customer service. Yesterday I went through drive thru and encountered an employee named Bradley, he embodied all the core qualities and values that I find in an employee understanding and attentive always wanting the best for the customer. Definitely look forward to coming back here to try the spicy deluxe again so delicious!

A very nice Chick-fil-A, appears to be new and was in walking distance from our Air-bnb. Service was amazing however the tables were not clean which is my only complaint. We went first thing in the morning and either the night shift or the morning shift dropped the ball, after switching to 3 tables I came to the conclusion that none were clean. We asked that one be wiped down and a worker came fairly quickly to honor our request.We were promptly greeted upon Entering , the workers were Friendly, and accommodating. Food was prepared fresh and delivered quickly. Unlike the tables,The bathrooms were clean. (always a bonus in a fast food place).I really like the history on the walls of this particular location and it has a very nice unique play area for children. Recommended.

I challenge the store management to reply to this post. If they do, it will signal that they do care and know that they have major problems. Otherwise, this may be the first store in LA to close.My ReviewI was excited - like all of the reviews - to see this open in our area. Its a little bit of a drive, but it is closer than the sunset store (see you soon Sunset). The store is highly disorganized. FOH management is invisible. The management would do well to visit the Pasadena store. I have visited the store 9 times. With each visit, there was something wrong with my order. The offenses ranged from lying that the fries were crispy (cold and floopy) to missing sandwich to cold sandwich. I accepted each with a nod to the "Just Opened" god. Tonight, I stopped by for two cookies and a Sweet Tea. The counter person asked my name and asked "Dine-in or Carry-Out". I responded and then ordered. He typed for several moments, I handed him my money, he took it and then said, "What would you like". I had stood there for one minute for him to type a seven-letter name and select the "TOGO" button.Ten minutes later, I'm home, reading a book and excited for the cookie. The cookies are DAY OLD. There is no chew or softness to them.

This shit is trash messed up my order I asked them to fix it, I spent 30 min waiting for them to remake my order and they weren't busy. I asked for a refund made me wait another 15 min to even start my refund
Food wasn't piping hot it was ok the bbq sauce was great good service got my food quick I think to quickly it got cold as it was flying to my table hopefully next time food is hot.

So I ordered a regular deluxe combo and I also ordered an 8pc nuggets and when I got home I checked if I have all of my food and I was missing the 8pc nuggets and I paid $4.00 dollars for nothing.....

The service I received from Jorge at this Chick-fil-A was outstanding. He recommended the grilled chicken sandwich with Chick-fil-A sauce which I had never tried before and it was delicious. When I think of Chick-fil-A, I think of Jorge. This employee goes above and beyond, you should definitely commend him for his customer service skills
Fantastic service. They handed my food in the dining with little waiting time . Very clean environment and keep up the great work

The food is good but they made me wait 35+ minutes this morning just to mess up my order. The manager didn't even speak to me or apologize. I got a refund but waiting that long for no food is ridiculous.
Waited 30 min for them to tell me are teenagers messed up and gave me my money back lol save ur time this place is a circus

I was so happy about this location because it was near my house. I've been going at least three times a week with my kids since it opened.i placed an order in the drive thru. I ordered three spicy deluxe meals that included fries with all three plus Mac and cheese. and  when I got home a lot of the food was missing. the fries were missing and the Mac and cheese and the ketchup that I ordered.I recommend people to check their food orders for now on because it's truly disappointing when you arrive home, driving through the traffic in Western and  Santa Monica and to go back takes a long of time. And there's a lot of good customer service but they really need to work on this.
This place is great. Service is fantastic and very helpful. Location gets very busy and loud. Would recommend doing mobile order or being patient bc the line can get long.
Welcome to the neighborhood!!! Love the food and service, thank you for staffing extra to get the orders out fast!!! Will be back for more for sure!

This chick fil a is an absolute joke. From how stupid they are taking orders in the drive through to how clueless they are when giving out the orders! They pay absolutely no attention to the orders and always give the wrong  food to the wrong guests. This is the worst  chick  fil a. Do not go to this location if you're used to good service at other stores.

Chick-Fil-A is blessed by Jesus that is why they close on Sunday. We were driving to the location in heart of Hollywood on Vine/Sunset. This location is closer to the city. I went through the drive-thru at 10:45 am, they switched from breakfast to lunch menu and they gave me hashbrown from for free. Winning! The workers really are nice to the customers! They get five stars!
I've visited this location 3 times now, and they consistently have the best service I've ever had in California. Very friendly people, always good food. I love it.
I love it, satisfaction guaranteed, customer service is excellent, even got a free biscuit, thank you chick Fila a

These guys are so polite it's scary. Obviously the only thing that matters is the quality of the food and it delivers per usual. Can't complain about the exceptional service as well. Thumbs up on the location.
Sauce sticklers.You know how much is enough when you put too little in. Shame on you. Jesus would be pissed

As happy as I am to have the new location opened, it does not fit with the typical chic fil a business etiquette. The drive thru lines are incredibly slow. The staff hover around 3-4 people at the window chatting....when they should they be doing like every other location and getting the line moving faster. Also have to mention the carbonation of the sodas are really bad. Its like drinking a watered down and flat coke. Hope this location improves soon or it was a failure to open this site in my opinion!
This location just opened and is in my daily route to work and back home.  Service was great, staff was beyond friendly and of course clean.  I will be back!!

Love chick-fil-a , so I was thrilled to hear a new location had opened up on western Blvd . The team was polite , pleasant , and just seemed happy to be there . Despite the 55 degree weather outside  I was provided with stellar and genuine humble service . As far As my food goes ... it was great as expected.

I am super excited with this new location on western since this place is pretty close from my house. I ordered a delux spicy chicken combo. All the staffs are still in the training. The guy who took my order on the drive through was nice. My order was ready pretty quickly. The sandwich was super good. The only thing that disappointed me was the fries. It tasted like it was steamed not fried.  All I wish for yhe next time is the crispy fries.:-)

Although I can't deny their spicy chicken Sandwich tastes like heaven and the service is excellent! I am very disappointed by the way, I believe was the manager handle an issue with a person that was asking for food to the people that were waiting in the drive thru for their orders. In fact I was one of those people waiting for their orders. The person that was asking for food was very respectful and kind( and I'm not saying it was safe for him to be there either) and unfortunately I couldn't buy anything for him because I was already passed long ago from where orders were taken. The manager which I believe he was, he told him to get out of there  that this was his store in a very humiliating and arrogant way. I do understand the issue of homeless we have going on all over the city but we can't be heartless when someone is hungry. I'm very happy the Chick-Fil-A came to our community and I will not let one issue to ruin the fact that many of us were waiting  for this business to come this way but definitely as member of this community I will ask kindly to the manager to be more kind. There are always ways in how to approach people. Remember we are all Christians and having a little of kindness in your heart will not destroyed the business. I could give you a 5 for the food but I will give you a 3 because I believe it is very important that business from our community care. (By the way, this happened on Friday around 6:30 p.m.)... thank you!

This location has only been open for 3 days but it looks like the Chick-fil-a model is working just fine here. We were promptly greeted by one of three team members ready to take our our order. And since we opted to dine in, we made our way to  one of the many booths available. During the course of our meal one of the employees came by to check on us and offered to refill our drinks. All in all this is going to be my go to location since it has ample parking compared to the Sunset location and a plenty of seating inside the restaurant.

Went here earlier. Today was first day of this chic fila location and my first time trying their chicken sandwich. The sandwich definitely lived up to the hype. Will be coming here again soon so expect many review updates from me lol.
This place is not open yet ! Don't be fooled with the first review. I don't know what his talking about maybe he meant it for another location
Best chicken sandwiches and breakfast sandwiches anywhere. I love their salads too. And their Chick-fil-A Sauce is so good, I wanna drink it from a glass! -- They are not open on Sundays.
comment

I wish I could give this place zero stars. The staff  at United Mix are pleasant but this Chik Fil A is literally the slowest and most inaccurate that I have ever experienced. I literally have to order 45 mins in advance and usually when I arrive the order is missing items so I still have to wait. I would advise you to order elsewhere unless you have a ton of time to waste.

The rest of these reviews say it all.I've done a take-out order from them and it's taken well over 35 minutes just for an order. And then get this, I ordered a spicy deluxe meal and once it was delivered, what I received was a regular spicy chicken sandwich, not what I paid for and ordered.It's definitely worth it to go down the street to the Water Tower location--save yourself from this terrible location.
I've ordered Uber eats from this place a few times. It takes over an hour each time. This place stinks.

I wish I could give this place zero stars. It takes a minimum of 20 minutes to get my order. I despise coming here. If it wasn't next door to my house, I would never ever come back to this location. Not at all up to Chick-fil-A standard. So disappointed. Go to Chicago and Wabash to the other location if your expecting the normal service. Last visit, my order was drenched in coke after waiting 25+ minutes. The food is either cold or old.

This location is an embarrassment to normal chick fil a standards.  Service is cold, slow, and frustrating.  I understand that it's not a true chick fil a restaurant...but then open up the full menu at the E. Chicago location!

Do not go here!!!  There are many other Chick Fil a locations who all offer wonderful food and service. This is not one of them. Ordered a simple delivery from here (2 sandwich meals). Food arrived ok (cold) but that wasn't the issue - they forgot all the sauces. So accidents happen okay but when I called to ask what can be done I was first passed around to 4 employees who all said they were the manager (??) and then told that since the order is through an app they won't help or do anything at all about it. So that was a nice 30 dollars down the drain courtesy of these geniuses. Save your money for another chick fil a

This is the worst "Chick-Fil-A" on planet earth. It is a ghost kitchen location which would make me think it's more efficient or faster, but no. Do not ever order from this location unless you're getting it through Door Dash, Uber Eats, etc. Terrible service when my order was cancelled without my knowledge, I will never go to this location again.

I ordered delivery from this location. The delivery was faster than expected, and not the problem. The food order on the other hand: extremely disappointing, subpar, incorrect, and cold, which is baffling and quite frankly suspicious, considering how quickly it arrived. It makes me wonder if I was given old food that had been sitting out. Gross. The chicken sandwich was supposed to have cheese. Nope. It was also cold, and the bun was soggy/disintegrating as if the chicken had been sweating on it for a while. The fries were ice cold, with no sign of warmth whatsoever.  I might as well have taken them straight out of the fridge to reheat. The side salad came without the dressing. The chicken strips were also cold, along with shriveled and rubbery. There is no chance these hadn't been sitting out for quite a while. They did not look like they had been made anytime in the last 8 hours.  I ordered a lemonade. Would this be the saving grace?  Nope. Somehow I was given a blue powerade (??? Aside from both drinks ending in ade, how does this get confused?) The main reason I even ordered from here was for the lemonade, and now I am really wishing I had ordered elsewhere. I have cold, questionable food, and the one item that I do feel comfortable eating without fear of food poisoning is the side salad, that came sans the side of dressing I ordered. I have ordered delivery from Chick Fil A in the past, and it was a good experience, which makes this all the more disappointing. I will say that the side sauces I ordered were all there, and that is why I am giving it 2 stars instead of 1.
The drive though staff is slow compared to all over chick-fil-a's I have been too & I tried to give them another try...PLEASE GET IT TOGETHER!

My 1st trying this Location and I was highly disappointing I was really hoping the service & food was the same like all the others I've been to. I was there for lunch n ordered a #1 chicken biscuits I ask for it grilled and she said they can't make it grill so I had to get a grill egg white instead with chicken minis When I got my food the bread was hard as a rock n the muffin the bread tasted old. I would never go back there! So please check your foos before leaving there's

LISTEN TO THIS!!! The new scam at this location will only let you buy 8 chicken nuggets, not 6. The team members at the counter said we can only ring up an 8 count even if we only put in 6 nuggets. Remember, this location is the WORST one in the chain. The orders are wrong often and and the owner of this location is invisible. Allow plenty of time for a visit here. How LAME is that? "We can only ring up an 8 count of nuggets".  No one is flying the plane here!

Headquarters should come down and remove their sign, worst chick-fil-A i have eaten. The only good part no one was in the line, I didnt have to wait 30 minutes to an hour like I do in other CFA. The reason more likely is how awful the food was, do they purchase the chicken somewhere else or may use old oil unknown, but one thing I know that Spicy Chicken was not as the one I usually eat. Fries were good just for that they got two stars. Workers were friendly and pleasant.

This place holds up all the standards that I have grown to love about Chick-fil-A. The service, the food, heck even the customers. It hard not to be happy when biting into a delicious sandwich. I stop in the morning when getting off the Metra and before heading to work. Yum!!

This is a weird place - wouldn't order pick up from here. Have done delivery and it has worked out fine but the pick up took forever. It's not a chick-fil-a, it's "humboldt park eatery" that's essentially a pick up space that looks like a store front, with lockers, tablets to order, and a vending machine. My order took at least ten minutes from when I clicked "I'm here" on the online order that I placed. I guess it might be good if you want multiple restaurants for pick up? But I'm general it's a really weird vibe and shouldn't really be labeled as a chick-fil-a.
They always seem to forget something or miss something. Trust me its good but I can't get my order completely.
Don't order from here they take super long and looks like it's 1 employee making The food. And it's not just Chick-fil-A it's little Ceasers and other restaurant orders that get picked up here.

My family was excited to see a Chick fil A opening close to our home! We couldn't believe it, so we called to confirm the address.  Well, the person who answered the call was pleasant as expected for CFA. When we arrived at this location signage was minimum and the lighting was not bright. It was an "eatery" and really lowers the image CFA. The lady that greeted me was nice but then a gentleman took over who seemed nice and asked me to wait outside and I will be texted when my order was ready. 30 minutes later I went back in and asked again about my order, he proceeded to explain how to scan to check in, he forgot we had already met and that I was already checked in. He found my order on a shelf and handed it to me. Well, the food was warm, and I was at the location for an hour. Well, not coming back here. If you order delivery through Door Dash or Uber Eats maybe you'll overlook the temperature of your food. Me and my family will wait for the new Elston location to open.

Bald Caucasian manager is extremely unprofessional and racist. Kicked us out in the cold because someone had a bag from another restaurant. I clearly showed him my Chick-fil-a food I ordered along with the receipt, however he then began to talk back and kick us out. Definitely held Chick-fil-a to a higher standard than that.
usually don't have any issues here but did today. person that seemed to be the manager was a tad rude and my fries were super cold. why are we wasting paper to have a bag for sauces??

The place is great! It's busy all the time so there is a little waiting but the line moves quick. My food was warm and my milkshake was delicious and presentation wise was perfect! The place is clean and customer device is great!

So this is normally the Chick-fil-A that I go to. However today I was so disappointed in their service and how long it took to receive ONE order of chicken minis. I completed a mobile order because it's normally quicker. When I entered the establishment there were few customers in line so I should've been quick. Not one person greeted me, and as I waited for my food I noticed a bag on the counter. Because it was so small I knew it had to be mine. My issue is that no one called out the mobile order so I'm looking at my food just sitting on the counter getting cold. When she finally picked up the bag to run it out to the car I asked was it for me and she responded yes. I said to her " I have been looking at my food sitting on your counter for almost 5 minutes and ur telling me it's going to be hot and fresh" the employees response was " I honestly don't know"... mind you I worked a chick fil a Lombard location for 3 years. I'm so highly disappointed in this service provided to me today .... And if your wondering.. yes my food WAS COLD

Stopped in early thinking I'd get a chik biscuit sandwich, but didn't see them on menu, so I had the spicy chicken sandwich instead. It was GOOD and it's soooooo nice to be able to sit inside and eat!!!! Hmmmm.....yummy.

Where else would you find top-notch food all over the town? Just look for the nearest Chick-fil-a and grab some of their delicious meal. They have the most delicious dishes served with a good display that would make your mouth crave a bite. From my experience, the food they serve was superb. The people who work there are polite and professional in handling your food. They ensure that you get what you paid for. Moreover, they have a properly organized table arrangement guaranteeing that social distancing is meet. The food could not be even better with a price that is fair in portion size. Extraordinary food presentation, the whole experience from start to finish is overall magnificent. Eating to satisfy your hunger is not the only goal of this restaurant. They have prepared food that is worthy of a 5-star rating. This restaurant is magnificent, the place is clean, it smells good, lots of friendly folks around, and a perfect place to hang out.  Try for yourself and experience their food and prove for yourself what chick-fil-a can offer the best food you have.

I like the food at Chick-fil-A so today I went in for some. There was a small line and since I was in a hurry I went to the bathroom before I ordered. Well I asked for the key code to the door and was told I couldn't use the bathroom until I made my purchase. So I walked out instead. Nice rule, Chick-fil-A.

I have had food from here multiple times. Generally this is a great spot. However at times I have been disappointed with my fries! Waffle fries are best when hot and fresh but I have had stale fries before. But that's not to give them any less credit for the great job this branch does. Everything here is great. I also get many offers time to time via emails and they do good job in keeping loyal customers engaged.It's my go to location and will definitely keep going there! Just keep your fries fresh! Had grill chicken nuggets and fries on my most recent order. Everything was delicious! Thanks team!
Great service did curb side pick up and they were super quick. Happy customer service and they always get your order right. No long wait time they work fast!

Loved the food. But then I totally forgot that chic-fil-a is a company that is anti-LGBTQ. One day I was waiting for my food and wanted to wash my hands. The woman's bathroom was closed for cleaning so I decided to use the men's to quickly wash my hands. Obviously you need a code for the bathroom which was on my receipt. The security wasted no time following me in the bathroom aggressively telling me I'm not allowed to be in the men's bathroom. I tried to explain I was only washing my hands but he ignored me and continued to yell. I later asked a worker and she said I was not allowed to be in the men's bathroom, but the way she spoke she had brushed me off in a rude way. I understand I was in the wrong for thinking I could use the men's bathroom to wash my hands, I understand that now. But I just really don't appreciate getting yelled at and especially being followed into the bathroom by man who's suppose to keep everyone. "Safe".

Fast and always friendly service! No dine in or patio though. They also have a worker outside to minimize contact inside the restaurant. They bring it out to you in a tray! I have to say that the woman working at the far right register this afternoon handled two annoyed customers nicely today! This location ran out of a lot of grilled items. The two customers didn't see this on the big menu. First Lady was nice. Then the guy with the earbuds was so annoyed with the no grilled options. He was basically asking why and walked away rudely. She handled that like a pro and a smile! Great staff

This chick fil A has some long lines but they go down instantly. The servers are always nice and ask why you're waiting if you're waiting. The food is hot when i get it and they match sure you have everything you ordered in the bag. Some places completely mess up your order during rush hour which is annoying but this place doesn't. This is my favorite chick fil A.

Service is great there, never had a problem with getting my food in a timely matter. Only issue is sometimes the food isn't as hot as I'd like it to be but overall pretty decent outlet and there's a lot of seats if you aren't there during peak periods

One of the most dangerous restaurants in Chicago.  Beside the expensive food,in a 30-minute visit, I saw:A person threaten to kill two staffers when they asked him not to loiter.A presumably homeless person pee on the floor in the corner.Cops come in looking for someoneAn angry customer threw food at the counter and stomped off.Chick-fil-NO!

The nuggets were good. They actually taste like chicken and the app ordering process is pretty cool. You scan the table and they bring you the food. And they don't start making the food until you get there so the food is always fresh. The service was really good.
You have to walk through a ton of homeless people to get there. the bread was stale and so the bun fell apart. The sandwich was a big piece of lettuce overwhelming it inside. No thanks.

Yes Indeed! They have MASTERED the art of "The Original" Chicken Sandwich!Artisan BunPerfectly Breaded ChickenThick, Juicy and Tender Portion of Chickenand let's not forget the PICKLES!ATTENTION YELPERS:Unfortunately the "check in" complimentary Chocolate Chip Cookie is NO LONGER AVAILABLE as they no longer have "a contract with Yelp" according to the Manager Kyle who I spoke to regarding this matter-BUMMER!What I like:1. Chicken Sandwich is nicely packed in an insulated package so that it will sustain the Chicago Winter Weather when you get it "to go!"2.  You are a NAME and NOT A NUMBER-when your order is ready.3. This place is CROWDED but the food is consistent and the service is exceptional-there is often a long line-but it moves quickly and even the Manager Kyle was on the register ringing up guests with a smile and sincere demeanor.4.  THE FOOD IS HIGH QUALITY.  IT WILL NOT DISAPPOINT!SUGGESTION:Please offer guests the ability to order a "side" of pickles!???

Super helpful and friendly staff at this location. The cashier at the front even accepted my free sandwich coupon despite the fact that it had expired the day before! Lines here can be extremely long since it's in the Loyola University area but the staff here manage the rush quickly and effectively. There are plenty of seats and tables, so you can eat with a group or even by yourself without feeling awkward! This will be my go to Chick-fil-A!

Not bad for a chicken sandwich.  Restaurant was mad full busy because of the marathon week but the line is very quick.  Service is to a satisfaction.  Just the fries I didn't like much.  I guess I prefer the shoestring one.

So to start with-parking is next to impossible at this location.  I drove around for 20 minutes and still walked 3 blocks.  Why???  Because I LOVE chick fil A.  I had to pick up my friend from chemo at Northwestern, but knew she would love some chicken!!The line was ridiculously long at 2:20 in the afternoon- but it did move along.  So I get to finally order for only to find that all I had on me was a $100.00 bill.The cashier proceeds to tell me they don't accept large bills, and I should have noticed there is a sign regarding such on the doors walking in. UMMMM ok so guess I have to cancel my order, because it was all I had on me-no credit and no debit card on me.Well on my way out I did look for signs on the front doors and I NEVER saw a sign on the doors saying they do not accept cash nor a large bill.  Maybe it was on a side door?  Guess what?  You just lost this long time customer.  I seek out chick fil A restaurants wherever I go.  BUT - Can't accommodate cash?  This place was packed, I am sure you had change, and SHOULD have accommodated your customer!  Give me a break.You get a bad rap as a fast food restaurant for many things, and now here is another situation where clearly customer service is NOT your priority.BYE

Dear Chick-fil-A... I just went to Portillo's not too far from your location and they had a croissant chicken sandwich! It was amazing, but I have to say your still the best chicken fast food restaurant ever. So please step up your game and come up with a chicken croissant sandwich that would top Portillo's!!!!

I'm going to begin by saying - our prayers have been answered...first Chick-fil-A in Canada as of September 2019.But back to topic, had to visit during my trip last month and got me the spicy chicken, waffle fries and an iced tea. The service here is just amazing. They have a wide selection of sauces. I'm so in love.

The line practically was out the door at this establishment but it was worth the wait! I ordered two of their Cobb salads ($9.00) which didn't surprise me! Delicious and plenty!!! I highly recommend! Prices are a little steep but you get your money's worth!!

This CFA is always busy! They do an amazing job keeping the dining area clean and they are incredibly fast getting the food out. I wish they did table delivery like other CFAs but understand it's hard with the volume they have.

Some call it delicious, others call it heaven on a bun. I just refer to it as the body of Christ. I have been blessed to have this location just blocks from my house and I don't visit it often enough. You can't go wrong at chick-fil-a. How could anyone possibly give this anything less than 5 stars? That I do not know. The chicken always perfectly cooked to a crisp, the buns warm and buttered and the unending selection of dipping sauces. What else could you ask for? Everything on the menu is tasty as hell. The service is the best in the land. Doesn't matter where you are on this god forsaken planet those two things you can always rely on. Good food and good service can always be found at chick-fil-a.

Chick-fil-A is on the top of fast food companies that I admire.  This location always seems busy, but long line moved quickly and staff makes you feel genuinely appreciated.  Chicken sandwiches are simple, but the honey BBQ (honey mustard) makes the sandwich go from basic to bomb in seconds.  Unlike McDonald's, nuggets actually has the texture of chicken meat.  I really enjoy the soft serve ice cream cone for dessert.

Hey I ordered spicy deluxe sandwich and two medium fries for take out just a hour ago and look how crappy this is. Just a bread and pickles. I would like a full refund on my purchase on this please. How disappointing it is!

This was the first chick fil a i've been to with such bad customer service. Workers are very disrespectful to customers. I was told by the security guard who was in front of me to fill the cup then was rudely yelled at by worker after explaining he told me to use the machine because the other ones were off he began to get more rude and loud then began making rude comments and making fun of me to fellow workers. Very upset after this experience.

Ms. Patricia who waited on me was very rude.  I had redeemed my chicken sandwich already in the scanner, it should have told her I was redeeming this sandwich.  She snapped at me when I used the scanner saying, "you have to tell me what it is" and then she said, "nothing comes up."  It was the way she said it!  Then I asked for the manager, I told him what happened.  When I scanned it again for him, he immediately saw that the sandwich was on my scanner.  Why didn't Ms. Patricia see it?  Was she perhaps incompetent?

Not going back here until you can grab your own ketchup like at pretty much every other fast food place. I clearly asked the cashier for both ketchup and buffalo sauce, received neither. I told an employee who walked by me, and she just said to go to a cashier and ask. Uhh... it's really busy in there, people might think I'm cutting the line and get pissed at me, plus I would've had to gather up my coat and bag while my food is getting cold or risk theft. Great food but no thanks on the rest of the experience.

Manager and owner are racist and rude. People of color should not eat here. I spent over $40 dollars for dinner for me and my mother at this location one night. The manager was rude and racist. I was told by Chick Fil A  corporate to contact the owner/operator. She was just as rude and racist. Chick- Fil- A corporate was useless and could only say sorry. I have not eaten at a Chick- Fil -A since that day. I will keep my money. The food is salty anyway and full of preservatives. I bloat and swell up every time I eat at Chick Fil A. Beware people of color, do not eat at this location.

Worst customer service when catering an order. Ryn S  ( she wouldn't give her name) until Someone named Mari  tried to help. I let her know i always order from northwest suburbs and Bob is super nice and very accommodating . Ryn was rude and got the spelling, phone number, address  and email WRONG. SHE Said she was going to send me to the manager next to her named Diane. 5 minutes later a woman ( not Diane) Mari gets on phone and says she can't take my order because they can't make a market salad for a catering?! How about you accommodate a catering order. She gave me different prices multiple times and i decided to cancel the order. I wished Mari and Ryn were like Bob from Schaumburg Chick Fil A. My family owns a restaurant and I never was treated so rudely on the phone and with such incompetent behavior.

I didn't love my experience here but it wasn't an awful place either. I was disappointed that this wasn't a drive thru. But parking was easy to find - although we are supposed to pay for it. ;) My food was fast and delicious and the cashier was "ok". She wasn't really friendly but she wasn't mean either. #KanyeShrugIf I'm walking around in the city (in this area), I would come back but if I'm driving - I'd try to find some place where I can just drive thru. (I have learned that you can use curbside, per the reviews. So I'll be sure to use that in the future!)Also, the inside of the location looked really nice to hang out and eat in. It was a bit busy - but it was lunch time - so that's expected.

This was my first curbside pick up order experience. Let me preface by stating how excited I was to get a serving of Chick Fil A. After moving to bfe California, where the nearest Chick Fil A is like 40 mins away, I was looking forward to this meal. It'd been so long that all of my rewards had expired on the app. Sadness, I know. First, there is no designated Chick Fil A curbside parking outside the store so you literally have to just block traffic. Second, I didn't request that my order be started until I arrived yet EVERY item arrived lukewarm, fries HALF full (both orders upgraded to a large and we could fit both of our fry orders into one fry holder), and sandwich bread was soggy.
