I normally do not have any issues with this location.  Lately, I have been missing items from my order.  It is also so crowded that there is nowhere to stop and check your order before leaving the store.  I now realize that I will have to stop, put my bag on the counter, interrupt anyone taking orders to make sure my order has been correctly filled.

I absolutely love chick fil a and have been to this location multiple times and never had a negative experience but the guy taking my order in the drive through line was by far the rudest person ever and so unpleasant. He was rushing me and wouldn't let me finish my order.. kept cutting me off and trying to give me my total when I wasn't even done ordering. I never leave bad reviews but this was by far the worst experience I've had if not the only at chick fil a.

They usually have really excellent service and everyone is super nice, which is 5 stars. Today, I ordered on the app, picked up in drive thru. They forgot my fork for my side and sauces for my nuggets, and the guy in the drive through called me Sir for some reason.

Worse service ever. The manager Ashley was not pleasant. I wanted help with my carry out order. Mind you I had been driving for 10 mins trying to get parking. She disregarded me and just said you'll have to wait. My order was on the counter in front of her. I just grabbed it and left.
They forgot my two brownies . But I come here all the time though and have never had a bad experience, great place, clean, fast, and organized. Will come back.

Unfortunately this is my nearest location but is easily the worst Chick-fil-A in Houston. The drive through employees are wholly incompetent, slow, and do not seem capable of understanding simple orders. If possible, go to a different, better-staffed location.

Love this chick fil a!!! I moved to CA and legit it's not the same. The staff here is amazing shout out to David and Jeff! Best CFA managers I have ever meet. I have written to corporate about them before. Because when you think of an amazing CFA experience this is the location it's modeled after.

If you get in the slow takeout lane, forget ALL of your plans. There is NO way to exit and go inside after you are in the lane - you're stuck until however long it takes to get your order and 10 card in front of you. You're literally a hostage! I don't know how this is okay in the case of emergency.
Great place for a quick bite to eat at lunch or dinner, but the wait is ridiculous at times.

I love this location! I stop here about once a week in the morning for a grilled chicken biscuit (YUM) and an original iced coffee (2 pumps). I now order through the app so I don't forget to scan for points and usually run in instead of waiting in the line. The drive thru always runs fast, but I like to go in and grab a little extra ketchup if you know what I mean! Great location, clean, friendly workers and consistently good food. What more can you ask for from a "fast food" restaurant?

Typical Chick-fil-A goodness here. Fast and friendly service ending with a "My Pleasure" Number One is my go to meal but they have chicken tortilla soup for a limited time in the winter- just what I need for this cold Houston nights!

This is your typical Chick-fil-A and I tend to come here as it's the closest one to my job that has a drive-thru. The only thing I dislike about this location is that their lemonades are routinely less than good. Someone isn't following the sugar guidelines, so I won't come to this one on days where lemonades are a must-have!

Great for the value. Always friendly service. Consistently good chicken for the price. Nice service to bring to your table. Clean ambience I would come here for fast food again Food - 5/5 for the price point for chicken Service - 5/5 for the friendly and helpful staff Ambience - 5/5 clean and friendly
Probably the fastest chick fil a I've ever been to and is very nice. The employees are greeting and work at a quick pace. Never had any issues with this location and i will continue to go .

Im not one to complain because Ive managed for fast food restaurant so I've been there but I Felt rushed while ordering when I got my food the Chicken patty was very thin mostly breading asked for large fry. box wasn't even filled to the top and why bother asking for sauces if I'm not going to get them the guy at the window even confirmed if all I wanted was ketchup and ranch left got home and only one ketchup packet was in the bag and no ranch either.

They contacted me immediately about my review. They requested that my friend get in touch with them as they were very concerned. They have floor hostess on site to deal with any issue or concern by customers. My friend is shy and one not to address it. Even her grown children encouraged her to tell them! I'm not sure if she reached out to them as they requested. She is not computer savvy. The restaurant was great with their response to my review. Thanks Chick A!!

I am a HUGE fan of Chick-fil-A. I visit this location quite a few times. The food is always hot and fresh. And Chick-fil-A always prides themselves of excellent customer service. Today I went back up to order a bag of fresh chocolate chip cookies. They normally melt in your mouth. I asked the cashier if the cookies were made fresh from today. She said we make them fresh daily. Ok great. I buy a bag, go sit dow and take a bite out of the cookie. It was hard and tasted old. I looked at the bottom of the bag, it has a sticker of when they were cooked. It's said 10/23, well today is 10/24. Everyone up front looked at me in surprise, like they had no idea there was a sticker on the bottom of the bag and that they were not made fresh daily. This Chick-fil-A definitely needs to train their front team. And you never argue with the customer especially that they are made fresh the day of, if the sticker says different. I was a little disappointed with this customer service here at this location..

This is the best Chick-fil-A I've ever been to. They are fast, consistent, and friendly. Never had an issue with my order being wrong. In fact, I don't even bother to look in my bag when I leave the drive-thru because it's always correct. The manager here is doing something right because the employees are helpful and happy to be there and service is fast. That's not an easy task considering how busy they get during the lunch rush.

This location's drive through is too slow and makes too many mistakes.  Today we were shorted an order of strips and were also given a different type of salad than ordered.  We will be visiting the location on 610 instead until it seems like this location has improved.

I frequent this location often because its my halfway point home. This location has alway got my order correct and service has been swift. I have nothing bad to say about this location. Good franchise, right in the heart of Htown!

This was such a high quality Chick-fil-A. There was almost no wait time for my order. It amazed me that the trash cans were motion sensored and that they had mouth wash in the bathrooms. This was perfect for me as I was on a road trip at this time and I hadn't brushed my teeth. You could tell that the staff worked very efficiently since they responded very quickly to the customers needs.

I'm usually not one to get excited about writing a fast food chain review, but since I have had nothing but exceptional experiences at this Chick-fil-a location, I felt like I had to give them some love.  So, shout out to an absolutely A+ worker, Leo, who is friendly, efficient, and made me laugh so much that I'm pretty sure we could be best friends. They also have the double-line drive thru, which is fast and convenient at any time of day.  Plus, they are constantly running promotions like free breakfast Wednesdays, so the email club is 100% worth joining.  Additionally, they have family-oriented events like princess night about once every couple of months.
So I placed a mobile order and drive 20 minutes to chick fila only for them to tell me their machine is not working. All the had to do was cancel my order and save my time.

This location has gone down hill. This is the second time I've been in the last two weeks and they have failed to get my order correct both times. This last time resulting in us not even getting the sandwich to our meal and them getting our shake flavor wrong. Then we asked for 8 condiments for 3 entree's and they told us we could only have 2 per meal and purchase an 8oz tub. Well they gave us the one we purchased, but none of our "free" ones. Once We got home and realized our sandwich was missing, I then called and spoke with manager David. All he offered me was a free #1, which I had already paid for and didn't get. Thoroughly disappointed with this chick fil a.

This is now the third time they have screwed up an order. My entire chicken sandwich from the #1 meal is missing. We had to pay for additional poly sauce and received none from the original order. Approx two weeks ago we received one sauce when requesting four. Not sure why this location has issues.

Won't serve breakfast if it's 10:30. Like the breakfast food magically disappears as soon as the clock changes. If I didn't have to drive around the stupid unneeded cones and circle the building for no reason I'm sure I could have gotten there before the magic timer.

My favorite time is breakfast time at Chik fil A. Make sure to download the app as you can get free treats every number of times you come in. They always have long lines on weekdays, but you can order through the app and get your stuff by the time you get there. This place is always clean, quick and the staff is so sweet.
The food was fresh and the customer service was superb!!! I wish all fast food companies used Chick-Fli-A protocol!!! My pleasure :)

Used to stop here regularly. I ordered breakfast on Monday and this was my "hashbrown" order. Really it was just a waste of a box, what was the point? Just double check your order before you drive off!
What can go wrong with Chick-Fil-A? Great service, awesome attitude, friendly environment!

Every Wednesday a free breakfast item is available! Every Monday, this particular location has a Mobile Monday promotion if you order using the app.  Who doesn't love a promotion?!?I am a sucker for promotional freebies so I try to make it to this location at least once a week.  CFA is a solid simple lunch or breakfast option.  The staff are always prompt, courteous and cheerful.  I respect their corporate policy of closing on Sundays and (though I disagree with their stance on same-sex marriage) feel that this particular location enjoys one of the best owner/management teams of any of the CFA across Greater Houston.  I say that because the location is perfectly maintained and even at their busiest, they provide excellent service & value.

Do you hate getting excited about chick fil a then realizing they didn't give you any of the dipping sauces you asked for? THEN DON'T GO HERE. Has happened the last two times I went here and I won't be going back. Canes is right down the road and they always give me Cane's sauce.
Horrible parking Horrible traffic NEED A BETTER SYSTEM bc that drive thru ain't it Just horrible
Super fast! Friendly staff!! Fantastic every time. Love the strips! And the bagel breakfast sandwich!!

Every time I go they forget a sauce. I know at this point I should check but you know...faith. Well I've had it. I just wanted Chick-fil-A sauce for my sandwich and I received everything but Chick-fil-A sauce. When I got home, it was waaaay to far to go back just for a packet because...rush hour. I'm done with the location.

Hands down, the best location in Houston.  I will happily drive out of my way just to come here.  The food is always fresh and the service is unmatched.  Please share your secret with the other subpar Chick-fil-A locations!
You can't go wrong with Chick-fil-a EVER! Friendly staff, very attentive, clean restaurant, hot food served in a timely manner.
Best chick fil a in houston! Staff is great here, it's great seeing people happy at work.
Tell those douchebags at Corporate if they take the chicken salad sandwich off the menu they're morons!Other than that, great service and awesome employees!

You can never really go wrong with Chick-fil-A, but I especially love this specific Chick-fil-A location because:1. Mobile Mondays where they'll throw in a different free menu item for mobile orders2. They host fun events like bingo and a petting zoo (You're never too old for either)3. Impeccable service - the staff here is always super sweet and helpful.Will continue to Eat More Chikin here.
Waited over ten minutes in the drive through lane but my food was never brought out.  I had to park, go inside and reorder my food.  What is the point of fast food if it takes 20 minutes....
The employees are excellent. Always so polite. "My pleasure". There's a girl named Alyssa and she greeted me with a big smile when she took my order  she's the best I've had at a Chick-fil-A.

This is one of the best Chick-fil-A's, the stores are always great, they have great training, good personnel, clean atmosphere. You'll never find this at other fast foods. Food is consistently good and very friendly staff. They are honestly better than most sit down establishments.

why this place gets such good reviews is beyond me. people say they are consistent. yes consistently bad service. The only time they get my order right in the drive through is when they are standing in the line taking orders and not through the speaker.When trying to correct it at the window the spanish lady cant understand you enough to fix it.Their drive through line can be VERY slow at times.they also let homeless people sit out on the patio so you can get hit up going in or out for money or food.

Worst service I ever had at CFA. Every-time I go there they fuck up my order no matter how much I have to yell at the freakin intercom. They clearly don't know what grill chicken looks like because I always end up with fried. This happens multiples times they are so lazy, if they can't do that one job it's obvious you should go somewhere else. I highly recommend other choices listed. They have Panda Express, la Madeline, KFC, and chilis around the area choose one of those if you want the correct order. #overit #ByeFelicia

Worst service at a CFA I have ever experienced. It was slow and 5:30 on a Saturday evening, the only line was in the drive thru. Ordered a couple kids meals and something for myself to dine in. Guy who took my order was friendly enough, though not to the extent I have come to expect from CFA. When my food came to the table I noticed we didn't have the French fries for both kids meals. I waited figuring it was coming and when it didn't went back to the place where I had ordered to ask about the fries. The two employees who addressed me asked if my fries were on the tray. When I said no and that's why I was asking, they insisted on going to my table to look. Which I thought was odd since I had ordered with one of them less than 4 minutes before. When they saw no fries on my table - then they wanted to see my receipt. I guess french fry theft by moms with two small children is the norm here. So I go back to my already inspected, no french fry table and find my receipt. When I walk back to the counter they snatch it from my hand and disappear into the food prep area behind the counter, reappearing 2 minutes later and literally tossing a bag at me across the counter with 2 small fries. Never an apology or even a shrug of the shoulders. I was treated like a criminal trying to thieve fries. We love CFA (hello mom life) but will not be back here. There are many better, kinder and more welcoming places to grab a quick dinner.

Love this place. In my field of work I travel all around Houston and this location is by far the best location I've been to and I'm grateful to God that is close to my house. Very fast great customer service especially in drive through; never had bad order there. When they rarely make a mistake; very professional with making it right. Thank you for your great service. I just wish you open a little bit earlier because I'm up at 5 in the morning heading to work m-f. Retrospect I love this place THANK YOU ALL for the great work
Best service and the staff are always so friendly. Love coming and getting breakfast and lunch here.

After already getting in the drive through line during lunch rush I realized my wallet was missing. I couldn't move and was blocked in. I told the employee I was sorry but I was just going to pull through and not order bc I had no wallet and to my surprise he asked me what I was going to order. I said "just a sandwich" to which he replied "alright no problem." They just gave me a sandwich! Made my day.  I come here for lunch and 9/10 times it's fast even with the long line. Very friendly staff and super convenient. Yay! Kuddos!

The best Chick-Fil-A , super friendly staff, clean excellent service ! Manager is awesome keep giving friendly remarks to his employees and keeping eye on restaurant and customers ! Congratulations you guys are a model store!

This is our favorite cfa. They have some of the best employees here! Jeffery & Yolonda are two of the best people that make sure you've got everything you need! Especially great and understanding with children. Love the atmosphere, love the balloon lady Ronda they have each week & how clean it always seems to be!
Great service nice and clean spot . It's gets busy in morning but what chic fila is not busy. All in all still good food and great service .

Excellent service and management. Was greeted and welcomed by a smiling cashier named Amanda.Overall excellent experience compared to any Chick-fil-A I have ever been to, even the Sugar Land location close to my residence. The manager or whoever the team member walking around the restaurant in the black shirt was, made the dining experience very pleasant. Actually his name is Jeffrey. Place was very busy. Dined here at 6pm 07/27/2016 with my two young daughters.

This is one of the best Chick-Fil-A restaurants I've ever been to. Staff is super friendly, the whole place is clean and many tables to sit down and eat. I received my food very quickly and it was still hot! I came in here for lunch on a busy Friday and I was served less than a minute of me walking in. The parking lot attendant directing the customers where to drive was super helpful also. I love how Jeffrey (Tall white man with glasses) goes around and talks to each customer and greets us as if we are one of his friends. Best customer service hands down.

I've never had a problem with Chick-fil-A until today. I had the free treat and I wanted a grilled spicy chicken sandwich. The guy at the next register gave it to my bf but the cashier I had made a huge deal about it (her name was Kiyomy) and told me I had to pick either a regular spicy chicken sandwich or grilled chicken sandwich. She even made the other cashier helping my bf change his order! My bf says this particular location tends to have the most issues. He's never had trouble anywhere else.
Great food. Great people. I recommend a salad with grilled nuggets. Everyone was nice and friendly. Very helpful. Refilled my water. Fresh ground pepper for my salad.

Nto the best location I've been to.Been here several times and the cashier didn't have the typical happy to be here vibe. the biggest problem is they never get my sauces right. Really the sauces are everything lol

This Chick-fil-a has great service, host lots of family nights, and frequently gives away free breakfast or other items - love it!If you're getting a drink, definitely go for the lemonade or diet lemonade!  And the best breakfast item, in my opinion, are the chicken minis.
always great service! Gene remembered my name and I was highly impressed!!! Great friendly staff here!!

The service is always delightful by my goodness, there's something wrong with the chicken!! I just picked up a spicy chicken biscuit for breakfast. When I bit into it, it was terribly chewy and tough! Almost rubbery or woody. I had to spit it out- horrible texture! Chick-fil-a used have a tender juicy product, lately it's like trying to bite through shoe leather!
Not happy at all that they once again removed the spicy dressing from the houston market and replaced it with southwest dressing. It's not the same.
The best customer service I have ever received at a Chick-Fil-A. Great ample area to dine or just for a quick bite. Great service great employees and great food.

Just what you would expect from a Chick-fil-a ... friendly, clean, organized.  Good food and they came around several times while I hung out to use the free Wi-Fi to top off my drink and even offer free food when the switched from breakfast to lunch.

A great location off of i-10 to drop into if you get stuck on the highway and want some breakfast in the morning commute to downtown. The only issue is the way the drive through is set up.  Depending on which entrance you take, you might have to loop around, but I guess this is part of the process they know.  At the end of the day, just another great Chick-fil-A, can't get enough of the atmosphere, clean, fast, and tasty food!

Loved this place. Is it me or does it feel a bit fancy when you walk into Chick Fil A now days?! Lol. The food, like always, came out delectable and the service, like always, was very helpful and friendly.  Yesterday I lost faith in humanity thanks to Sonic's supposed 'Ultimate Chicken Sandwich' and to ALSO not getting any ketchup in my To-Go order! Today... Humanity in faith was restored thanks to my regular order. Number 4 Combo with a large lemonade at Chicken Heaven!! Two thumbs up Chick-Fil-A
Ok its fast food, we all know that but I'm addicted to chick file a and this is one of the fastest and nicest ones I've ever been to. Their efficiency should be studied and taught as an art! ;)

Big, clean, attractive CFA just off of Taylor and I-10. Food made piping hot and as delicious as you would expect from this chain.  Staff are super-friendly and very efficient. Waiting area after you order is a nice touch and makes things less congested in there. There,  you can also grab all the extras to take with you: napkins, straws, ketchup, etc.Ample parking and good access and exit. Good location and just a great franchise. What more can I say. Give them a try when you're in the area!

I like chick-fil-a. This particular location is consistent with their food and service. Sometimes I'll stop here for their breakfast chicken sandwich and I've always enjoyed it. I took away a star because when asked for a dog treat they said they don't do that at this location. I've read online that they will give your dog ice cream if he's with you in the drive-thru. Apparently not the case here.Line is always long but it's quick to go through. Quicker if you run inside.If you've never had chick fil-a I recommend trying!

Amazing place!! They treat you like royalty. This does not seem like a fast food place. The guy who took my order was so polite and I felt like he should have been working in a fancy restaurant. He then gave my order to a coworker who took my lunch to my seat for me (and all the customers) and asked if I needed anything else. Everyone was so well dressed and polite. The manager guy in the bow tie  was incredibly friendly and charismatic. He checked on the customer and made friendly conversation with regulars. The employees all had genuine smiles and were all so professional (many in dress shirts and ties). The place was spotless and there were fresh carnations on all the tables. Best chick-fail-a ever.

Always fast and friendly. Can get busy at times, but the staff goes the extra mile to be courteous. Very seldom do they get an order wrong, and if so, they make it right without any problem.Consistent with general chick fil a standards. I like to come here with my toddler and other moms with theirs, for lunch and some playtime. A clean and inexpensive play date .

I love chick fil A like everyone else but I wanted to yelp this specific location because they have the friendliest staff. The workers consistently go above and beyond and they never deliver service short of anything that exceeds my expectations. I always look forward to making stops here because I know I won't be disappointed! Thanks for all your hard work and southern hospitality!

They repeated my order back to me and still gave me the wrong order. I come here every now and then, not too often. But today not only was there a very long wait, but my order was wrong when I left the drive through.

I pick up lunch here several times a week on my way downtown. The employees are efficient, friendly and consistently greet you. During the busy lunch hours, they set up stations outside to keep the drive-thru line moving which I really appreciate. In terms of menu, my regular order is the Market salad, but sometimes I get the Cobb salad if I'm hungrier. There's a good selection of dressing and the quality and consistency of their salads is impressive, something you don't often find with fast food salads.

This has gotta be one of the busiest  Chick Fil A's in Houston. Pack your patience when coming during lunch hours. They have someone conducting  traffic which is a good thing. You can never go wrong with Chick Fil A. Always friendly  and the food is great.

This particular Chick-fil-A location is almost always slam-packed, especially near the lunch hour and around 5pm.  The drive-thru line wraps around the building twice.  Despite the incredible volume of customers, they still manage to keep the lines moving very efficiently.  The best thing about this location is the staff.  I have never experienced such consistently cheerful, friendly, and cordial staff at a fast food establishment.  During peak hours, you can even find the manager doing menial tasks like restocking, filling drinks at the drive through, and even taking out trash.  I think it's an excellent example of servant leadership, rather than just being a boss.  On days when I choose to eat inside the restaurant (in lieu of my typical drive-thru experience), as soon as wrappers and napkins begin to accumulate on my table, any employee who happens to be walking past me will ask if they can collect my trash, regardless of whether or not it is that particular person's duty to do so.  Customer service of this magnitude goes a long way, not to mention their exceedingly delicious chicken nuggets.  Try them with the barbecue sauce!

For me all branches of a fast food chain are more or less the same. This chick-fil-a next to our house is no exception. Roomie loves it there because they put fresh flowers in a vase on the table. That's a nice personal touch. I also feel the employees there are more cheerful compared to other chains.

Truly how long should one have to wait in a drive thru? Is 35 minutes acceptable? I think not. What's even worse is that once your in line you can't get out. Forget their commercials, they should just film their drive thru because I sure feel like a bunch of cattle in a straight line.

Huge fan of Chick-fil-A and this location does not disappoint, usually. I stopped in in my way to work this morning. I was craving those tots and a cold diet coke for breakfast....not sure why. Anywho, there were several people in drive thru line, per usual, but it went very quick, per usual. I paid and had my food in no time. Unfortunately I did not taste my drink before I left, it tasted gross, had a rootbeer flavor to it. I just could not drink it, which made eating my chicken biscuit and tots not so pleasurable. Regardless, I will be back. I have a great respect and appreciation for Chick-fil-A and value the customer service they provide. So I will continue to eat there. Just gonna check my drink before pulling out like I do everywhere else now.

This is absolutely my favorite location!! I work near by and eat there all the time the staff is so nice and welcoming! Never takes to long at all to get your food and Brian the manager is awesome! I always enjoy eating lunch here!!

This Chickfila was topnotch! Very clean and plenty of seating. Food was delicious and service was so kind and attentive. I rarely meet a Chickfila I don't like, but this one seemed even a little better than the norm. And I'm really in love with the 3 new salads - they're all delicious and the calories are reasonable (unlike the "salads" at SOME places. Grr).

Don't usually go to Chick-Fil-A due to their extreme political contributions, but really wanted some soup today so decided to go.  Also ordered 12 grilled chicken nuggets. On my 8th nugget, as I was about to put it in my mouth, I saw a 3" strand of black hair stuck to it. (I have dirty blond hair, no longer than 1.5" on my whole head.)Obviously I will not be dining at this location again.

I love Chick-fil-a, and I'm lucky that this location is the closest to my house! I drive thru here for dinner about once a week. I never go inside the restaurant, but it usually looks packed with families and kids.They are sometimes a little slow during peak dinner hours, but it isn't bad.  I've always had friendly service, and they've never gotten my order wrong...which is impressive for the number of times I've been to this location! I was surprised to read all the reviews about rude employees here, but I have a theory on that. I think it depends on when you come, because the lunch and dinner crews are different. I noticed this when I came here the other day for lunch and had a less than stellar experience.I normally wouldn't come here for lunch since I work on the other side of town, but I had the day off. Like other locations, this one had CFA staff standing outside to take orders to speed up the lines at lunch time. The woman taking my order was so focused on being quick that she was cutting me off. I ordered two meals for me and a friend, and both times, as soon as I said a number, she would ask "drink?" without even allowing me to finish giving details about the meal. It came off a bit rude. The service was fast and everything in my order was right, but I've never encountered that kind of person taking orders during the dinner rush at this CFA.

Worst customer service, they are extremely rude. I will NO LONGER GO HERE. My new location will be the new one off of 610 between shepherd and ella. I work in the industry as a manager at a restaurant and will not take fast food workers being disrespectful to anyone.
Consistent good food quality, consistently poor drive through experience: slow (always), inefficient, atypical to brand experience.

The service here is always very friendly and hopeful and the prices are reasonable. And I really like that there are always flowers on the tables and they are always clean. The only complaint I have is that it seeks to be a place with a lot of screaming children sometimes. I guess I cannot expect anything else though, and I blame the parents, not the restaurant. Also, their healthy options are not too tasty sometimes. But the spicy chicken sandwich is delicious.
Everyone is super friendly and helpful. But almost 75% time they get my order wrong somehow. Maybe it's just me. Of course I'll keep going, I love chick-fil-a :)

This is my least favorite chick fil a in all of Houston,  so much so that the next time I'm craving something from chick fil a, I will drive 6 miles out of my way and go to the one on 59. The last 4 times my order was wrong. I went Saturday night and requested a fruit cup with no blue berries ... well they gave me extra blue berries.  I then promised myself I would never go back to this location again.  Well sadly last night I broke my promise to myself and returned to this location.  I ordered a spicy chicken sandwich with no butter on the bread and no lettuce and tomato,  they gave me a spicy chicken sandwich with no pickles and no cheese. The problem with this location is they are in such a rush to take your order that they don't take the time to get it right. Finally,  the employees at this location are less than stellar as well, they lack the enthusiasm and friendly nature that 99% of chick fil a's are known for.

I love Chick Fil A, and this location is no different.  I try to pretend that I come here as often as I do because I have kids.  But let's be honest, I go by myself, too.  Those chicken sandwiches just can't be beat.  On this particular visit, I had 20 minutes before I had to be somewhere at 7pm, and I knew if I didn't have dinner first, I'd starve, because I wouldn't get out until close to 10pm.  So I pull into the drive thru at 6:40.  The line is SOOOOO long that I think to myself, "There is no way I will make it.  I should just leave."  But I decide if I'm a little late, it won't be the end of the world.  So I pull in behind the (no kidding) 20 cars in 2 lanes, and hope for the best.  To my great surprise, I was ordering by 6:44, and got my food at 6:46.  :)That gave me 10 minutes to eat, 4 to get where I was going, and all was well.One thing that I did notice, though, and maybe this was because it was right during dinner drive thru rush, was that the ladies at the window seemed a little curt.  They responded to my requests for sauce, etc. but strangely for Chick Fil A, didn't really smile, and I didn't get their signature, "My pleasure."  It's silly, I know, for that to upset me, but when you come to expect sweet service, you notice when it isn't there.
They employees are super friendly. They get your order in and process you out very quickly. It is awesome if you are on your lunch break and in a rush.

This location embodies everything I love about CFA. The place is clean, there are plenty of tables, the employees are ridiculously friendly and attentive, parking is easy, and I think I even saw a DOUBLE drive-thru line.I haven't been to a CFA in a while but this location had the nutrition facts printed right on the menu. They have also upped their game in the salad department. Much appreciated! I have instantaneous love for this CFA and only wished that I lived closer.FYI there is a deal going on right now that if you buy something from them and bring your recipet back before November 30, 2013 you get a free breakfast entree. Not too shabby!

Your typical chick-fil-a: busy with friendly employees but still provided fast service.I came in to pick up something to go. There was about ten customers in front of me but the line was moving quick. They had one line and four cashiers and it was very organized. It took me less than five minutes to place my order and iI waited another two minutes, if that, for my order to be ready. In, out, done!

Went through the drive-thru yesterday for lunch at 11:25. No one else was in line, so the order process was very quick. The staff was friendly, the food was good, but my fries were not as hot and fresh as I've come to enjoy from Chick-Fil-A. Overall, other than the not as fresh as I like fries, this location matches the quality and excellence of any other Chick-Fil-A I've tried.

This restaurant gets an A+ in my book. I come in with my toddler and infant, which can be challenging. However, they haven't skipped on labor- there is always a friendly staff person to bring my food to the table, help me with the high chair, even help me get the toddler into the high chair. That extra help I know raises their labor costs but it makes all the difference to me. After lunch we play in the indoor playground. It has never been too crowded and it seems clean. Then we get the ice cream cone before heading home.Last, they have the disposable place mats ready to go with the high chairs. Those thing make lunch so much easier.
Manager John is very kind and helpful. The staff is very friendly and this place is conveniently across from Target, which I often shop at. Cool beans!

Stopped in for breakfast bust was feeling brunch.  Amber at the counter took my order with ease Though I ordered my meal to go she suggested I sit and enjoy my cinnamon cluster and coke Zero (I know makes nonsense right?) in the dining room while I wait for them to prepare my CFA sandwich I order! What a great idea!  I would have stood around here for 10 minutes waiting.  Instead there's nothing left of my first act and my second act will get center stage! WTG CFA!   Drew, Amber needs a raise!

It'll be 4 stars when they work out the kinks... Wanted to show more love for this one and maybe they'll get their rhythm as they're open longer. Everyone is super nice and there are employees around everywhere trying to be helpful, but the counter is a huge bottleneck. Getting orders seems to run easily, but then everyone gathers in this one little place to collect. It seems like they'll bring it out to you if you sit, so perhaps telling people to sit would help, but many people are trying to get it to go. So there's a jam up there in of people just standing and waiting, and then if someone needs a sauce, they have to go back around (Hint, see 290's - they keep the sauces out. Love). Hopefully they'll figure out a more efficient way to get this part going. I ordered a nugget tray a couple weeks ago and asked for it at a certain time and still had to wait 20 minutes for it, which missed the point of ordering ahead and made me late to the event I was headed to. Still, their drive through seems to be running better than some of the others around and the lot is big enough that there is room for the cars. Glad they're in the Heights/Washington area and being next to Target is a good call.

I just picked up lunch for the first time from this location. The employees were very nice and professional. it was very busy but the drive thru line moved pretty quickly. The only negative thing was  the sandwich and fries I ordered. The bread was rather stale , just didn't seem as fresh as it could have been.There was only 1 pickle slice on my sandwich.  The fries tasted as if they were cooked in old oil. The milkshake was delish. I was pretty disappointed in the meal . I will try them again because of the convenience.
Just like all of the other CFA out there...they have great service with good food at a reasonable price.  I'm glad they opened one up by the house.

It was suppose to be the best birthday of my life however my plan was to have a big tray of moist chicken buggies with SAUCE! But the stupid freaking employees "forgot" the 20 sauces they said they'd provide. They obviously did this on purpose just to make my birthday a shit show. Everyone was looking forward because of the SAUCE. AND THERE WAS NONE. And worst of all. They never said my pleasure. BING BONG

This CFA location is not good. It is located in "The Tunnels" (under the downtown city connecting buildings with small shops and restaurants). This location is not a real Chick-fil-A (it's an express location. Service is just okay  nobody asked me how my day was going, and even more upsetting... my food was cold fries, chicken, and all.
Got there 5 minutes before close. Refused to serve. Looking for a Popeyes. Rumor has it there spicy chicken sandwhich is better anyway.

This place is trash cold food terrible service, came here a few times for the past few years. Came in today giving another chance and was told they dont accept chick fil a gift cards what a joke.what kinda company sells gifts cards you cant even use.

This is actually an "Express" location in the One Allen Center food court, so it has an abbreviated menu.  They still had my favorite chicken sandwich with pickles and nuggets for our boy.  My husband thinks they have the most boring food choices on the planet (I guess he's entitled to an opinion even if he is totally wrong).  I happen to love the food and their Eat More Chikin mascot cows. I've been told that I "drank the Kool-Aid", but I'm OK with that.The service was fast and friendly.  The food was hot and yummy.  The waffle fries (or "gates" as our son calls them) are sublime.  Hot, salty potato-ey goodness.  Yum.There are condiments available to take!  Most restaurants at home hide the condiments behind an armed guard so to be able to take my own ketchup and mayo packets was a big deal!  It's one of about three places in the food court open "late" (until 5PM).  Great stuff.  :)

This Chick-Fil-A is located in the tunnels. So that means that its closed on weekends and closes early as well. Its there for people working downtown. Long lineups everyday. I did find the Chick-Fil-A - chicken sandwich a bit saltier then the one in Bellevue. The wave fries are still very delicious. Overall, I liked it.

Certainly up to the standard that Chick-fil-A holds itself to. Very busy around lunch hour but a quick and efficient location. The staff were friendly and nice and the food was just as good as any other location. It is down in the tunnels which can be quite the frenzy of people but it is easy to find. The location was clean and up to par for Covid standards. Would highly recommend for a quick lunch downtown.

They need to double check orders when in bag they Forgot my salad dressing. They where not busy at 1107am  I called said to come back and get it after I walk from one downtown building to another on my lunch time. I told them no offered a discount on next meal with receipt. I dont care for discount just wanted my salad dressing.

I have filled out a survey and was offered a crispy chicken sandwich coupon, went to this place to redeem and the store manager without even verifying the fact that this coupon can be used via mobile, denied me saying i need to get a print out. Later I double checked and confirmed that indeed it could have been used. Sub par, rude and unprofessional staff

Why everybody giving this a good review lying. To start off, I love Chick-fil-A but this spot trash. Straight garbage and it's probably all these people trying to eat so of that good good. Okay, I think their dip & squeeze ketchup tasted like it was made in 2014. My number two spicy deluxe with pepper jack cheese was almost getting cold. Poor burger needed some warm love but got rejected. These famous fries needed salt and lowkey I'm kind of salty..The best thing from here was the Hi-C drink because it did not have too much ice.

Outraged. After walking all the way to this restaurant from my office, I get to the counter,  place my order, issue my credit card and a roach crawls across the counter near the fries. Instantly disgusted and dissapointed.  Wasted my lunch break.

It's 3 PM in the downtown tunnels. You've worked through lunch and looked up at the clock only to realize nearly everything is closed now. You wander the empty underground routes. No more hot food, just some lonely convenient shops, indian tea, and that sugar filled smoothie king. Your stomach turns into knots, $3.50 for an expired Nutrigrain Bar won't cut it for you. No. Map it to Penzoil Place, find this Chick Fil A, order yourself some of that hot and delicious chicken you so rightfully deserve. Clean, convenient, fast, open til 5.

This is a great place to grab a bite when you are by Louisiana and capital streets the Penzoil plaza.  I usually grabbed lunch from here very fast and took it to go n. Food was fast food fresh and fries were always done right.   The lemonade was perfect and I would have to say that this place has a quick turnaround with the order which is an important factor when you work downtown in a high rise and have to travel up and down elevators for half your lunch.  The best part about this place was the customer service.   I would have give. 5 stars but they ain't go no desert.  Where the brownies at???
Gotta love Chick-fil-A, and I'm glad to have a restaurant open at this location!  Sure, it's only an express location, or whatever, but it has everything you'd really want.

This Chik Fil A is located in the tunnels under the Pennzoil Tower, the dual towered black skyscrapers. Like most places in the tunnels, its only open for breakfast and lunch hours, I believe. It's a chik-fail-a express, so the menu is a little different from your normal chik fil a. The staff here do a great job of managing the lunchtime crowd, and they snag the name from your credit card and yell it out for you. The cafeteria is pretty nice.
Inside Houston Center, short wait, serving breakfast and lunch closes at 3pm.

One of my guilty as pleasures that I will no longer be indulging in. Before learning about their store policies and political stances, I used to eat here all the time guilt free. However after learning that I have avoided this place. From time to time, I'll find myself caving in and craving their super delicious crisscross fries. Their food was delicious and their sauce is so original. However lately their food hasn't been as delicious as before and the service takes longer than I would like. So I will no longer be eating here and I don't recommend you to as well.

When it comes to service, there isn't any fast food chain that is parallel to Chick-fil-A. Their signature catch phrase "my pleasure" is a testament to how dedicated their staff is to service. The food is just as impeccable as the service, my favorite being their chicken sandwich and waffle fries. The chicken sandwich has the perfect crispy texture and the meat is very tender. As for the waffle fries, they look like waffles and taste like fries. Sometimes, simplicity is bliss, and they even claim that their fruits contain only fruits. What makes their waffle fries so exceptional is the pairing of their signature sauce- Chick-fil-A sauce. It looks like honey mustard sauce but it's so difficult to describe how great it tastes. I dislike mustard to an indefinite extent, but even I enjoy their sauce. They also have great vanilla ice cream cones, perfect for a dessert snack.

one of my go to fast food places. the long lines are always worth it because the food is delicious. the mac n cheese they have to offer is one of the best things i have ever tried. it's so creamy, cheesy and it just taste amazing. the costumer service is just amazing as well. the workers always great you with a nice, warm smile. one thing i will always recommend is the chicken nugget meal with half lemonade and half sweet tea. in my opinion the nuggets are the absolute best and if i could i would eat it every day. as well as the drink, i would drink that every day. it just tastes so good, you get a mix of the best of both worlds. you taste sweet and sour but in a good way. i highly recommend this place as well as the food.

Gotta dock one star for it being in a food court but whew their spicy chicken biscuit for breakfast hits the spot. I am not used to having the spicy chicken options as my normal local Chick-fil-A doesn't offer them. I can't go back to regular now that I have tried the spicy chicken. Highly recommend.
They are located in the Shops downtown and provide quick service and have plenty of open seating during lunch time. It does get quite crowded and I recommend coming before or after the lunch rush.

Words can't express how much I love this chick fil a location! The food is always fresh and orders are always accurate. There's never a long wait! All the employees are very nice and welcoming and let me tell you, they go above and beyond every time! It's by far my favorite location I pay them a visit almost every day before work!

They were making multiple vanilla ice creams and skipping over the fact they knew the cones were out so when i got up there they tried to lie with the " clueless excuse " that they just realized the cones were out , when i explained to him  to that they knew the cones were out but intentially skipped over the cones being out , Alexander just said " sorry" .Thats fine just take the yelp hit and were even.

Went to this chick-fil-A this morning and ordered what I usually order at this location (Chicken biscuit combo with a large coffee in my reusable cup). The person helping me was Mercedes. I asked her to put my large coffee in my reusable cup, as I'd like to reduce the amount of waste produced on my behalf. Mercedes proceeded to get my coffee, while stating that she HAS to put in in the paper cup. Kind of defeats the purpose of trying to reduce waste. Mercedes ended up bringing my coffee in a large cup WITH a sleeve to the counter, then poured it into my reusable cup and walked over to the trash to throw the paper cup away. First of all, Mercedes was not Chick-fil-A quality when it came to her response and attitude to my request. Secondly, where is the responsibility of Chick-fil-A in trying to reduce the amount of waste that they produce? I've come to this location several times, and they are usually very friendly, fast, and put my my coffee into my reusable cup. This visit certainly did not live up to my expectations of the Chick-fil-A customer service that I'm usually accustomed to at every single other location I've ever been to.

This place is far more superior than McDonald's since for one it feels like someone actually made a sandwich than a machine and 2 I love the spicy chicken sandwich my only complaint is that it's addicting. 10 out of 10 would recommend

This review is for Chick Fil A location that Yelp can't locate.  It's at Beltway 8 / West Road In Houston, TXThe thought of giving a fast food location a 5 star review has never occurred to me before today. But as I enjoy my lunch, and had a nice chat with one of the workers I began to realize how enjoyable this experience was.You can see pride in ownership here (Glenn Thigpen is listed the operator at this location) and attention to detail.  The floors are clean, the tables are cleaned and even the smallest details are covered.  The workers behave in a professional manner, and are holding their heads high.It is clear to me that To Mr Thigpen and the Chick Fil A team that "good enough" simply isn't good enough.  5 Stars it is.

I've already tried contacted you guys about the same issue today. I tried once again to call the Houston Center location and no one picked up the phone. I don't understand how this is acceptable customer service considering the location and the surrounding area. If it's that busy to answer a customer's call or question, then you guys need to hire more staff. It should not be acceptable to refuse  a customer's phone call.Initially, I tried multiple times calling because Chic Fil A's app to order food was having technical errors, but unfortunately it seemed the people weren't working either! How frustrating. I go to chic fil a but once or twice a month, so I refuse to stand in a long line with the other occultic followers who frequent this place 6 times (or so) a week. This Is not the standard customer service I've witnessed at other locations, so you guys need to do better.
Wonderful customer service and wonderful food! We had an issue with their mobile order and store manager took care of it beyond our expectation right away!

I love this location. The staff is really nice, and they are quick. You will see a line of 20-30 people during lunch hours, and I can guarantee you you won't be in that line for more than 5-8 minutes. They are super staffed so they are fast. I go to this location ALL the time, and they do not disappoint.

I love chic fil a, my wife and I get it every week. However, I will never order from the downtown Houston mall location ever again. I just brought food back to work for myself and some coworkers, and after my coworker was half way through his spicy deluxe sandwich a roach crawled out of it.
Always had a good time here. Good tasting food. We like their grilled chicken sandwich...

It's official - I'm an app junkie.  A friend told me about the order app and it's the best way to avoid the super long line that seems to be at this location ALL the time.  Which means they must be doing something right!  I went to breakfast this morning - egg white sandwich and hash browns.  I ordered as I parked in the garage and walked right on in and up to pick up my freshly made food!  It was the same great consistency as the location near my home, so I am a happy gal!  I've got over $20 left in the app so I MUST return.......

This CFA is located in the Houston Shops (near the escalators) on level 3 (if you're coming from the Shops elevators), so EXPECT a long line especially during lunch time. The line may look like its wrapping around a few times, but I say don't fret because it goes by really fast. Even through the lunch rush, the employees seem to be on their game and every station, every register, is being manned, even someone taking care of the refills and stocking up the sauces.  CFA knows how to do it right!But they do close early at around 3 PM like the other food places in the Shops.
Food great but multiple times I've received the wrong order. The staff must be overwhelmed because they do t listen.

This restaurant is one of my favorites in the shops since it is always busy during rush hour they have a system that works to get you in and out and I haven't really had any issues going here over the last couple of years.

I love that we have access to this location through the tunnels downtown. The staff is always nice and work efficiently. They have one of the few salads I really enjoy alot and of course that sweet tea has crack in it - seriously.

Because Chick-fil-A is so awesome many downtown workers get those cravings only they can satisfy. Good news for us...this location is just a few blocks walk from the METRO Rail Line and available via the downtown tunnel system. It's located in the Park Shops which allows for a little shopping after satisfying those cravings. Don't get discouraged by the long line during that lunch time crunch. The staff here is super quick, friendly, and efficient. Before you know it, it's your turn to order and you have your food. Today I enjoyed my favorite Cobb Salad with Avocado Ranch dressing and grilled chicken...YUMMMMMM

Well today I didn't go to he actual location, but I have never had any issues with rudeness, cleanliness or the food.  My co-worker actually picked me up so food while I was still stuck in the office, and I will have to say that how come one sandwich never seems enough...don't know if the days I get Chick Fila I am just really hungry or if the sandwich to me is just that good...but I know when I am done I am wanting a few more bites.  Maybe I should substitute my fries for another sandwich, though I like the waffle fries  I would much rather have another sandwich.
All I have to say is: Every time I come here to order my lunch during the week, my food is ready before the cashier is done pouring my tea.It is hot, fresh, and delicious during every visit.

I've never met a "chick" I didn't like...of course I'm talking about a sandwich!This place had the fastest service of any Chick-Fil-A I've ever been to.  I placed my order, turned around briefly to see where I could sit and when I turned back around, BOOM!  my two sandwiches, waffle fries and Coke Zero were there waiting for me, hot and ready...just the way I like it.  Actually the Coke Zero was ice cold.Anyway, good food, served fast and friendly, I can't give it less than four stars.

It's Chick-Fil-A. You either like it or you don't. Personally, I like it.Every once in a while the food is slow to come out. The restaurant has always looked understaffed when the service is slow. This isn't often though.
The food is amazing and service is awesome  definitly my fav fast food place ever!!!!!!!!!!!

Once again Chick-Fil-A gets it right. Their motto, "We Didn't Invent the Chicken, Just the Chicken Sandwich," is on point. They take one thing, and do it well. I have never had a bad experience at Chick-Fil-A. This location is no different.I walk up and place my sons order for a kids 4 count strip meal and a banana pudding shake. Less then 5 minutes later I am sitting down. This might be the most efficient location I have ever visited. One drawback is the kids meal not being on the menu. Although they are available. Oh yeah, the banana pudding shake is crack. That is if I knew what crack was like.
This is actually the Chick-Fil-A in the shopping center.  Fast and convenient, and I can't get enough of their spicy chicken sandwiches.

This chick-fil-a should be the model for efficiency in the fast food world.  This chick-fil-a, located in the Park Shops downtown, always has a long line, but never takes more than 5-10 minutes to wait, order and leave with your food.  Even on a day where they were given away free food, i was able to get in an out quickly.  I have probably eaten at this location at least 100 times and they have maybe only once they've messed up my order (which was not a problem, because i love everything at chick-fil-a).  The people who work there are nice and know what they are doing.  I work on the other side of downtown now, but I do not hesitate to walk over to this location when craving some of those amazing waffle fries.
comment
Friendly staff. Fast service. Accurate orders. Truly the best Chick-fil-A in the valley! Everyone here knows how to brighten up your day!

So  on my lunch break my food order got messed up on Chick-fil-A at Thunderbird and 59th Ave. but when I called , the owner Troy was extremely rude and condescending and argued for 20 minutes. Then he said he wanted to discuss further in person. Then when I explained that I didn't have time to stand on the side of the curb and argue with him in person he told me he would not replace the order. However I had an experience with him six months ago that made me extremely uncomfortable because he spits when he talks and we're in a pandemic and he doesn't wear a mask. but if you mention that he will walk off without replacing your food he is extremely rude and very very cheap and will do anything to not replace your food or money
Excellent customer service. Fast friendly staff. Never a long wait. Managers and employees are top notch. Food always served hot and delicious.

Still not opening the dinning room. They keep saying they don't know how to accommodate the very busy drive thru and dinning room.Well Its pretty simple after they open the dinning room they won't have as much drive thru. If they want to try to keep both going strong then re-locate, but the managers appear not to be smart enough to figure this out.With the way they are handling this I've stopped going there, everyone appears to be very confused on how to operate this place. If there hasn't been a accident yet there will be the parking lot was a nightmare the last time I went, cars parking every different direction blocking people trying to find a spot to park with the lot guy getting more confused as the time went by. I don't think they will ever open up the dinning room, the way they're doing this now they have less work to do, I think they enjoy what they are doin now making lots of money doing nothing for the customers. Lucky for everybody just about every other fast food is offering chicken stuff which some of them are pretty good and you don't have the stupid parking lot at Chick-fil-a to deal with.

After driving seven hours to meet a friend at this CFA location, we found out that the dining room was temporarily closed. A very kind employee, Frank, went out of his way to ensure we had everything we needed as we ate on the patio (it was a beautiful evening outside). He even checked on us twice during our meal! So thank you, Frank, for going above and beyond your assigned tasks to serve us!

This chick fil a is the ONLY location I will go to. Everyone actually cares about the food, hygiene and well being of their customers. I kid you not, every week I go there about 4 times and leave with the HUGEST smile on my face.

I would like to say this location STILL does an AMAZING job with getting you your food fast and the staff are extremely professional and accommodating.Whenever I use the drive through, I am able to get my food within less than 10 minutes of me driving up.I went to the New Alhambra location one time and there were 4 people on their phones, talking and only one person helping man the drive thru window and handling food. It took me half an hour to get through for breakfast.I have also tried the Arrowhead location and still I have not had as good of an experience than this location at Thunderbird.Thank you all for serving us and making my day!

Troy and his entire crew are AMAZING!!! We have been going to this particular establishment every Friday for approximately a year and a half now. Their food is great with excellent quality taste. You can obviously tell the crew is trained to be professional and friendly. This location compared to other location as well as other fast food establishment, you can definitely tell the crew loves their employment. We also loved how they navigated their way through making adjustments through the pandemic. We love curbside pick up.  Thank you for serving us.
Been here 3x and everytime I come thru the drive thru I specifically ask for avocado lime ranch and they've forgotten it everytime.... Smh. Why? It was on the receipt too...

If you don't mind eating in your car or dealing with a company that prefers you don't use cash to pay for your meal then this is the place for you.  Welcomed by so many signs and instructions that I forgot why I was there.   Maybe they should start giving away the food for free.......

This is the best Chick-fil-A location to go to. They have amazing service, they are ran very smoothly, and are always two steps ahead of you on what you need. They truly want you to be happy with your food and do what it takes to make sure you are, which you can never be unhappy with this Chick-fil-A location. The milkshakes are the best but really everything is amazing. Troy and Lisa do a great job!

The service at this location is horrible. I placed an order on the app. Drove to the curbside pickup. Other customers arrived after I did and got their orders before me. I asked why and was told that they  do the small orders first. This explains why I had to 15 minutes to get my family order.

Incredible staff! Everyone at the Thunderbird location always makes me feel so welcome. Their drive thru line always looks long, but they always move it incredibly fast. Best Chick-fil-A I have ever been too.

I had a problem with curbside pickup and it got a little frustrating because of the heat but Vlera made it a priority to get my food and drinks AND sauce. I appreciate that thank you l. Vlera certified

This chick fil-a is blocking off the disabled parking spots in the parking lot. What they are doing is ableist and illegal under the ADA. This quote is from the chick fil a corporate website under the purpose section. "From the beginning, Truett based his business on Biblical principles that he believed were also good business principles, and since 1982, our Corporate Purpose has guided all that we do. We keep our Purpose front and center because it helps us to steward our business and our work to positively influence everyone we meet."To glorify God by being a faithful steward of all that is entrusted to us. To have a positive influence on all who come in contact with Chick-fil-A."To live out our Purpose and honor Truett's legacy, we are focused on creating a culture of care, both at the Support Center and in our restaurants." How does limiting access to disabled customers honoring this statement? You're breaking federal law. How is discriminating against disabled people glorifying God? I'll be calling corporate and reporting this location to the proper authorities. The excuse that they are using the space for something else is pathetic. Again this is ILLEGAL. There is no excuse for this behavior. If you support this chick fil a location then you are supporting discrimination against disabled people.

This place has illegally blocked off the handicap parking and refuses to comply with state and federal laws.When confronted, they told us to park on the other side of the building even though it is my legal right to park there as a disabled citizen. Do not support this business as they are discriminatory against the disabled population and breaking federal laws that protect us.

This location is always so efficient even when there's a long line. Came for breakfast and did not think to order ahead. Q took care of us and was so pleasant even early in the morning. Our order was accurate and delicious as always.

We rarely have any issues with Chick-Fil-A and this restaurant lived up to what we love! It's on a corner so getting in and out can be a pain especially during rush hour. But not too bad to keep us away!We placed our order for pick up and it was prepared in about 5-10 minutes, which is quicker then using their drive thru. Everything was correct on our order and they even gave us the correct amount of sauces and ketchup we had asked for. The staff is friendly and they have everything in order to make your experience quick and pleasant!

Honestly love this location! Hydeia and Jermiah are sooo amazing and sweet! They don't accept tips but I really wanted to give her one lol. Overall the ppl are nice. I'm glad it's close and great service!

This specific Chick-fil-a is AMAZING! Everything about it is great! However, what makes it AMAZING? How personable they are. We love feeling like being part of the family as we pull up! They remember who you are and the extras you like. If you happen to encounter Hydeia &/or  Lisa, your day is changed ! They make sure you leave with a smile on your face and fill your heart! If you had one as you pull up, you will have a bigger one! Food is always fresh and 10/10! With covid changes, and now Bell location temporarily closed, they have taken the extra steps to still keep their service for us 100% still! The consistency at this location is what brings us back week after week. Thank you CFA Thunderbird for your hard work!

Can never go wrong with CFA. The employees are always super friendly and the food is as fresh as you can get for fast food. I have the app and put in our order and pay and as soon as we arrive they submit our order and we drive on through. The family loves the nuggets and we usually just grab a 30 count nugget meal to share. The kids love the frosted and regular lemonade. Their new brownie is served warm and fudgy it's actually really really good for not being homemade. The prices are a bit more expensive than if you went to another fast food joint but the quality and service here is superior!We will be back soon when the craving for CFA hits. (It's usually on a Sunday) lol but love their chicken and friendly employees!

Okay... how do you rate a business that has perfect execution of prompt speedy service, fast friendly and polite employees who let's be honest provide far better service than any establishment around? How can one rate such amazing service with by comparison to 5 stars is not nearly enough? There is not enough I can say or do that can show my appreciation for the phenomenal service provided by Troy and his amazing staff at the 59th Ave and Thunderbird location. Their food served fast, fresh and accurate also helping me get my bearings which I must say have been off as I misread my intended order that they quickly without no error at all caused by them. If you seek service unparalleled to any other restaurant and service of quality food that will leave you smiling and content as you enter and as you grab for that criss cut fries to the exit getting home knowing you managed to devour your food before you left the parking lot as let's be honest one bite is not easy to complete without the last bite. Then I assure you your satisfaction your hunger your peace of heaven and lasting joy can be found here. This may sound silly but i truly can't put into words how grateful for the amazing service and food provided and Troy who is the owner who is cheering his Staff along and very extremely polite kind and understanding has made my night a wonderful one. So please treat yourselves to something unexpected treat yourself to something amazing to great food and phenomenal service. Thank you Troy for your kindness and the ever lasting impression you gave me of you and thank you for having such an amazing and polite staff. I am chick Fila for life.

I really don't know what I can add that isn't already known. They have great customer service, which lets you leave feeling like your mood has improved. During this pandemic they take your orders in the parking lot while you wait in line (inside your vehicle). Once you order, you pull forward to the next staff that verifies your order and/or provides you with a receipt. When you get your order from the window they have it in a bin so that you can grab your stuff without having contact with people. Let me know if they are selling the stuffed cow again because I missed out.
George is the best! He had great customer service, promoted the deals going on, and overall made our experience full of laughter! I hope his hard work is being appreciated and noticed!

Excellent job at catering.  We ordered boxes for a celebration of life hosted at a park.  They delivered on time, and set all the boxes out for us.  Very professional, and courteous to my family.  They had proper procedures in place for COVID.  I received a text when placing more order with a point of contact to make sure my large order would be processed properly.  I highly recommend this location.  The catering boxes are perfect for gatherings outdoors where you want to have a food option while still practicing social distancing.

As we all know, COVID-19 has put quite a damper in everything. But not Chick-fil-A! This place has been my staple through the whole pandemic. With their speedy and safe drive thru, I feel very comfortable every time I come here. I give huge props to all the workers outside taking orders, especially Jamie (the man always directing traffic). The owner does a great job of taking care of them by adding a huge canopy and misters to keep them cool. Love love love Chick-fil-A!!
This Chick-fil-A has been awesome even with Covid. They give me what I need and did it in a timely fashion. Thank you guys!

I've come to this location since it opened, and that's because from day 1 they have outshined all the other Chick-fil-A's in the valley. Their customer service is always top notch, and the food is always fresh. The drive thru line can be backed up to the street and still I am never in line for more than 10 minutes before I have my food.

Hands-down the worst Chick-fil-A I have ever been to customer service is crap in addition to that every other Chick-fil-A locations I've been to will serve the number one lunch order all day every day no problem apparently this location does not and states that it is not a requirement for them to but I've been through multiple Chick-fil-A's throughout the United States and never had this issue manager is also an asshole excuse my French but the one reason I do go to Chick-fil-A other than their food being delicious is they normally have amazing customer service this just Chick-fil-A is the WORST!!!!

Great friendly service here. Had double drive thru but line looks long. Don't leave it moves quickly. Always had friendly service. Hard working crew outside in this heat. Even the owner was out there.
Horrible customer service, I was picking up a door dash, many employees saw me but did not acknowledge me
Ordered curbside off the app, everything was phenomenal! I just want to say thank you to Connie, who delivered our food to us with excellent service. Will be back again soon!

Thanks Staff manager!!  I really appreciate how your staff really protects themselves and the customers during this time.  I am amazed how well organized and disciplined your staff is. Well orchestrated.  Beautiful.  I believe " other" restaurants need to take a page from your book. We just came from Krispy Creme on 55th and bell.  Well enough said.  Thank you.
I come here literally almost 3 times a week and I just found out FROM A FRIEND OF MINE that they have a rewards app. Not one employee told me about the app or how I can earn rewards.

During the crazy time we are facing with Covid-19, most drive thru places can be a little crazy! We went through the drive thru yesterday for our lunch order and had the most pleasant experience. Not only did they have a great group of employees out greeting the cars/customers, the owner was out there taking orders and making sure each car was getting a great experience. They all were super efficient and took every precaution to make sure your food and any items were handled as carefully as possibly keeping to the guides of as much social distance needed. Also, the line looked like it was going to take forever to get through and yet they were fast and incredibly efficient, hardly waited long at all. We love Chick-Fil-A and we especially are appreciative of all the extra measures this location took to make sure our experience met our expectations. But have to say, it exceeded them! Thank you to the owner and the team for doing such a great job during this trying time we are in. Job well done!!

I tell you what, Chick fil A is on point. Even during these hard times and the lobby closed their drive through is so efficient and fast. The employee are smiling and I feel appreciated. This location was great. The lines were long. There were three employees taking orders and we were in and out in under five minutes.

Hi, I just wanted to take a minute and say how awesome this location is. I frequent this restaurant because it is close to both my work and home. Over the last year and a half or so I have been going to this location, sometimes 2 or 3 times a week amd usually have multiple orders. I can not think of a single time that we have received a wrong order or one that was not hot and fresh. With everything going on right now their employees are still friendly and professional and take great care of their customers. I ttied to tip a couple of theor employees and they were not able to accept it and I can understand why. I figured I'd do the next best thing and let their management and the owner know their employee's are AWESOME and doing a great job! Thank you all for being open and providing great service amd food!!

Very extremely disappointed  1. Ordered  a breakfast chicken biscuit 2. Ordered Large Original Cold BrewOnly to get to the window and be told they're barely making biscuits so I would have to move out of the drive thru and wait until they were made. Or I had the option of a muffin, kudos for offerIng alternatives; however,  if you don't have what I asked for remove from the menu, cover it up, or let the customer know T time if ordering the food. TERRIBLE ! Secondly, I was told "oh we only have one size now for the cold brew" She didn't say I would be paying a large cold brew price for a small cold brew. Rip off!! You're going to keep thee small cold brew size only then keep that prize.
While I love the food and service here, I think it's in poor taste to allow the employees to sit and eat and hang out where the mobile order pick up is.

The food is always high-quality and the service matches it. I've made this Chick-fil-a my go to because they have never disappointed me once. Even if there is a small mistake on the order they go above and beyond to remedy the situation.

We were there this evening about 6:40. Love Co but this is the 2nd dirtiest store we have been in. We frequent store in Hidden Valley in Corona an Rancho Cucamonga which are always much cleaner. Only two issues here were the cleanliness and lack of more consistant friendliness. Food is great. Jim

I am so disappointed in this Chick-fil-A. This will be my third disappointing drive-through experience. I have never posted about Chick-fil-A in this way before. I also didn't post about the other two horrible instances here. The staff is mostly unpleasant and the fries are either over cooked or undercooked. If all other's are able to get it right‍. Chick-fil-A will get my money just not this one anymore.

When you drive up they have a friendly staff member to take your order with a smile. When you pull forward to the receipt station they greet you by name.  Again when you pull up to the window to get the food, they greet you by name. How nice to order to a real person and not a speaker, and so personable. My son thought I actually knew him because he greeted me by name! And the food is perfectly cooked and served hot!

This location is always busy (but I've yet to find one that isn't), but the staff are friendly, fast and efficient. The place is keep clean and inviting. Parking directly outside, also has a drive thru.. That could have been designed better as the drive thru line clogs up the parking lot.. Food is excellent, they now have a grilled chicken sandwich on the menu which is very good, but my go to is still the spicy chicken sandwich.

Had the pleasure of meeting Troy Seaver's last night he was working the drive thru! This speaks volumes about how the restaurant is ran. We all know Chick-fil-A is delicious so what sets the apart from the other restaurants? Customer service bottom line! Love the Saturday surprises thank you to the whole Chick-fil-A team!!

This is basically the only Chick-Fil-A I go to now because the food is so well prepared! I've been to other locations near here but this is by far the cleanest and best tasting location! Also, their drive thru is really well managed especially during rush hour. Came around 6 pm the other night and the drive thru line was so long that the parking lot was filled in both directions. I normally would have just left, but then I noticed the Operator himself was out standing in the parking lot helping people get into the drive thru and into the rest of the parking lot. I have never seen a person in management do this at any other food place! It was really amazing to see that instead of staying inside and letting the employees handle the intensely packed drive thru, he was right there with them! Without a doubt, this location wins the award for best customer service!

I go through the drive-through between 2 and 6 days a week and sometimes I only get drinks but at its busiest the drive-through takes less than 10 minutes. The food is always extremely fresh and every single person that works there has great customer service.  The owners Troy and his wife both work there and I have seen them do every single job whether it's cleaning tables or taking orders in the sun and they are some of the nicest people I have ever met.2 things-1)  If you download the app and scan it every time you get food you will be surprised at how often you get free stuff and sometimes the  Owners will add free stuff tear app just for fun.2)  Try the honey roasted barbecue sauce.  I don't like honey in anything but the sauce is awesome. Their normal barbecue sauce is good too.
This location is awesome! Troy, the owner, is very friendly along with all their employees.
I love this chick-fil-a there always fast and there never a long line to wait! The service is good. I haven't had a bad experience yet!

I always get outstanding customer service at this Chick Fil A.  My last two visits I had some of the best service I have ever had at any restaurant.   The young lady's name is Hydea and she is bright, cheerful, professional and infectious.   Bravo to Hydea and bravo to the manager who hired her.

Nathaniel was our cashier and he was phenomenal. He was the sweetest young man and made sure to say my pleasure. He really did make it seem like he was happy to serve us. Never in my many years have I experienced such wonderful service. GIVE THIS YOUNG MAN A RAISE!!
