This was my first and last visit to Chick-fil-A.My 3 year old granddaughter and I arrived at noon and the line heading east on Thunderbird to turn left into the parking lot was five cars back.  We were lucky to find an available space to the immediate right facing 59th Avenue.  Huge mistake! When we attempted to leave at 12:45, I waited 23 minutes to back out.  Not a single person would stop to allow us to do so.  I was afraid my car would overheat and we were late to a dentist appointment up the street one block.  How in the world the City Planning and Zoning allowed this potential debacle is beyond me.  It's an absolute gridlock disaster.Considering people just can't be kind to one another, on top of the worst traffic  design imaginable, perhaps CFA should hire parking attendants.  Sad commentary and definitely not worth the mediocre sandwich and soggy fries.

The Chick- fil- A on 59th Avenue and Thunderbird is one of the best. Great food and the best employees! Connie is always so friendly and is usually keeping the dinning area spotless for everyone. Lacy is so sweet, professional and gets your order taken accurately. If your lucky you get to meet Bill who maintains the restaurant and grounds for everyone to enjoy. This restaurant is awesome so enjoy a family friendly environment and get your Chick-fil-a fix now.
Horrible experience never coming back. Rude customer service. Other locations serve you what you want
Food was good until my son got to his fries....he had like 5 good ones and then whats on the picture....won't be coming here again.

Excellent consistent quality. Reasonably priced. The manager and staff are very professional and friendly. This store feels like a small town restaurant, not a large chain. I've eaten at a few in the valley, this location is by far, the absolute best. Very impressed.
This location is great!  Best service anywhere and of course the best fast food on the planet!!
My favorite location! Nuggets are always super fresh and customer service is excellent!

This chick fila is an absolute favorite! Clean, quick and friendly staff!! Let me point out some of the staff that are worthy of a shout out! Arias , Andrez and Andrick! These are some fine young men with great attitudes who are extremely friendly, polite and attentive to their customers. The food is always delicious and satisfying! Dining area and bathrooms are always on point and clean. The drive through area is fast and these employees work diligently to get to each customer very quickly! Wow what a great location! I am impressed! Thanks chick fila!

Great location. Bought some food for our trio while one was getting PT at the out-patient clinic. Their app states you can order for pick up inside or in the drive-thru, but when I got their they had curbside pick-up spots.  I was confused. One of the employees said that Chick-Fil-A discontinued curbside service (?)If that's the case, I'm very disappointed.  The food was good but took a very long time to prepare.  This location was clean and the employees were all very friendly.  I'm going to have to check with my inside sources to see if all CFA's are shutting down their curbside service. If so, they'll need to step-up their inside pick-up area.
Good service as expected.  Good was fast and hot.  Had the spicy tenders - hoping these stick around for awhile.

Probably the best Chick-Fil-A I have ever been too! The employees are beyond sweet and super friendly and they were very quick as well. The food was perfect and I'm very happy. After having a bad morning they definitely lifted my spirits and made my day much better.

So I have to visit this particular location because it's a near my work. Several times I received the waffle fries and they had way too much skin on them, black spots or they're way over fried. C'mon Chick-fil-A you can do so much better! You have the drive-thru down pat and the chicken is usually good but the fries they need improvement please!!

Great food! This place looks more modern inside. There's barely and booths only in the front for pick up. But glad that the chairs has a soft cushion so it doesn't hurt. Yummy chicken. Every year is cow appreciation day which you dress up like a cow and get a free sandwich, or wrap or nuggets. My favorite is the wraps and the Chick-fil-A deluxe. Get the app & scam ur phone to get points and redeem for free food. This location doesn't have a patio. Love their ranch and Polynesian sauce!
Get past the forbidden chicken part and it's good food with good service.  People are friendly and the place is clean.

Chick Filet A's are always great, but this one is special.  The owner is highly visible, the staff super courteous, and the food is always perfect.  It's worth driving out of your way to deal with these guys.  Thanks Chick Fil A for proving that quality and value are still possible!
Awesome service, awesome smiles, fabulous food best one in town better get to this one from wherever you are!
This location is our favorite! So nice and clean and the food is always great! The staff is kind and helpful with any request which makes us feel like coming back.

I ordered 2 southwest salads on line at approx 11:10 am. Got in line at about 11:30 waited in line until 11:40, got to the window and was told my salads (one with no onion/tomato) we're not ready yet and they asked me to pull out front. I'm sorry but I just waited for 10 minutes in line (and time is valuable). For a salad to not be ready within 10 minutes is ridiculous let alone a half hour they had to prepare it . Needless to say this is the second time that they have messed up my order. Had I ordered steak and potatoes, I realize my order wouldn't be ready in that short of time but we're talking about a salad. They did say they would refund my money and I drove away. I guess I just expect all businesses to run like my place of employment. I will not be back to  Chick-fil-A

I had not tried this chicken until this location opened. I was impressed with the fresh product and the fact that there were Fresh salads. Usually fried chicken is the rule and salad is an option. The market salad is my favorite because it includes fresh fruit and berries.I am a drive thru person and I am impressed with the order takers in the parking lot and the speed at which the process moves. I have to admire their cheerful attitude especially in the heat of the day!

Chick fil a is my only friend that has never let me down. They are always there when I need extra sauce or when I want a refill. Like dang thanks for those chicken sandwhiches and quality service. Keep it coming

This is definitely a place we regularly come too. This location is always clean, and always super friendly with the kiddos. Play area is always clean and actually smells good. Not like smelly socks lol

You guys have GOT to put your curb side employees out to take breakfast orders when its close to the end of breakfast!!!  You guys always have a huge line and those of us who want breakfast can't get to the speaker before 10:30
This place is amazing I love the food and the staff is pretty nice. Sometimes I get that one employee that is kind of rude but that doesn't bother me as I'm mostly there to eat and leave.

I love Chick - Fila they are absolutely the best, particularly the Thunderbied location.  I actually live closer to another location but choose to pass the closer  location to come to the Thunderbird location.  The management and staff are absolutely the friendliest, most attententive staff.   They are fast and efficient.  They all work hard to make sure this location runs smoothly.  I would definitely recommend this location to everyone.  I come

I'm a big fan of Chick-Fil-A, but this location isn't great. Usually, the franchises are fast, efficient and friendly. This one? Not as much. Went there Friday afternoon. Wasn't particularly busy there. A few of the low-lights:- Pre-ordered, and went to the pick up counter. Employee 'Gabby' didn't acknowledge me standing right in front of her. Finally looked up at me after about 30 seconds and just walked away. Someone else came over to ask if I needed help. Not very Chick-Fil-A like!- The meal took about 20-25 minutes. Uncharacteristically long for this business.- Fries were room temperature.-Went back up after meal to order just one additional order of fries. Figured they would just hand them to me, but was given the table marker. Was still waiting for this one order of fries 10-15 minutes later, had to go back to the counter and ask. They seemed very confused.Minus the cold fries, the food was good, but this is not the Chick-Fil-A we know and love.

I ordered a chicken sandwich during breakfast hours and was informed that i am not able to, I was frustrated because my friend wanted breakfast and i just wanted a sandwich now meant we would have to eat at separate times and i would have to drive back. I had left a review about my frustration and received a call a couple days later from Troy. He explained to me that it is different chicken and took the time to explain why i couldn't get sandwiches during breakfast. Now after understanding it is different chicken i completely understand and I'm thankful he took the time to explain why i couldn't order a sandwich during breakfast. He was very helpful!

I was very impressed with the service that I received at this location. The daunting line at dinner time went surprisingly fast & despite all of the people, the food came out promptly as well. The employees were fabulous being both polite & determined to enhance our experience. I think this location's customer service is what sets it apart from others & I would definitely recommend it to anyone looking for a pleasant eating experience.

I ordered a 12 piece nuggets and got 4 piece strips? Not really sure what happened there. My receipt had my correct order, they must have just given me someone else's. Felt super rushed while taking my order and was given a total before I was finished ordering. I've been here a few time and always have had exceptional service, but I am a little disappointed that I couldn't even finish my order and what I was able to order came back incorrect.

Love love love this Chick Fil A location!!! Its always clean and the inside has a gorgeous set up!!! Everyone here is so friendly and drive thru is always quick !!! The Manager Troy is doing an amazing job!! Thank you for always going above and beyond to provide the best service possible.

I only go to this Chick-fil-A if I have no other option. The drive thru is ALWAYS slow. The staff always look nervous and overwhelmed. Not very friendly. I suggest the one on Peoria over by Metrocenter.

i visit this location pretty frequent but tonight it wasnt as good as most i ordered a original chicken sandwich and it tasted off from the start , ever since i got home ive been sick to my stomach from this sandwich , never had this happen at any chick-fil-a but unfortunately it happened this time i will be back in the future, but have other locations closer that i could visit first , im pretty regular when it comes to your restaurant but tonight made it questionable.

Disappointed! I get they are busy but please figure out a way to balance both drive through and your lobby orders. There were 15 cars in the drive through, so I elected to go inside. There was no waiting so they took my order right away. Took 15 minutes to get my one order of chicken nuggets while they cleaned out the drive through. Just because I come inside doesn't mean I have 15 minutes to wait. Not even one apology for the wait.

I just wanted to leave a review for two of your associates who gave beyond exceptional service tonight. Angelo and Mara greeted me proptly and had big smiles on their faces the entire time they were helping me. They made my order 100% correct down to the requested  number of sauces. These two are a huge asset to your team! Chic Fila always provides exceptional service and quality fresh food however it was these two that made my not so great day a little brighter!!

Love this location! Great service and fresh food! They know me and my order by now!! They are fast and efficient! I am obsessed with the chicken bisquits in the morning! They also offer lots of deals which help my multiple visits a week more affordable!

This is the best Chick-fil-A in town,  the staff is always amazing.  Just met the owner Troy and he is out there working with the rest of his staff, so refreshing to see.  If your hungry for some delicious chicken and friendly faces definitely come here!

Great food of course, but the efficiency and friendliness of the drive thru staff are especially noteworthy. I try to quickly swing by this location once a week and have never been disappointed. The flow through the drive thru is fairly quick.  Also after just a first few visits, Precious learned my name and has done a great job remembering it each time since.  She is always friendly and helpful in spite of the conditions (i.e. AZ heat). And though the interactions are brief, her consistent friendliness plays a significant part my return each week.

I've been slightly disappointed with every location that isn't Scottsdale and Mayo. I guess I don't mind driving across town for...Okay, that was GOING to be my review until I realized this location (And the Deer Valley and I17 location) mess my order up most of the time. Well, Deer Valley is more messy, but how can Scottsdale be so spot on with their services and these other locations just...aren't? The service is SO great at Scottsdale and Mayo that when an employee saw if my fries weren't crispy or "well done" they would ask for a remake! It's that simple Chick fil a, THAT'S what makes exceptional service!

Everyone is friendly at this Chick-fila-A. I would like to especially recognize Precious, Hope, Grace, (all sisters) and Abby are always joyful and friendly. They will put a smile on your face when you go. The owner is amazing also. Jesus loves you.

So used to go to Chick-fil-A all the time in the morning to get a good delicious chicken sandwich now all of them have switched to 10:30 here I am it's 10:20 and I can't get a chicken sandwich they can fry up chicken nuggets and all their breakfast chicken sandwiches but they can't make a chicken sandwich so disappointed that the owner would operate this business this way what about all the people that go to work early and breakfast time is there lunch I guess those people don't matter to these businesses anymore looks like Burger King is the only one that cares too bad their food sucks

I've enjoyed this location since the first day they opened for business.  I am always greeted by a friendly employee and of course the food is always great. By far my favorite Chick-fil-et location. If you don't already have the Chick-fil-et app on your phone. please do your self a favor and get it. Points are easily accumulated and as a bonus you will receive random free treats easily assecible with the app.
Hate the people standing at the "speaker" and the new menu boards. Get rid of these people and lower the prices. More expensive now!!! Yuk

This Chik-fil-A is my daily favorite for the great food and amazing, courteous employees! The chicken noodle soup is the best ever, truly no place compares! The salad choices are awesome; my favorite is the Southwest Chicken. Top the soup and salad off with the macaroni & cheese or fries, or if your really hungry, you must try the grilled chicken sandwich! Grab a lemonade as your beverage and your set! Download the app and earn treats for dining there! Do you think I go too much when I pull in the drive through and they know my nameThis awesome Chik-fil-A is my favorite! I'm on my way now! Get the app and you can order ahead for pick up...SWEET
This is the fastest Chic-Fil-A around! Not only is the food tasty and fresh, but the service is SUPERB! Managers and staff communicate effectively, and they serve with a smile! :)

Had a great breakfast today at this Chick-fil-a !Treated my family to the Sausage burritos! They loved them, Very fresh and delicious :) Love the drive thru it's so fast!I do go here often and it's always good!Superior quality and customer service!

This drive thru and staff are professional, nice and courteous.  With smiles on their faces we received our order correctly and so quick.  Down to the correct number of honey mustards! Love this Chick fil a because of the people who run it !

Drive through was so fast! I couldn't keep up and it was during my lunch break which I expected it to take long but the entire process was like five minutes. The ladies that took the order outside were super friendly and efficient. Food was delicious as always. The layout of the parking lot and drive through area was also very smartly designed.

How does this GEM not have a 5 Star Rating. I'd love to overcome the objections of any person who has given them a poor rating because this location is 100% perfection. They have never given me a bad experience. Every employee is friendly and professional. The food always tastes amazing. This specific location is the reason my wife and I love Chick Fil A. I've lived near 59th Ave and Thunderbird for close to 16 years.... I actually used to be a regular at the Circle K before Chick Fil A was even a thought. To be honest, I was actually quite upset when I learned that they were tearing down the Circle K to even build a Chick Fil A. I had probably eaten CFA, 1 maybe 2 times in my life at that point so I wasn't very excited at all. Months and months went by and still no Chick Fil A. Then one day, we saw a fence around the Circle K, a few bulldozers and a giant dirt mound and we knew it was coming. It seemed like it took forever to be built, and then..... One day.... it was there lol. It looked very nice and we HAD to try it. Fast Forward about 2 years..... This is now our families GO TO place. We eat here way more often than we probably should. They always get our order right. They're always fast and friendly. The main word that I can use to describe them is "consistent" Last night we ate here and met the owner for the very first time. He asked if we ate here often and we told him that we ate here 2-3 times a week. It was to our surprise that we had never met him before. He was the nicest guy and it was very clear to my wife and I after talking to him for a few minutes, why this Chick Fil A is so perfect. He thanked us and gave us a bunch of free cards for sandwiches. This location deserves an award. They care about their customers, they care about their food and they care about their employees. No complaints ever in 2 years. Thumbs up guys

This is a great location and all the employees have a great smile on their face always walking by tables make sure everything is ok or if anyone needs anything.The food is always delicious and the play area for kids is perfect

My favorite location. Almost always see the same friendly faces for the last year. It's always kept clean, employees actively check in on those dining to see if anything is needed. Food always ready quickly. People very competent and always seem to have managers available. The playground is the perfect size surrounded by glass walls and door so you can see your kids but don't HAVE to hear them! The only complaint I have is playground was way too full one day with kids and ones that were way to big or old to be inside, I asked a nearby employee if there was anything that could be done and I was told they don't really do anything, it's up to parents. When I mentioned older children being in there she did then enter play ground area and ask them to exit. Which is why I still give 5 stars. I have 3 kids at ages 11, 8 and 2.... my older children do going to the playground with my toddler but no to be very conscious of the little children around them and not to act like crazy people in there. If my children were to miss behave in the playground or be rude to other kids they would be removed by me immediately.

This place is the best came in with the hubby went in line to start ordering. The cashier was a sweet old lady took our order, fast and efficient and gave us a marker to let one of there employees know which order is ours. While waiting for our food was pretty busy but not that much until it hits lunch time then the place gets pretty crazy. But we got our food it was cooked well and was hot and delicious. But once we were done another employee was so sweet she offered us mints. The employees here are pretty awesome & don't mind coming back! I give this place 5 stars and hope they keep doing great will be coming back.

I LOVE THIS CHICK-FIL-A!!! The staff here is amazing! When I went in not to long ago I received such amazing service through the drive thur! There was something I didn't quite understand about the app, and I asked the girl at the window for help (I think her name was Michele or something), but she didn't know so she brought over her manager (I think it was Lilli) but they were both so sweet and smiley and helped me even though there was a long line behind me!! They were very sweet!!

Come here pretty often, usually the service is good. Tonight, though, we ordered food and forgot to ask for pepper jack. Our fault, but ordered the cheese and had to wait for it to come to the table. 10 minutes later still no cheese. My girlfriend went up to the counter to ask for it. Riley was very nice. She was the only one really doing anything. Had a long line and everyone else was just standing around behind her. When asked for the cheese she apologized and asked a girl with red hair and glasses. (Sorry missed her name) she immediately gave attitude. She responded with "ok" and then proceeded to take a tray of food to another table before just getting the single slice of cheese. Not a huge issue but the attitude will make us visit another location from now on.

Love the employees at chick-fil-a! Normally I dine-in but with a newborn is was easiest just to go thru the drive-thru, and shout out to the employees that are out there in this Arizona heat taking orders with a HUGE smile :) decided to try the new BBQ Bacon Sandwich but only thing missing was the BBQ in my sandwich??? seems like they placed a nickle size of BBQ. Paying $10.13 for a small size meal expecting BBQ in your sandwich then realizing once you get home that you didn't get BBQ sauce is not acceptable. Tried calling the store manager but phone number states "not accepting calls at this time". Well looks like I'm out of luck trying to talk to someone at the restaurant and fixing the situation. Would have been an amazing sandwich I'm sure if it had BBQ sauce, bacon was delicious btw!

Been going to Chick-fil-A fit a long time. One of my favorite quick lunch places. Love the nuggets, especially the fried.In the many years I've eaten here, there have only been three times that I was given less nuggets than the twelve count I usually get. All three times they were quick to fix with fresh hot nuggets, always more to make up for the inconvenience. The service is top notch.I sometimes take my time, and the staff is courteous and offers refills and clean up the table. Wish more restaurants offered this level of service and consistent good food.

This is my go to place for a quick lunch! Everyone who works here is super friendly and the food is always fresh!! The spicy southwest salad is so yummy! The owner is also super friendly which keeps me coming back again and again!! Eat more chicken haha
Food is always so tasty. The cookies are always on point! I have never encountered such wonderful customer service as I did at this location.
They always mess up my order...  every time I get a salad it's wrong!  I order lemonade, it's diet.  Getting old.  My Salas today is missing the sides.

Oh my golly! I love chick fil a! Their nuggets with that buffalo sauce!!! Whoooooo weeeee! Trust. Get yourself whatever meal you like there. But you HAVE to get chick fil a sauce, Polynesian, and buffalo sauce!! This will change your world. Once you have your food, open your three sauces, then dip your fry into one of them, and take a bite! Do the same steps with your next bite except into the next sauce! It's gonna be a party in your mouth!! You shall no longer have lonely nights because of that party goin on. Except sundays. Sundays are lonely because chick fil a is closed on sundays.
Let me start by saying I love chik fil a, and I'm not always one to complain. The last 3 times I've went to this location my order was missing something or messed up. Bummer because I live close by

Always have had an excellent experience here.  A manager even went out of his way to snag my dad and myself a cookie to share when he was eyeballing them.  Always clean, great service from their employees, and of course always great food.  Love the location since it is so close.  I bring my nieces there a lot for some awesome awesome lunch dates.

Clean, fast, good food.  New egg white grill was very good and health wise.  Good cup of coffee to go with it.  Not your normal worn out fast food place. Lot's of competition in area, but this is a better choice for overall fast food experience.
Horrible  the chicken sandwich was so thin. Their chicken sandwich are usually thick and juicy. No this was flat and look like it had been pounded to death!  Is this the new way. Not happy!

This Chick-fil-A is all around amazing! Their food is always hot and delicious. I am always surprised of how fast they get my order out whether I'm in the drive-thru or inside. Their staff is also very courteous and you can tell that the people that work there are sincere and genuine. The restaurant has many different seating options from a booth to a table, and they also have a nice play place for the kiddos. I recommend this place to anybody looking for great food and service! I will be coming to this Chick-fil-A for many years to come!I recommend downloading the new Chick-fil-A One app on your phone because they send out free treats randomly and you can also use the app to earn points to gain free treats.

We had dinner here recently.  My husband pulled his phone out of his pocket and a VERY important, work related, security card fell out of the pocket.  He didn't know this happened and was in  panic the next morning when he couldn't find the card.  We searched the house and he realized it might have fallen out at Chick-fil-A.  I called and spoke to Grace.  She said they had the card.  Come to find out they had called my husband's employer and reported that they had found the card and then they locked the card i their safe!  What a blessing!!  The customer service at this place is awesome!  One of our sandwiches was kinda cold and they were very good to replace it with a fresh sandwich and then gave us a card for a free item.  They went above and beyond!  And, thank you Grace for asking me questions before releasing the card to me.  You are awesome!

Chik-Fil-A is eating a hole in the burger market and this new location close to a major hospital makes it easy to see why. Clean, friendly employees provide prompt service. This location has the added benefit of not being an utter madhouse, as well. Yet. The food was spot-on, as always, the seating arrangements are comfortable, the car court for the kids is cute, and this should be your go-to as soon as you get that nasty gash sewn up at Banner Health hospital.

This is probably the best chick-fil-A I've ever been to. They truly represent customer service. Those who work in customer service know how difficult people can be and how annoying customers can get at times.These people do everything with such grace and elegance. To the person who walks around handing mints out, to the manager who also helps people out in the dinning area. I'm coming here everyday

Shout out to the Chik Fil A team for catering my Audit meeting. The Chicken Biscuit minis  were a HIT!Everything was organized and they made the minis as soon as I got there so they stayed Hot. And gave me a large complimentary  iced vanilla coffee as well.
My husband and I love this place, the people and the yummy food. Thank you Troy for opening this location so close to our home.  God bless you!

I just went through the drive thru at the 59th Ave and T-bird location. I live nearby and wanted a fast late lunch. After I ordered and pulled forward I realized my wallet was no where to be found. Embarrassed to say the least I started to explain to the cashier that I live nearby and could come back for the food and pay. Kaitlin was listening and said, "your lunch is on us today." She was so kind and polite! I can't believe  how kind she was. I have had a rough day and left my brain at home. She laughed with me and handed me $15 of free food. I will be back to pay and bring Kaitlin a thank you gift. Chick-Fil-A has a totally different set of values than the world we live in. It's refreshing and I will be back, With money next time!!! Shout out to the 59th Ave employee, Kaitlin for being a bright spot in my day.

I came 2 min after breakfast and was disappointed they had stopped serving breakfast at 10:30. I was craving the little chicken biscuits. The owner bent over backwards to take care of me and gave the the little chicken biscuits even though I missed the breakfast hours. What amazing service especially in this day when companies so often don't have good customer service. I frequently go to this location and have always been pleasantly surprised even when I am having a bad day they lighten the mood with their positivity and amazing food. This will continue to be my restaurant of choice for years to come!!!! Great food and exceptionally amazing service.

Always good. Always clean. Always consistently high quality chicken. I love the spicy chicken sandwich and my wove always gets the regular deluxe. This location was just like others we have tried. The bathrooms were spotless.

Recommend: spicy chicken sandwich, chicken strips, fries, grilled chicken nuggetsCons: the lemonade was way too sweet, even the sugar free version, we had to water it down by a whole lot, also the put so much ice in the drinks, and I don't think there are any refills on any of the drinks- not sure, but it did not seem that refills are being offeredPrice is so so- a bit expensive for fast food I guessAmbience is very nice and clean.Service was good as well especially for fast foodOverall - I would definitely eat here again, but this is not something I can say I would crave for.
We had our nieces 4th Birthday Party here tonight! Megan was our host and she was amazing! Her and her team went above and beyond to make everyone feel welcome. Great food and great service!

This morning my family and I swung by Chick-Fil-A on our way to the hospital to visit our dad.  As we checked out Meghan asked why we were visiting and we explained the circumstances.  She immediately told us our breakfast was on the house and that they all hoped for a speedy recovery.Meghan and her team are the best!  The food was delicious and the restaurant was clean and relaxing.  Thank you so much for a much needed bright spot in our morning!

My Mother and I come here almost daily!!! The chicken is Amazing, the Team members are soooo kind with us and really go out of their way for PERFECT Customer Service!!!! We truly Appreciate that!!! I would Highly recommend this Chick fil A.... If you want THE best chicken and Wonderful service, come here!!!! Loves it!!!!!
Really like the lay out of the new Chik Fil A on 59th and Thunderbird. Staff is amazing and friendly and do a fantastic job of making your experience here enjoyable.
Awesome staff..super helpful... fast, fresh, and delicious. Stop there about 3 times a week. From breakfast to party trays, everything is wonderful.
Love this place! Clean...friendly...the owner Troy is amazing! Food was wonderful! They were busy and everything just moved right along. No delays. This location will be added to our favorites!

I can't believe how nice these people are and that I am only the first one to leave a review! They opened the door for us, served our food, asked if we needed refills every once in a while, had fresh flowers and always had a smile. I really hope that never changes. Good job guys.
Worst customer service I have ever had at a chick-fil-A! Will never go back to this location again. The gal may have been having a bad day, but she doesn't have to take it out on the customer

Omg i absolutely loved showing up today, such a pretty lady that took my order & made me feel welcomed!! She complimented me & gave me a brownie to try!! Dude, I usually come here but today was awesome!! Want to know if I can leave tips for the workers there???

Idk if it has anything to do with the pandemic or something but for some reason every chick fil a gives diarrhea. It sucks because the food is good but the affects are terrible. I thought it was just this chick fil-a but no. Avondale, thunderbird, camelback, and Scottsdale. I tried each one and the next day I'm stuck in the bathroom. It's not just me either because my gf experiences the same thing. I've been staying away because the stomach pains suck. Also don't ever have more than one sandwich omg! The nightmare if you have two.

Drive through line moved quickly. Everything I asked for came out correct and they even included a mint and handy wipe. I don't always get those at other locations. Food was hot and tasted great. Love the nuggs.

This location is by far the worst Chik fil a out there. My order on door dash was wrong from here three different times in a row, with the last one being a completely missed large French fry. That's not to mention when I have walked in and my order was wrong. Also; I agree with everyone on the skinniness of the fries. They give you 4 fries in a box. Do yourself a favor and go the couple extra miles to 59th avenue and thunderbird. You'll be happy you did.

I really can't with this location, if I go in my self they forget to put fries or Mac and cheese and if I order it through door dash seems like the delivery guys gets hungry while delivering? Where can I go for a decent chick fil a ?

I ordered a large fries and small fries. The box for large fries were only half way full and there was only one fry in the small one. It's not even a mistake at this point, it's just insulting. Why don't you just take my money and not even send me the food? Why even bother?

Horrible service I ordered out , they delivered at my door and I'll called to let them know that no sauces were in the bag for my nuggets,  Jessica said ok sorry nothing I can do about it now . I'll talk to my team . 29.00 for what , have every ever ate a chicken nuggets without sauce ,,

Disappointed I really enjoy Chick-Fil-A, the food is usually fresh, tasty, and reasonably priced.  However, this visit, at this location, was very disappointing.As we entered the restaurant we were greeted, our orders were taken promptly, and our food was served quickly.  The food on this visit just wasn't very good.   We ordered the breakfast mini meal.  Everything was either overcooked or maybe the oil was nearing its end.  It just did not taste good.  This won't stop me from going back, just hope next time the food taste better.

Extremely rude customer service. They forgot to put salad dressing with my order. I called to complain and there was no apology. "We're about to close so there isn't anything we can do about that". No remorse at all. They serve dry salads when you specifically ask for dressing and they did not try to make up for their mistake. Not to mention a bug that was crawling around in my bag.

From the moment you walk in, you're treated like a valued guest.  Your patronage is appreciated.  I've received similar treatment from individual employees at some other fast food restaurants,  but with Chik-Fil-A it's the consistent normal behavior. The food is good. I like the taste and quality, and the consistency (there's that word again!).Thank you for always being a place I can count on for a great fast food dining experience.
These are supposed to be large fries. This is pretty horrible. This is the second time we order large fries & receive them like this!

Went to this location on our way downtown and I was highly disappointed. First off, the person taking the orders was trash. We ordered a 3ct spicy tender & grilled nuggets meal with BBQ sauce & a lemonade. We got the 3ct tenders (looked like nuggets), the grilled nuggets were good, but gave us buffalo sauce instead of BBQ & the lemonade was lemon water. We were in a hurry so we didn't even stop to look in the bag before we drove off. Never making the mistake of coming here again

The employee who took my order and the employee who ran my card were both so rude. I also didn't get a, "My Pleasure!" when I told each employee thank you! I will NOT be coming back to this location!!!

REALLY SURPRISED THAT THE SERVICE WAS BAD! the girl who took our order just stared at us and didn't welcome us. And when we got home the order was wrong . We had to say thank you before they said anything to us. And the girl who was taking our order wasn't even wearing her mask, it was under her chin and was joking with the other employee while she took our order.

I usually come to this location because it's closer to me but I always seem to have issues when placing my mobile order, it never gets corrected, and usually I let it go, but today... this is definitely not for it. This is not a portion at all!

I have always loved Chick-fil-A but twice now it's been a crappy experience. Last time I went in I had one of those free cards for a meal and wanted to use it from the last time I was there. The guy at the cash register was really nice and tried to get it to work and asked his manager 3 times for help but manger was too busy packing the food. He then looked at the card and it said I have to redeem it on 12th Avenue.  I said okay and walked out thinking okay whatever.  When I actually got to the car and looked up the address it's not even in Arizona. Like why would they give out a free meal that's not even redeemable in the state. I went and around Christmas time and it was packed. Way over 10 people in there. And most of the employees wasn't even wearing their masks properly. Like wow. Even the cook wasn't wearing a mask at all. I do have video of it too. So disappointed in Chick-fil-A. I waited for 30 mins for some fries and got the free meal card. And was happy to use it next time but it turns out I have to go to another state to use it. Waste of time!!
My kids love this place.  A way better choice than McDonald's, Burger King, Wendy's, etc in my eyes.  The sauces are amazing too

Went there yesterday and a little disappointed. Been going there since they opened this location but their food is getting more salty. Don't know why they feel the need to over-salt everything. Spent $25 and this is the only place I go that puts way too much salt on everything from the chicken to the Mac and cheese.  I am so thirsty once I finish eating.  Probably won't be back.

Service was good no line not a long wait I love the Mobile app ordering it's extremely convenient and always accurate. This dish is good hot fresh and didn't taste stale or cold it was made to order. Hash browns crisp chicken tender and eggs fully cooked. Good dish. They follow the CDC guidelines at this location and are always friendly and helpful! I recommend this location. Til next time.

The service is good and the chicken is great, but the fries are always cold and mostly empty. I just took these out of the bag and the large has the same amount as the medium. The fries are my favorite part too so this is a bummer :/
If u come to chick fl a a lot join their rewards. It's so easy to generate points and get rewards I love it thanks to this chick fil a for letting me go to sign up

If i can give them -5 stars i will do it without hesitation because my sprite wasnt even good it tasted like water nd salt and they didnt even get my order right too really bad place don't recommend it!!

The food was superb! Haven't been to chick-Fil-A in months and the drive thru experience was exceptional! Mia and the nice gentlemen were the ones that stood out to me overall! So professional & understanding and overall the best experience I've had at a fast food restaurant ever!!! Definitely suggest this location for business, efficient staff, quick, and accurate with their routine!

Waited in drive thru for 20 minutes just to to wait another 10 for my food in front of the store. I asked for a 12ct of Chik fil A Nuggets meal and a 8 piece grilled nuggets meal. Got home and was given 2 8 piece grilled nuggets. Called the store and they told me to go back with my receipt. I went back just to wait in line for someone to help me once again. As I'm waiting another customer walks in because they weren't give 2 of their sandwiches. They were helped before me, given a shake for complimentary and weren't asked to see the food. As for me, I had to wait, when I get to the front I was asked if I had the food in hand. The cashier then asked a guy if she should do the meal and he said no only the nuggets. They made me feel uncomfortable for an error on their end by their mannerism towards me. I was not offered anything complimentary or even an apology. I have never been so disappointed let alone experienced anything like I did today.
Disappointed. A half container of fruit for $3.45? That is ridiculous. Normally I love everything Chick Fil A but that's just dumb
Fries empty. One large and one kid sized. Cold. And the box was beat up. Also missing sauces for the salad. I don't understand.

I've been coming to this chik fil a for a few months now but never again. Last week they ran out of chicken yes I said that ran out of frikin chicken. How in the hell do yall run out of chicken.  I decided to give it 1 more shot and went for breakfast a few days later. Ordered 2 ck and egg meals on biscuits. When we got to the window to pay they said they ran out of biscuits.  Baby bye bye byeee never again
Not your best work chick-fil-a. Nearly $40 later, sub par food, missing item and half filled fries. Didn't get the service we know and love from this Chick-fil-A. Disappointed.

I'm not one to get on her to give bad reviews but this chick fil a has messed up my order time after time again. While ordering through the drive through the girl was laughing and clearly not paying attention, I asked them to repeat the order to me 2 times to make sure they got it and they still managed to mess it up. Chick fil a prides themself on great customer service and this location is terrible! If I could give them negative ratings I would.

I frequent this location, getting breakfast on my morning commute.  The Staff is always professional and friendly. The Chicken Biscuit, Chicken Minis, and Chicken Burrito are great.  The soda sucks (but that's the same at all Chick-Fil-A stores) so I get a bottle of Orange Juice or Water with my meals.  The hash browns and French fries are always a gamble. Sometimes they are crisp and heaven on earth, and sometimes they are soft, soggy, floppy and depressing

I love going to this Chick-Fil-A! They have always been courteous, efficient, and accurate in handling my orders. The food has consistently been delicious. I particularly recommend the grilled chicken club, the macaroni and cheese, and the waffle fries with Chick-Fil-A sauce.
I love Chick-fil-A. I eat here all the time. But today I went and ordered a large chicken nugget meal. I get home and this is the "large fries" this is what I paid for. It's not even to the top.

Really disappointed. I came at lunch time and was completely aware I was going to have to wait. Not a big deal. Everything was smooth with ordering until it came to the contact with the employees. Girls taking payment ran my gift cards and then told me their iPad died and to pay at the front, then went back to talking.. at the window and the cashier had me swipe my gift cards and only one worked- because the other cashier swiped them too. So then I hear her talking to what looked like a manager and she said that I was going to have to pay for it. The cashier told me that my gift cards would work after the other transaction canceled. So I'm sure they won't work. Then they finally give me my food and I'm missing the salad- the salad that I talked to the person taking my order specifically about their salad dressing options. They look at me and tell me it's not on the order and they just look at me. At this point I'm not waiting anymore especially after all of the staff at the window could care less. I look at my receipt and the salad dressing I chose is added to one of my kids meals- but still wasn't in the bag. I rarely come to this location but I will avoid from here on out. I have never had any problem whatsoever with any chick fil a location but these people didn't care. I know it's busy- but you know you're busy every day at lunch.  Two managers just looking at me with nothing to say and no way to try and make it right.  Very poor customer service.

They forgot my milk shake, my husband goes back to pick it up, and the guy at the window is saying he is sure he gave it to us! Um no you didn't buddy! Not everyone is out to get free food. So before you insult someone and make assumptions to your job correctly!

I work for a delivery company and one of our customers ordered from this Chick-fil-A and she ordered it 15 minutes before they closed I got there right at the closing time and they did not have the order ready said they were not going to fulfill the order and they scream they said I was burned the lady was extremely rude very unpleasant and beat me personally I would never eat at this Chick-fil-A ever in my life again and anyone else that I could tell him not to go there I will

This place is literally across the street from my house and I have a Chickfila addiction so I come here almost EVERY day. I always get the same thing. Either the 2 or 3 piece chicken strips with a medium or large fry (depending on if I'm  sharing with one of my kids or not) and a water with no ice. They have a bad habit of over salting the fries and only giving me one full chicken strip. They will put a quarter or half of a chicken strip in with the full one and count that as the second one which is unacceptable. I usually don't complain because let's be honest I could probably do without the extra calories but when I am sharing with my kids it is quite upsetting. Not to mention the fact that they charge per strip. The first time I complained to them about this they refused to do anything because I had thrown away the receipt even though they see me there all the time. The second time I complained about it I physically brought the food right back to them after getting it and they gave me a coupon for a cookie. I said I didnt want a damn cookie I want the chicken strips I paid for.  They have done it to me once again but since their restaurants are closed due to covid19 the only way to make a complaint is wait in the drive thru line that wraps around the building or call. I tried calling multiple times but no one answered so I decided to voice my complaint here with a picture of the "3" chicken strips I ordered.

Okay, I'm not gonna lie, I've put off eating at Chick-fil-A for quite some time. Not sure why because this place SLAPS. I'm not normally a big fast food girl, but this was great. I got the chicken nuggets and there was a surprisingly large ratio of meat in them! I was happy about this as it made me feel less bad eating fried food. AND they provided options to takeaway during COVID - saving me from starvation and the world from COVID.

Lady at the drive thru had an attitude so I told her to lighten up. She replies "oh sorry I've been here since 8." As if that has anything to do with me. To cap it off the experience, look at my "large" fries. Half a box. This is terrible CFA.

I got in line only to find out once I was stuck in line I could only do 2 separate orders not 3 I have a year's worth of # 1 meals which is the last month to use it. The cards make you do them 1 at a time so they have to be separate. They refused to accommodate me then I was told to go up front they would take care of me there & bring it to the car, only to be told I have to go through the line twice because 1 more separate order was going to make a huge impact on the line. After having to go through going through twice having me emotional by the time I got to my end destination the food was cold. I'll never go back again they didn't even fill the container full of fries half full. Very insensitive for what's going on & I work for the CDC I understand safety but having to go through the line again for 1 separate order was simply ridiculous. Putting me through extra risk staff at risk their not changing their gloves touching peoples credit cards then touching their masks readjusting them. Like I said I won't be back the manager on staff today was very rude

My husband paid over $26 for us to get this much amount of waffle fries (including our daughters meal) let alone we asked for a Large and got a Medium. We usually never check our bags because we trust in Chick-fil-A but this is the second unpleasant encounter  I've gone through just in this week @ the same location !! And we always come here but now id rather drive an extra 5 miles then too come back to this location. Also,I kid you not the same Employee that help us the previous encounter attended us with such negative attitude (I thought to myself on the previous encounter maybe she was having a bad day but it seems to me that it is just her appearance or something) at the time being I didn't have my glasses with me so I was unable too see the menu cause apparently now they have a whole crew of employees outside taking your order with tablets/ at the drive thru area. So the girl helping us rudely said "i can't let you hold it, you have to see it from here" standing 6 feet away from our car. I'm already blind as a bat, so we told her we would wait for the ACTUAL drive thru menu because hence I had already forgot my glasses and cannot see anything. So she proceeded to give this type of body language as if she is annoyed by us not taking the order and making faces to her peers around. I'm a huge advocate to being caution due to the COVID but being rude to a customer for no apparent reason is completely unfair and unnecessary. At this point it wasn't so much about the food anymore, it was more due to her crappy customer service and if she cannot represent her work, i can't imagine what her work ethic would be.

We have gone to this location several times and it has been ok. We just went on Friday February  27th 2020. When we pulled up to the drive through, it took 2-3 minutes for someone to come on the speaker, which is odd for this restaurant. The three sandwiches and two drinks cost almost $18. It took a while to get through the line. My two sandwiches with extra  pickles, came with NO pickles. Their rewards point system did not work. All of  the chicken sandwiches had an odd taste, almost like a slightly burnt favor. Not sure if they were using old oil on the sandwiches, but they did not have  the good flavor that Chic fil let usually has. The standards and this location appears to be slipping!
This place gets worse every time I go. Definitely switching locations. Order is always wrong, rude workers in the drive thru they won't even let you finish your order, salt ass hell fries!!
Chick fil a is good.  But they have a problem with serving sizes of fries.  I ordered a large fry, and got the equivalent of a small inside the box.  (Refer to pic)

Like a lot of chick fil a restaurants when you ask for "no pickles" they will remove the pickles from the burger but this will often leave an awful smell of rotten pickles on the sandwich, this restaurant is one that leaves the awful pickles smell on their sandwiches, f*** pickles and their awful smellBtw this chick fil a sucks they leave pickles on burger and food smells like b.o. fucthis restaurant This restaurant is awful , from customer service to food quality , absolute pure garbage of an establishment

I am a huge fan of Chick-fil-A at this location is the slowest drive through I've ever experience! I'm stuffed between cars so I cannot get out of line but I've been waiting for over 10 minutes just to get through the drive-through and there's not even a lot of cars. Super surprised and disappointed  in the lack of efficiency

I stopped by yesterday at the drive thru, placed my order, repeated it. Got to the window and it was incorrect. I stated it again, the woman brought it back. I left, got to where I was going, they again got the order wrong and they overcharged me. I called, it rang 20 times, I then left a message, have not heard back from them. Listen to what the customer is ordering as we are paying for the order to be correct. Go anywhere but here!

Chick-fil-A prides themselves on getting orders right but I swear this one literally never gets my order right and I go at least once a week. If I order cheese I literally never get the right cheese or I don't get cheese at all. And I order pepper jack so it's the only white cheese that they have yet I'll get American and then right now I ordered American and I got none. I don't get it
Don't come during lunch time. This place is super sloooowwwwwww!!!!!Food taste like chick fil a like it's suppose to. But the wait.... oh my. Reconsider coming back to this location

Today I had enough with this location. I'm a red status with chick-fil-a, so that tells you we enjoy their food. Stay away from this location tho as the parking lot it always a mess and over crowded. We are frequent drive thru customers at this particular location because the messy dine in/kids area and lets not forget you need a code for the restrooms. For some reason something is ALWAYS missing or incorrect with our order, thankfully we usually check our food before we leave the line. I just don't get why it's my job to remind them of my kids chocolate milk, ice cream cones and sauces or even have to check my order before we leave the drive thru line. The day I left my phone charging at home so I wasn't able to scan my code to earn points and my husband decided to give the receipt to the drive thru girl to toss is the day we needed proof of the purchase (we paid cash on top of it ). We got home and our order was incorrect when I called to notify the restaurant they told us since we have no receipt we can either go back right now to get it corrected or "theirs nothing we can do." But no apologies at all, I mean not even once! I notified the person on the phone if they really need the receipt it's in the drive thru area. and lets not forget they don't over use the phrase "my pleasure." We will be traveling a little more and start going to 59th Ave and Thunderbird were Troy is an incredible store operator along with his team.

I live Chick-fil-a but I always have issues at this location. I was there a few weeks ago and my fries were cold as soon as I got them and today my chicken strips were completely overcooked and they gave me regular when I asked for spicy.
Brittney and Daysha were the nicest and most amazing girls there with their customer service and very sweet they made my day really good!!! I hope they get recognized for this!!!!

I'm not from the area but I was craving Chick-fil-A and we found this place! I stopped here with my family & the customer service was on POINT. I don't usually write reviews either but Brittney? (The one who took my order through the drive thru) was super sweet! I don't know who has been greeting the other customers but for Brittney's attentive service, I give this place a 10/10! For the food, I would give it a 8/10. Brittney was very attentive and even put in two extra packets of sauce for me because I guess she sensed I was feeling a bit down. It's the little things that matter most! I'll come back if I'm ever in the area again!

I just came from here and the food was fucking disgusting. The soda was basically water and everything else was terrible. I am never coming here again. Bad service for sure. I regret spending $15 here and wish I can get my money back. I ended up throwing the drinks away and not finishing my food. Unsure of what happened but this is unacceptable.

This location is so amazing! I live very close so I've gone twice in the last two weeks for fast food pickup for myself and my kids. Brittney has been the person who greeted us at the drive through pickup window and she is just simply the best. She interacts with my kids, asks their names and ages, and just treats them like people. A lot of fast food workers at other places won't even say hi back to them (we always have all windows down so they can see what's going on). I just love how sweet and generous Brittney is. Also, my food is always hot, cooked well, my order has never been wrong, and there is plenty of dipping sauces.

I'm giving three stars because after all it's only a fast food restaurant for crying out loud.  I never rave over any fast food. However it was good. Didn't have to wait long at all and the cashier was very friendly.   The store was very clean. I got exactly what I ordered no mess ups.

I'm already not a fan of chick fil a but every now and then I like to give it a shot. This chick fil a is the worst of them all. The last 3 times I've been there they mess up my order beyond repair and have never once made it right. I order one thing and they give me another. I order a large and they give me a small. Your job isn't hard. What's hard about putting the correct food in my bag? Fuck this place. Jesus would be disappointed.

These sandwiches are just as good as the first time I had one back in the early 90s inside of Metro Center mall! Today I had the #2 a Chick fil A deluxe with waffle fries & a sweet tea just over 8$ & I ate it all but a few fries, so it's very filling. The customer service was very friendly & they got the order right wth the right sides & sauces so that's always a few extra points. I went through the drive thru but I have yet to see a Chick fil A dirty inside or out! The price is not too high in my opinion because the quality & size are on point & it's not heavy with grease! If you're looking for a healthier option that taste great & that's not outrageously priced you've gotta give this place a try!..

This is the WORST location every darn time. I go in this time because they mess up in the drive thru. Place my order, it's repeated back correctly, my receipt is correct. I get my order told back to me correctly but when I get home (which isn't close) I have a completely wrong sandwich. Every. Time.
They forgot to put ketchup in the bag again . Even after reminding them to do so. It's happening all the time there. Or they will. Trow some jelly. Who eats their Frye's with jelly.

Stopped for breakfast. My husbands looked great.  Sausage egg and cheese biscuit. I can't eat American cheese so I requested the same without cheese. The top part of the biscuit was very thin and the egg was thin as well. They must have removed the cheese off of a pre-prepared sandwich. All that messing with the biscuit my have been the reason the egg was cold. I was expecting better from this company. From a service point, when she handed me two bottles of orange juice I asked her to place them in a bag. Seeing I was alone in the car, it still surprised her that I wanted them in a bag.

I love Chick-fil-A and I've been to this one several times with delicious food that is made quickly and delivered hot to your table. The customer service is really good too there. Always pleasant, smiling, asking if they can bring you something when they deliver  your food. I would have given them an 5 star review, but this review is written on my experience yesterday with their curbside delivery and online ordering because that seriously needs work, at least in my opinion based on what happened yesterday. I placed the order through their mobile app. It was a large order, I will admit, as we were feeding 6 people for dinner. It was a basic order, no substitutions for this or that. When I placed the order, I thought I read a message on the site that said "drive on over and when we see you we will start preparing your food so it will be fresh." I thought that was a bit odd but since we live about 10 minutes away, I got into the car and drove over. I parked at the signs that said for curbside delivery only. I went in only to say I was there for curbside delivery and i was requesting a lot of their sauce. I did get a lot of sauce. I went back to my car and waited. After about 10 minutes with no food coming out, I went in to check on the status of the order. I asked someone at the counter who went over to who I presume was the manager. The manager said "we have a curbside order?" She went over and checked and I thought I heard her say something like "it didn't release it." But then a big piece of paper came out, I'm assuming our order. They did begin to process it but it was a big order. They did a great job on that and the order was accurate as ordered. So their curbside delivery/app ordering let them down. And that's the reason I gave a low rating. Perhaps an adjustment needs to be done to it. We'll be back and we'll probably try curbside delivery/app ordering again.

Came to this location today and received subpar customer service. When I come to chick fil a my bar is already set high because I know their customer service should be fantastic. Came in today received no "thank you" and no " it's my pleasure"   Instead insert eyes rolls and me saying thanks to the staff. Just bad customer service Got my order, took it to go and then got home to find out that my order was incorrect. Was really annoyed called the store and got the voicemail. Left a voice mail and no one returned my call. Called back a little later, a manager answered and didn't really have anything to say about the customer service I received. Just said she would replace my sandwich and the offer was only on the table for the week. Just go down the street to Canes a Non-Christian company that knows how to give great customer service
fast, friendly service. wish the play area was a bit bigger but my 4 and 5 yr old really enjoyed themselves

This is by far the worst CFA that I have ever wasted my money on. After waiting in a long line for my food, I left with food that was cold. When I got home I called the store directly, but there was no answer. After multiple attempts, I decided to call the customer service number. The lady speaking to me on the phone, seemed to care and she stated that she would have the manager from this location reach back out to me. A few days passed, and I decided to call customer service again, and get an update. This time a gentleman took my info down, and stated he would get the message to the stores manager that same day. Long story short, CFA seems like a nice company, until they mess up and you want them to acknowledge the mistake on their end. So far, I have had no follow up after that last call, so I will not be going to CFA again. Yeah it's "just food" but my money is my money.

This place always a mad house .... I had a not pleasing experience multiple times were I voiced my complaints to the supervisors yet nothing has change ...Multiple times I will order food and some how they forget to process my order and after 20 min of waiting they will ask me if I need help or I have to go the front and ask for my order and it is always the same answer sorry we gave it to someone else or we did not process it the worst service

They cook their chicken in highly refined peanut oil, which has filtered out the protein which causes allergic reactions. They need to post this in bigger fonts, black lettering. Not coming back because I had to find answers on the internet, not the clueless employees.

Sadly I didn't have a pleasant experience today at this location. I had ordered through the drive-thru. The person that took my order was very nice; she made sure she had everything correctly. I have never felt like I should check my order to make sure everything is there because they always do great with making sure you get your order correctly. When I got home, I notice my kid's meal was missing the fries. I was very disappointed mainly because if your ordering through the drive-thru is because you're already in a rush.  I call to let them know about the issue, and they told me I could come back and bring the food and I would get a cookie. I decided not to go back; I don't live around the corner to drive aging. I shouldn't have this issue to beginning. On top of it all I got no ketchup but three chick-fil-a sauce which I don't like. I'm only giving two starts just because the girl that took my order got it right sadly after that it was handled wrong.

I would never go to this location anymore, its seems that are not trained to work on big orders, they have missed up my order and I had to drive 20 minutes back so i can get the rest of the food, and they didn't even say sorry, very disappointing

Ordered coffee through drive we come to the window and they don't even have coffee made.  Now we're waiting on the curbside delivery for coffee and it's been 5 minutes and still no coffee.  Getting ready to leave without our coffee such bad service.

Your manager failed to fulfill this order [attached], ignored my questions, and sent me home hungry without addressing the issue. This afternoon, a family from school offered to treat me to a Chick-fil-a lunch. We placed an order together, and they happened to choose a location 20 minutes in the opposite direction of my commute. But what high school teacher in Phoenix can afford to say No to a $9.18 gift of Chick-fil-a?When I got to the store, the manager told me not only that my order wasn't there, but that no orders had come through in the last hour. There was an order sitting on the counter that looked like mine, but the manager wouldn't check to see whether it was mine. I was hungry, but I wasn't about to dish out $9.18 of my own, so I drove 45 minutes home.

Always great food!Newer employees there I think, as it seems if I have anything like a gift card purchase - it throws the young folks off a bit. Thankfully, there's always awesome team leads there to step-in...I just feel bad about causing a delay.  Everyone be lovin' the Chick-Fil-A and wanting their food!! They asked me for ID as well when I was buying giftcards with Apple-Pay.  Not sure what that was all about, but never hurts to show folks my license. They keenly put my name on the order without asking me, so these kids pay attention!

If i can give no stars i would. I ordered a spicy delux and large fries with with some honey barbecue sauces. When i arrived home to eat the fries tasted like they were just preheated. The chicken from the spicy delux was all squishy and had some sort of taste to it and i didnt get any sauce either. I tried calling them but they don't pick up their phone.
So good ! Service is always on top of the game! Destin was very good and attentive with everything with needing sauces or refills on drinks ! Will be back !

The worst manager! (On Friday afternoon). I ordered a kids meal thru the drive thru and they forgot my grilled nuggets, so I had to go all the way back for them in rush hour time. When I pulled up to the window they asked me if I wanted them?. I was like of courseeeee I want the nuggets that I paid for $7 for a kids meal. I asked if they could do something for the inconvenience, and she said all they could do was a small fry. NO ONE EVEN EVER APOLOGIZED!.

Went through the drive through with a very simple order: 4 ct chicken strip meal with mac n cheese times 2. Chicken for my husband and I and mac n cheese for my kiddo cause he was celebrating having a good week and that was his reward of choice. Got home to find no mac n cheese in the bag, okay mistakes happen. So I called so I could ask them to just have it ready for me so I could have them run it outside so I didn't have to bring my other (infant) son inside the restaurant. I called SEVEN times and no one answered the phone. So after driving back, bringing my infant son inside, I was annoyed. The manager said "well it's rush hour" when I told her I tried calling first - not even an apology. Then she went and bagged other peoples orders first and finally brought me the missing items and gave me two breakfast vouchers. I told her we don't come in for breakfast I would prefer a partial refund and she said "how about a cookie?" Fuck your cookie.**update** they called me after 9pm to try to talk about the situation...apparently they missed the part of the review where I talked about having an infant and a toddler. I told them not to call after 9pm so they called again this morning at 10am and said sorry. That's it. Just sorry.

The reason for the 2 star is because every time I come to this chick-fil-a I never get the amount of sauces that u ask for, I mean I'll pay extra to get the amount That i asked for if it's just a problem to get extra sauce. I mean why even bother to ask me how many would I like if I'm not getting what i asked for. It would be nice to just say YES to the GUEST.

Today was a busy lunch I get that but my coworker and I ordered two number 6's and the drive thru lady even repeated it back we  paid and took it back and got the original chicken sandwich not what we ordered. This is the first time chick fil a has messed up my order and I get it it's lunch hour but if you read it back right, how the hell of you get it wrong?

This is the 2nd or 3rd time I was unable to eat inside the restaurant due to the temperature. It's 47 degrees outside and not only do they not have the heat turned on in the lobby, the AC is going full speed ahead. There is literally no place that you can sit inside without the AC blowing directly on you. Ridiculous!

Got the mini chicken biscuit platter; it was well priced, hot and fresh. I have to say.. Chick-fil-A is the only place where I can order my food rather be the drive-thru or inside I never have to double-check to make sure my food is correctly prepared and hot. I can always count on the friendly staff to go above and beyond to ensure I leave a happy customer.
I love this Chick-fil-A!! The staff seem tu o always be happy. On the mornings that I go to pick up breakfast, I've always been greeted with a smile.

how do you run out of chick-fil-a sauce!?i cane's would never run out of sauce. It's the signature sauce how do you run out if it?! If anything you should have over stock. Great service but man I was missing my chick-fil-a sauce. Ruined my dinner

I come here often, mostly for the frosted lemonade drink and nuggets.  Last night I went through drive through and ordered a Cobb salad. The salad comes with a packet of add-ons that really make the salad. They put in a packet of granola instead. Really doesn't go well with Cobb salad. Last time I was here they failed to put in the dip that goes with the nuggets.  One time they gave me change for a ten when I gave them a twenty. I called to let them know. Left a message because they didn't answer phone. Did not get a call back. Stopped by today to inform them and they apologized and said they would be more careful. I don't think that is a good way to treat a loyal customer.  Guess I'll try Canes chicken

This is my neighborhood CFA, so I'm always here! I've never had an issue with it...unless I'm going through the drive through. I ordered a side salad and this is why I got.....if I'm about to pay top dollar for a side salad - I expect it to at least look nice. Which I never have a problem with when I dine in. Had I not been in a rush I would have asked for a refund or exchange.

This is location has the friendliest staff ever! The man who assisted us was very peppy and enthusiastic....very rare to find these days. The restaurant was super clean as well. Not one ketchup packet out of place at the counter. I love chick-fil-a's fries and all the sauces!

Great service. Friendly with fresh food. Clean environment. I asked for extra sauce and many location give one or two but this location actually gave me what I was asking for. You can't go too wrong with Chick-Fil-A another great experience.

i ordered in the drive thru for my and a few friends and they got our order wrong first off we asked for a water bottle and didn't receive it. We also ordered the spicy chicken sandwich with no pickles, and got pickles on it. They also gave us a extra drink that had coke in it. We asked for sauces and multiple ones of the sauces and they gave us 1 of every sauce and we asked for plenty more and didn't get it.

Ordered catering services, food was delivered and set up by the time requested. The previous day, I received a call and a text, when I didn't answer, from a staff member confirming having received online order. The delivery person was very professional and ensured everything was correct. Nothing missing!

Location is clean and the staff are very friendly, which is not something that you typically find in most fast food restaurants. We ordered the spicy chicken sandwhich and an order of fries. The sandwhich was in great condition and actually had some spice to it. No sogginess, not smashed, but in great condition. Overall, this is a great location to stop for a quick bite.

I enjoy going to chic fil a. However, when I specifically ask for 3 sauces I expect 3 sauces in my bag to go. It's been 3 times now where they don't give me the amount I ask for. Service is great, food tastes well, but if I dot have the sauces I asked for as part of my meal then I cannot truly say that I was satisfied. I usually would over look the mistake but it's just happening way to often now.
Excellent service and place to be with great staff! That's why I'm here everyday!!! Every time I'm here it's great so come by and enjoy!!
This place is a well oiled machine! We walked straight in, ordered our food to go, and it was ready within 5 minutes. The chicken tenders are amazing!!!

I've never had a issue until I came to this location. Went thru the drive thru. The cashier read my order correct. Then when I get home. I have nothing on that order. Besides the receipt for the upgrades I had. I live to far to return to that exact location.. good food ButJust some attention to details could've made this a great experience like any other location I've visited in the past

My experience today was probably the worst experience I've had with chick-fil-a thus far! It started off by the young man who took our order through drive through, we had to repeat ourselves multiple times. Then, usually they ask you what sauces you want before you finalize the order and they didn't ask. So we thought, that's fine we'll ask at the window. Or they'll ask us, how they usually do it. The lady at the window was named Jordynn, she gave us our food & she had attitude right off the back. When she failed to ask what sauces we wanted, we asked her for some and we had our bag of food in the car with us already so we thought she would just hand it to us, but no. She literally threw the sauces from the window to the bag that was inside the car. That was very rude and not okay by chick-fil-a's standards I'm sure of it. I've always had nice pleasant people at any chick-fil-a. Not this one. Probably won't return to this location again.

Not sure if the cashier didn't hear us but my boyfriend had to say he wanted Coca Cola about three times. As for the service, it was fast but the cashier wasn't very happy like other cashiers at the camelback location. Our food was prepared well. However, my fries were a little salty.

They love to use old stale tortillas as well as not fill up all the chicken mini biscuits with chicken and leave you just an empty biscuit. When you call to complain they do nothing to fix the meal that you're trying to enjoy but will tell you they'll send you a coupon for your next meal
Alaina made our experience 100 times better than we expected. My coworker & I are from Los Angeles, we're here on a business trip & she treated us so well & was always very attentive!

Came here for receipt day. You buy whatever you like and keep your receipt and come back the next month and give them the receipt that you kept and you get the same food free. So basically eat twice for the price of one. Really good deal. The next receipt day is April 14. Their chicken is super good. I love the Chick-fil-A deluxe. And their soup is super good. They have chicken tortilla or chicken noodle soup. My brother loves the spicy deluxe. Their sauces are good. They have a play place inside. Also there's seats outside. Download their app to earn points and earn free food.
Tiah helped me in the drive through today. She was quick, polite, knowledgeable and overall a model employee. Food was super delicious and hit the spot.

We frequent this location and it's always clean, the staff is friendly and the food is always fresh and great!We definitely recommend to anyone that's looking for a delicious quick meal.  Definitely a favorite

Got a pick up order friday... 2 kids meals with the ice cream cup instead the toy... why oh why, would someone of even moderate intelligence put frozen ice cream in with hot food? Ever have refrozen melted ice cream? It's not pleasant AND the kids got cold chicken tenders. Yeah guys... not a winning night. Next time please put the ice cream either in a to go cup holder or it's own separate bag... for the love of Frosty.

Great customer service but the chicken was not that great, specially since I found hair in my chicken. Literally cooked into the chicken too. 4 gray short hairs I found, after that I stopped eating them. I am disgusted.

I'm sorry but this place is over rated. The chicken was not all that great and pretty salty. I ordered an 8 piece chicken nugget and I couldn't believe what I was seeing... The nuggets are so small and I was still hungry after I finished my meal.

I have been to many Chick Fil As in Tucson and this Phoenix location has the best service I've ever seen. Me and my school group (about 20 people), came in and we ordered and got our food within 10 minutes. The workers we really nice and very efficient and productive. The food was good for fast food. I also recommend the frosted lemonade!!

I don't understand what all the hype is. Food is ok. I got better chicken tenders and strips at KFC and Buschs chicken. Chicken was half done with batter. Not impressed. Only went there due to co workers going.

Food is consistent but service is poor. I ordered a meal 2 times ago with a side salad instead of fries and received salad dressing and fries, no salad. Placed same order today and again didn't get a salad but caught before I left. No apology and still confusion at the window. This was after repeating my order twice in line and having it repeated back to me

Did not get my order right after clarifying my order THREE times. This is by far the most disorganized and disappointing chick fil a I've ever been to. I would not recommend unless you want a surprise order that is nothing like what you intentionally ordered. I guess it's my mistake that I did not check the bag after I received it but I thought I was ordering from an organized establishment not one run by children.

Disappointed with this particular store. Nary a discount.... neither military nor senior. I do know this is an owner's choice, so I'll vote with my wallet and not patronize this store.
