Nor, do you have to wait 15 minutes to get served an ice cream cone like the clown restaurant.Because this restaurant gives stellar service and the food is good I eat here once a day. I know there are a few more customers that frequent this store as much as I do. I am sure they share the same feelings.I thank the owner, Lourdes and her staff for being a part of my life and make feel special.Not many restaurants, fast food or otherwise can exceed the great value and service  this restaurant offers.

I like Chick-Fil-A. They deserve props for inventing the chicken sandwich, for the cute cow commercials and for maintaining their religious principles. That said, I don't really care for this location. It's cramped, with a lot of tables and a children's play area crammed into a very small space. Also, no way to refill your soda on your own. Chick-Fil-A overall is a bit expensive for what it is, perhaps in part a consequence of its closed on Sunday policy.I tried their grilled chicken nuggets a la carte on my recent visit. How disappointing. They came out soggy, sealed in a plastic container, where they had apparently been for quite some time. Gross! Gross! Gross! Definitely no resemblance to the promotional photographs! When I mentioned how disgusting they were to another family member, they immediately asked, "Did you go at lunchtime?" "They make bigger quantities in advance at lunchtime and the food then is never as good." Hmm. Makes some sense, I guess. Still, over five bucks for six tiny slime covered grilled nuggets and the smallest small sized soft drink I've seen in years, leaves me less than enthusiastic in any case. Plus, call me silly, but I like to eat lunch at lunchtime.
Love this place. One of the three fast food places I go to.Best chicken nuggets and waffle friesThe lemonade is super good as wellI love the grilled chicken sandwich alsoIt is fresh all the time

I love this place ! I could eat there everyday... The staff is very friendly and always makes sure you are satisfied.P.s: notice that employees can't say "your welcome" instead they say " my pleasure ". Lol

Great customer service and high quality, delicious food every time. There was a line wrapped around the building and I waited no more than 3 minutes after ordering to get my food. They had a young man outside taking orders which made the ordering process smooth and very efficient. Good job Chik Fil A!
The food was good, really overpriced.  The service was great. Everything was really clean for a fast food place.  It seems like every time I get to have Chic fil a that their food shrinks.
So yummy!!  Healthier than most fast foods.  They are also much cleaner.  I enjoy using their Chik-Fil-A sauce!  Make sure to try it!  They are super fast and very friendly.

There is another Chick Fil A five minutes from my house, but I drive 15 min to this location because they have the most fun and friendly staff!  I always feel welcome when I come in. The food is fantastic! Chick Fil A has the best chicken nuggets, waffle fries and fresh lemonade!  Yum!
Love this place, try the chicken bagel spicy.  Amazing!  Always go here any chance I get.  Thanks.

I have been going to Chick-fil-A's all across the country and I absolutely love it! All of the staff is the highest quality out of any place I've ever been! The food is great, and is pretty well-priced. The prices have gone up over the years, but not enough to truly deter people, I don't believe. The kid area was fun for me years ago, and I know it still holds the same value today. They easily have the best sweet tea out of any place I have ever been to, and am proud to say that I will never stop going to Chick-fil-A!

Gross bathroom, and dirty play area. I go to many locations, never seen one that makes McDonald's seem clean. Until now. Play area had chunks missing in floor.  Changing station looked to be on its last leg.  Over disgusting.  Had to ask for sauces, never at any other location. Just seemed odd, kept behind counter. .unlike other locations.  Sauce theft an issue here? I won't return to this location ever.

The only reason I give this chickfila on Tatum 2 stars is because chickfila's food is so good. BUT this chickfila is so poorly run! If you go through the drive thru expect to wait at least 10 min. Do not go when you are in a hurry. It is so slow. Also they rarely get your order correct and you MUST check your order, including your drink, before pulling away. This chickfila needs some help with speed and accuracy, it is not run like all the other chickfila's that I have visited through the years

The last time I went to a Chick-Fil-A was about 15 years ago in the mall and was unimpressed and it would have been a 2.  They have gotten better.  I chose the grilled chicken breast combo and it was ok.  The fries were not very crispy.  Afterward I was told by friends I should have gotten the original delux and I would have preferred the taste but I assumed there were fewer calories, salt and fat in the grilled and I was correct when I checked.  The restaurant was clean and everybody was pleasant.  So they have moved up from avoiding them to acceptable but not going out of my way.

This location is always clean and the staff is friendly. I visit here when the truck is being serviced next door. The same team always seem to be working the front as well. Pristine both for food and experience!

Love their chicken sandwiches and biscuits! Their lemonade is awesome, as well. The service at this location is always fast and friendly. The food is hot and fresh. I stop here pretty often for breakfast on my way to work. You can order a sandwich instead of a biscuit for breakfast, if you prefer! :)

The classic chicken sandwich with cheese is fantastic for a quick lunch.But I have stopped going altogether because the woman who works the dining room during lunch insists on having 3 different interactions while I am trying to chew my food.First time she asks if everything's ok.  Next time she asks if she can refill my untouched soda.  And the third time she asks if she can take my tray. I recognize that probably follows her training guidelines. But it is not working for this guy.All I want is 20 minutes of peace while I eat.  I am more than capable of expressing any unmet needs.

What can I say except I have soft spot for Chick-fil-A.   Perhaps it's their world-famous chicken sandwich. Or perhaps their hatred of the sacred cow.  Either way I like it.   I prefer the plain old number one sandwich combination, hold the pickle.   Also, their milkshakes are rather tasty.  However, their waffle fries could use some improvement, . as could their approach for filling up soda behind the counter. Other than that, I'm sorry Yelp, I'm giving a fast food restaurant four stars.
Went at the busy hour of lunch, they were on their game in and out of the drive thru in less than 10min. Love the chicken wrap with spicy sauce and love the waffle fries.

Five starsI grew up on CFAIt is Hot Good and well Extra Good. Order what you like its all GOOD.All white mean chicken the king of sandwiches when it comes to chicken. The fries are the best ever to touch your lips and gums. They have pure honey & they know I'm on my way so they never run out.

Yum yum yum..... I wanna rub chick fil a's chicken all over my face! It's soooooooooo good! Get a number five. 12 piece... The 8 will not be enough. Yum. Honey as ur dipping sauce is amazing! The waffle fries are delightfully delicious. The lemonade is the best you have ever had! I'm scared that this location is so close to my house. This location is clean and the staff is very friendly!

Fast food can be delicious, at least at Chik-Fil-A!I met some moms here for a little play date and lunch, I hate McD's and this is another option - a better, cleaner, more nutritious and delicious option.UPS:My daughter hates nuggets, any nuggets, anywhere.  She LOVED these nuggets and the fruit cup, she finished it all!  The play area is smaller but it's nicer and cleaner and has less kids running around (at least on this afternoon).They have delicious and fresh salad options which also come with their scrumptious chicken (you can get grilled too).  Love the dressings!Friendly and helpful staff.DOWNS:A little pricey for those fresh salad options (almost $8)Sucky kids toys (comic book?)

After a long day at work and didn't feel like cooking dinner so I decided to pick up some Chick-Fil-A on my way home. I get there around 6:30 to a FULL drive-thru. After waiting almost 15mins in the drive-thru line alone I get to order and quickly get my food. I pull out of the plaza and stop less than a block away at a red light so I decide to check my food. I clearly noticed I had someone else's order because it was not even close to mine. I make and immediate u-turn and return to the still very long drive-thru line. I finally get to the order speaker and explain what happened. I'm asked to pull up to the window and a very youth and confused teenager tries to make it seem like I'm wrong because that's what I ordered and paid for like it said in the receipt. By now I'm steaming mad and ask for a manager. The manager with plenty of attitude takes the wrong food back and gives me my correct order. I ask her what about the difference between what I paid and what my correct order was because I noticed my correct order was less expensive. I told her I didn't need the change and asked if I could get a brownie to make up the difference they owed me + the hassle. She quickly responded something like "the brownie is $1.39 and the difference we owe you is only $.38 cents so you will have to pay the difference plus tax." I was shocked and lost for words at the awful customer service I was getting from one of my favorite fast food places. After a few seconds of feeling like I was going to have a stroke from the anger I finally managed to ask for my $.38 cents back which she quickly gave to me. Since I have yet to eat at any Chick-Fil-Abecause my pride don't let me give a single penny to that company. I tell this factual story to any one who will listen because I cant believe Chick-Fil-A lost a life time customer over $1.01+tax.
If you are going to eat fast food them this is the place to go...good chicken sandwiches, yummy shakes and great kids meals.

Love their chicken but not for corporations who speak out on political or religious views.You're a fortune 500 company. You make chicken sandwiches. Just make chicken sandwiches and keep your mouths closed and I'll keep coming for your chicken.God knows if I was blessed with a fortune 500 food chain I would be on my own island speaking my beliefs to myself.

I don't do fast food very much anymore, but I stopped here over the weekend to show Chick-Fil-A some love for standing by their morals.  I was in the area to visit another store, and made sure to stop here for lunch! The employees here are very friendly and helpful, as they are at every CFA I've been to. If you're unfamiliar with their menu, they have breakfast from open to 10:30 - the awesome CFA biscuit, and bacon-egg-cheese, and others. My favorite items on the rest of their menu is the regular CFA sandwich and the spicy chicken wrap...I get them with fruit cups instead of fries, and their great sweet tea. Yum! This is a treat, not a regular thing for me, but I'm glad to support them. This location is at the corner of Tatum and Cactus, on the SEC, in the same area as the Wal-Mart and Michael's.

Ok, yes I am writing a review for a fast food restaurant. I realize that seems a bit strange and quite possibly extremely unnecessary. I mean, fast food is fast food right? Everyone knows what their getting into and what kind of food to expect, right? While this is true I felt it was worth writing a little snippet for the always refreshing Chick-Fil-A.It's nice to have a fast food experience where the food tastes fresh and actually like real chicken. The nuggets are yummy, flavorful but not overbreaded. My parents enjoyed their chicken sandwiches and agreed that the food is fresh tasting and not too heavy. We also enjoyed the sweet tea which is a classic Chick-fil-A staple.One important thing to note was that this location was super busy when we walked in right at noon but soon after we ordered our food was ready in a flash. And for those of you who have never been to CFA before? The icing on the cake is the wonderful assortment of dipping sauces to suit whatever flavor mood you are in at the moment. Or you can do what I do and open one of each and dip to your hearts desire. Who doesn't love variety?!

I went 3 days ago and got a meal of Chick-fil-A Nuggets with waffle potato fries and a lemonade drink. The nuggets are ok, I think the fries were better. And the lemonade was too sweet too much sugar...diabetes? As for the sauces, the only one I liked was the bbq but they stingy with them.

Eh it was ok, not as amazing as everyone tells me it is. When I lived in Vegas everyone would say if Chick-Fil-A was here Raisin Cane's would be put to shame...HAHAHA yeah right! I am glad I tried this now because nothing here stacks up to it. The Chicken was really solid could tell it was fresh cut before fried. But it just was lacking in flavor. The sauce was not inspiring but OK. ( I did take 8 packs home to Seattle with me) But it was nothing like the Canes sauce. The Sweet Tea was even disappointing vs Raising Canes. Overall compared to other fast foods it is better than most. But, I only eat fast food if it is outstanding and this was not it.

I am addicted to the grilled chicken and fruit salad. It is low cal if you use the low cal dressing and very filling. The staff will go out of their way to get things right- and make your experience a positive one.  I buy the nugget trays too when I am having guests and it is always the first thing to be finished.
Love to come here for the fries and shakes! Delicious and quick, friendly service.

Compared to the one in Deer Valley where I work.....this one needs some serious improvements. I know Chick-Fil-A takes it's customer service....food....and store cleanliness very serious. This one however is the exception especially when it comes to cleanliness and organization. This locale is always messy....the condiments are always disorganized....and the lemonade on my last 3 occasions has not been good..... for lack of a better word. I am shocked and appalled really because I have been to several of these establishments and if the managers there could see this store they would be shocked as well. Eat, Drink, and be Merry my Friends.....just not at this Chick-Fil-A.

I love the spicy chicken sandwich, also the iced tea/lemonade mixture I usually get instead of soda. The waffle fries are usually awesome when they are fresh out of the fryer... unfortunately the batch I got yesterday were cold and tasted like an ashtray. The dog enjoyed them, though.

Over the years, I have taken a strong liking to Chick-fil-a.  The chicken is tasty and is not processed like the other fast food restaurants.  The waffle fries are delicious.The staff is extremely friendly and at times will come to the table and offer free soda refills.Each Wednesday they have a Kids Night from 5:00 p.m. to 7:00 p.m.  Last week there was a balloon artist.  It is a fun time had by

I do like their food. I like how the kid meals come with something educational instead of some piece of plastic junk. The only thing I would say is for the price, I think their portions could be a little bigger. I am always wanting just a couple more waffle fries.

This Chick Fil A is awful. The last 3 times I have been here I have gotten soggy fries that are undercooked. How do you consistently mess up fries?? I love chick fil A but this location sucks. I've learned my lesson and I just have to drive up to North Scottsdale to get my fix.

Yes, I'm reviewing @ChickfilA, but with good reason.Marissa worked the counter today, and epitomized service with a smile!She delivered our food to the table, and even asked if we needed refills on our drinks.She was one of the friendliest people I've ever encountered at a fast food restaurant, and should be praised by her employer.The food is pretty good, and I would probably go to Chik fil-A before KFC.But I just want to rave about the service.

Chick-fil-a is comfort fast food for me. I love the original chicken sandwich; I add 1 pack of honey mustard. I grab a second honey mustard packet for dipping my delicious waffle fries - which, unfortunately, they sometimes skimp on, in my opinion. I have to tell you, though, I witnessed the talent of the best balloon artist I've ever seen at this location! (He's not there every week, but you'll find him there on some Wednesday afternoons for the whole "kids eat free" thing.) I was so mesmerized, as I waited in line to order and then for my food,  that I hardly noticed the wait and the fact that the place was overrun with little ones didn't detract from my experience! Chick-fil-a actually caters to the whole family thing really well. (And, their kids' meals have educational toys, often promoting literacy).
So good. the sandwiches, the salads, the ice cream. and of course, the fries. sooo good. and chik fil a sause is the best. and it is all pretty healthy for you too!

So I was doing the no carb thing for awhile and my very first carb loaded meal was at Chik-Fil-A.  One would think that after not eating carbs for a couple months, anything would taste divine---- WRONG.Chi-Fil-A used to be in malls when I was younger and they would hand out free samples of the yummy fried deliciousness on little toothpicks when you walked by.  This then would make me turn to my mother and beg, plead, cry to eat at Chik-Fil-A.  It was really good then.  This was my memory when I went to the Tatum location.  What I got was a super fried chicken fillet that needed salt-- gasp!  Who actually adds salt to fried chicken?  Well, this one tasted bland., so I HAD to.  My bun was soggy and my fries were cold.  Is this really the carbs I was craving all this time? No.  I should have gone to have sushi.the 2 stars are because I WANT it to be more that 1 star. I give it another go ahead, a few weeks later-- at this point I have eaten so many carbs my pant buttons are popping off and AGAIN!  cold fries and soggy bun.  WTF??!!  I haven't been back since and since I am on a NEW diet, I won't be heading there anytime soon.  Boooooooo.

So this is our second time ordering from here and having it delivered, we will never be doing that again. Our order was missing multiple items, such as sauces and side items and one of our drinks was 3/4 empty. We called the store to let them know and they stated they would send the missing items with a new drink and some coupons. Once we finally received the missing items they still did not get it right. They still did not send the missing sauces and did not include any coupons. Very disappointed in the service tonight.

I will never go back to this location. First off don't get the salads. I found a black bug crawling in my salad and it was so disgusting. It was in the southwest salad and what's even gross I thought it was a black bean but it was moving! Second they have messed up my order and forgot to put a couple items in my bag.. And lastly this place is so unorganized esp with the drive thru/mobile! This location is a joke..

Terrible service, went through the entire drive-thru, our order was not taken. Finally got up to the window and they told us to go through again... this is awful service and is unacceptable. The two people who were supposed to take our order were clearly not paying attention.

I stopped coming here because my order was always wrong..... Thought I'd give it another try after a year...How you mess up an order of 4 items is beyond me. It so frustrating to get all the way home for things to be wrong. Thank God for the lemonaid it was the only thing right lol. I won't be wasting my money again. Someone suggested I check my foot before I leave....I actually do check my bag but I don't feel as if I should have to unwrap my sandwich in the drive thru to make sure it's the correct item.
I never asked for white hairs on my chicken sandwich but okay  Not only was it cold but the fries are under portioned too....

not my pleasure anymore fil a... they never said my pleasure... RUDE right? yea so i called the manager n she was not much better then the horrible experience i have had from it today, went to the mall wanted some chicken WHERE DA CHICK FIL A? HUH?!? it's gone then boom we go to it (a different location) and they don't say my pleasure and the manager didn't also like girl where is the respect for me ON GOD and i will say on GOD because i don't believe in god. so anyways horrible chic fil a will be calling mr dan T cathy as a chick fil a worker if you work here know that you ruined my month and yea that's about it i'm done for now try me again and i'll be back on god so yea

Tried to stop in this morning and was met with No Parking signs and No dine in. Not everyone wants to drive around eating chicken sandwiches. This limited service will be their downfall.Note: The website states they are now offering indoor dining.
I'm not surprised that you have lowered your quality but charge almost $5 for this half empty yogurt. Profits are skyrocketing with your success until the day the consumer says adios. Adios.
Consistently hot food, fresh salads. Great packaging for carry out items. Never forgets your sauce or utensils. Staff is always friendly and helpful.

I always come to this location to pick up a mobile drive they order. It's usually been a pretty smooth process but today was anything but. The parking lot, drive thru situation was a literal sh#% show. Road rage over people trying to pull their car into the right lane. People were trying to get into drive they line from all directions. Through traffic in the parking lot was completely blocked bu those waiting to get in drive through. After waiting almost 20 minutes or so I got to the window to pick up my order. They said it was not ready and directed me to parking spaces to pull into. Well, there was not a single one available. I had no where to go. Almost got hit by other cars backing out. Finally was told by an employee to go park somewhere else. Parked and waited another almost 10 minutes for my order. Bottom line is the drive thru situation is a nightmare as far as people getting into the line. Cars are trying to enter from multiple spots. People are thinking others are cutting them off. It was just an absolute nightmare. This drive through and parking lot situation needs to be re-designed. I won't be visiting this location anymore. Going there was not worth it as it gave me too much anxiety.
Amazing service no issues no masks outside which makes me happy that the employees don't have to wear a mask in 95-100 degree weather and struggle.

Ordered on the mobile app. Told me to park and wait for someone to bring out my order. After 15 minutes I went in the drive thru. They then told me to come back around and park and go inside. The order was not complete (so I paid for items I didn't receive), the fries are under portioned, and the food was cold since the directions on the app are misleading. Really disappointed with this one.

Ordered delivery through the Mobile App, and it was superb. Not only was it accurate, but perfectly packed and flavorful. The spicy chicken sandwich was actually spicy, too.The order was a little slower than expected, but I figured it's because of high demand. After all, the food looked like it does in the commercials. Plus, the macaroni and cheese is surprisingly tasty for fast food.

Always eat at this location.Was little dissapointed tonight. The fries tasted different. They had an odd taste. Also, I did not get one napkin and not one sauce/condiment I ordered.I know they get non stop busy but please realize we like our sauces/condiments with our food. Please Double check all items are there when handing customers their food.Other than that you guys are great.

Absolute horrible service. I say and waited in their parking lot for my order which took 10 minutes for just a chick fil a sandwich. They "lost" my order and i asked for no pickles and a side of ketchup and got pickles and chick fil a sauce. Will not come back.

This location is normally great, but this last trip was kinda disappointing. Asked for extra pickle in an app order and this is what was put on it. Don't know who thinks this is okay but I guess it's the kind of service you get when teenagers make your food

This is the first time I ever ordered for delivery from a store that is located directly behind the giant apartment complex I live in. I see their trucks delivery here all the time. I placed a big order via their website (after I had to download the app and set up an account. I recently moved here a month ago so I am unaware of delivery issues that might occur. I received a text that my order had been delivered. I called the store and eventually found out we have two different phases at this complex and they delivered the order to the wrong place. I was told by their delivery manager it would be 30-40 min more because "it is the evening rush".  I'm sorry I don't find that solution to be acceptable. Certainly if I see your business delivering here...I would think you are already aware of issues and had my phone number to call and double check!  Therefore I give them the worst rating I was allowed to give. I would go to any other place than this
Stay far far far away from this location!!  The parking lot is a disaster of disorganization. Save yourself 30min and go anywhere else but here.

This location is horrible about forgetting items and doesn't seem to care. I eat there atleast once a week and about 90% of the time, I get home and something is wrong or missing. I was there yesterday and was literally the only person in the drive thru. No nugget sauce, wrong sized drinks, missing parfait. Had to ask for extra crackers. I'm just going to sit in line and check every item from now on. Workers are getting lazy that they can't even double check orders for customer satisfaction.

I love Chick-fil-A! At least other locations I have tried. I recently moved to this area and came here for the first time a few weeks back. Saw the biggest line I have ever seen in a Chick-fil-A. I figured it's because it's very popular around here, and other ppl like me love their menu. But after my third attempt at this place, I realize that the ridiculous lines in this place are not just because of the popularity. It's got to be the staff! The lines move one car every 4-5 minutes. Sometimes more. I turned my car off one time for about 12 minutes because it simply wasn't moving. What sucks is that once in line, it's hard to get out of it after 30 minutes of not even having an order placed, but having 10 cars in front and 10 cars behind. I'm not kidding you. And if you want to see it for yourself, simply drive by and check it out. But do yourself a favor and do not enter that line. For no on, I will drive to any other location even if I have to drive further to not ever be stuck in that absurd line.

Very unimpressed by the timeliness of the service at this location. I just moved here from California and am used to very fast drive thru line or in store pick up. Even during Covid. The past 3 times I've been here, I've had to wait over 30 minutes in the drive thru or being told to "pull forward" and wait for my meal at the end while cars behind me continued to receive their food. I'm 36 weeks pregnant and love the food, but hate the wait. Unfortunately even though this is the closest location to me, I'll need to find another to go to. Hopefully this issue isn't present at all chick fil a locations.

Love this location. Although always pretty busy, they get to you really fast. I usually order online and pick up. One time I didn't get my order right, and I wrote the location about my experience. They wrote back so fast and apologized. WOW! What service. I will continue to always go here because their service is great. Thank you!
Great food and always friendly service. The people seem to always enjoy their job and they are doing a great job with covid
Polite and great service !!! My only complaint is this place only has spicy chicken strips. I hate that I can only get  sandwich! Please get regular strips back.
If I door dash a salad 9 out of 10 they forget the dressing.  Today was my last order from them. Seriously though how hard is it  to get right ?
This is the second time in a row I went to this Chic Fil A for breakfast and I didn't get all my food. They are so unorganized at this location and I will not be going back.

Waited 20 minutes in line for the very kind young lady to let us know that they were sold out of two of the (regular) items we were looking to eat.  No signs ahead of time to let you know, just a twenty minute waste of time.
Our first time ordering Chick-Fil-A on DoorDash & it wasn't complete. Which sucks because we only ordered from doordash to get the deal they were offering & seriously wasted our time & money

Usually super spot on. I had 3 fries on my way home this is what was left oh and the only sauce I asked for they couldn't seem to get right also one pickle on my sandwich. Nice!. Nick at the front was good other then that. You had one job. Thanks!
LONG LINE, BUT ITS FAST!! Super great service, quick & got my order right. Good food too! Fruit salad highly recommended and everything is amazing too!

I do not go come here often largely cause lines are extremely long.  Tried mobile order to speed up process.  Went through drive thru.  They Could not find order even though I had receipt and was charged.  Entire process took extra 20 mins at a time when I had a short lunch to start with,  Staff was apologetic but doesn't make up for time lost.

I like your chicken nuggets but the main reason I'm giving you 5 stars is cause around 7 years ago you had an employee who was so sweet he was in high school at the time and he was so funny and friendly and gave me a little cow stuffed animal I was like really young when this happened but I remember it to this day I don't know the name of the worker but I hope he's doing well because I still have the little cow.    :)     :)      :)

so sadly yelp is trying to blame covid on my poor service, this is not the first time I've been disappointed by this facility. however this time takes the cake, there is no explanation for this. I asked for no pickles and there was 9 on my sandwhich to the point I had to throw the bottom bun away as it was saturated in pickle juice. why chick fil a? I feel like you are turning into mcdonalds. please dont become mcdonalds chick fil a

This is probably the worst chick-Fil-A in the valley. Not that is post will do anything to change that. The staff is unfriendly and they don't have a good system for the drive-through at this time or any time. Even before this pandemic we are in they have always had a hard time. I have not visited in over 9 months. I went 4 days ago. Never again. I will either travel in another direction or not go at all.

I LOVE Chick-fil-A. The staff are always so polite, efficient and friendly, and the food is always outstanding. I can cook most things better than most places I can buy them, but I can never seem to match Chick-fil-A when it comes to chicken, I don't know how they do it, but I know I love it.
No sauces at all in the bag, didn't realize until we were already home. We had 3 meals, and an extra request of ketchup.

Disgusting food, disgusting company. There's nothing more to say. The food and owners are trash and I can't wait for the company to go under.Edit: thank you for being continually inconsiderate of the traffic in the complex. I can't wait for you guys to get fined when you you obstruct an emergency vehicle or create a hazard. I despise this disgusting place.

I don't know what it is about this Chick-Fil-A but the food quality is always lacking compared to other stores, which sucks because this one is extremely convenient for my morning commute. Every time I order the Chicken Biscuits or the Chicken Minis (my favorites on the morning menu) the biscuit and the mini yeast rolls are always dry, crumbly and stale tasting and the chicken usually seems dry and overcooked. On the few occasions I've had dining during lunch time, the waffle fries have always been soft and floppy rather than crisp. I highly suggest visiting the Chick-Fil-A at Peoria & 31st ave over this one. The food quality is always good and they even give you a little butter mint with each order.

Just an Update on how awesome this location is doing during this time! This is our 2nd delivery and they are so fast and get our order correct every time! This location does such a great job and all our deliveries are sealed so you know no one took a fry or anything :) and the delivery associates are wearing masks and are being cautious which we appreciate during this pandemic. I would highly recommend this location and delivery is our favorite right now!

This Chick-Fil-A is a great place to get food before/after watching a movie at the nearby AMC Deer Valley. They have always been courteous, efficient, and accurate in handling my orders. The food has consistently been delicious. I particularly recommend the grilled chicken club, the macaroni and cheese, and the waffle fries with Chick-Fil-A sauce.

Chick-fil-A will satisfy your crave for chicken, just like the name says this place is all about chicken and oh boy do they deliver on their promise, putting aside all the controversial statements and beliefs Chick-fil-A has, this place is one of the BEST fast food places to eat at, even if your not a huge fan or chicken they make it so that even if it's not your favorite you'll still enjoy it a lot, they offer a variety of chicken based food items and meals, they also offer other items like salads, and or breakfast items. It's always a great place to stop by if your looking for great fast food location, and or extremely great chicken. If your a huge fan of fired chicken, or just chicken in general, I would definitely recommend checking out your local Chick-fil-A. They also have one of the best customer services I've ever seen, always being super polite and understanding. The only cons about Chick-fil-A I can think of are that almost every location is always going to be packed with an overwhelming amount of customers at all times, and that it is definitely not the cheapest place to eat at, and for some people that might destroy the whole point of fast food being cheap to get, however besides the pricing and the wait, Chick-fil-A is one of the best fast food establishments out there and I would absolutely recommend eating here sometime.
Food is good but staff is rude. Crew member didn't even acknowledge me being there  in the drive through before one of her regulars who got there a minute or two after  me in the mobile line.

Covid19, Drive thru only available and I wouldn't be surprised if their sales exceeded the same on this day last year. They have their act together at this location on I-7 and the 101 fwy!  I pulled up and saw the line. I got in line then texted my family to ask what option B was because there were probably 25 cars in front of me.  While I waited for their response, I moved up quite a bit. I realized the line was moving pretty darn fast and decided to stay. All in all, I waited about 15-18 minutes. They have a giant tent set up so part of the line is in the shade.  The order takers are standing outside in this heat, taking orders and ringing you up on the spot where you slide your own cars so no touch transmission possible. Then 3 ordering lines converge into one drive thru pick up line. When you near the window, they have a spot for 3 cars to pull up while 3 servers bring your order to your window, confirm your name for pick up and off you go. It was highly efficient, the staff was their usual friendly selves despite standing outside in 90-100 degree temperatures and the wait really wasn't that long considering how many cars were in front of me!  If all Chick Fil A's aren't following this model, you need to. They know what they are doing at this location!  One line was reserved for mobile orders. It was the shortest like.

Deer Valley Chick-Fil-A is the BEST one I have been to nationwide! Jeff, the owner makes certain everything is perfect! Eileen is a phenomenal lady who brightens the visit with her smile and caring demeanor. I have personally seen the children's play area be cleaned several times a day. On one occasion I went in for breakfast and it was being sanitized. I was there for lunch and it was being cleaned. Later that night my grandson wanted to go there after we left the movie theater to get fruit salad and someone was cleaning the play area again. I have never seen this store unkempt or messy. Someone is always cleaning it. Thanks Jeff! Also the special school events they host and family nights are always fun! Oh yea, and the food...YUM!
Chick-fil-A has the friendliest staff and their food is always made perfectly. I know that every time I go I will leave happy. I highly recommend eating at this restaurant.

Chick Fil A never fails. Lines are crazy right now and they are still killing it, with smiles, and great service to boot! All the years I've been going to chick fil a, multiple states and different locations and never a screw up. Grilled nuggets and buffalo sauce all the way!
This location is the closest to my office. This location is very busy. I love their nuggets and waffle fries.

I love love love chick fil a but I'm very upset with them discontinuing the sausage breakfast burritos... if I'm gonna be a returning customer for breakfast, y'all better get the sausage back! Cuz those were my favorite!!

This should be a five star but they took away regular chicken strips :( I catered these chicken strips for every birthday party and it's my daughters favorite. Now she won't eat here, we tried the nuggets with no success. AMAZING SERVICE, always clean, always pleased with my meal.

1st time here and last time way bad service order taker michael way rude and slow told him i was 1st time customer and just needed lil help with menu he gave non the other lanes were going fast ours very slow also michael dident give me receipt or my change store was out of tenders shame i will not be back or recommend this place
They should have food being prepared when you order online cause they be barely making the food when I get there smh
What can I say.... It's Chick-fil-A. Good quality, good customer service & fresh! I've come to this location a few times.

First time at this location. It didn't disappoint.  Smaller than many other stores, the service was still quick, courteous, and the food was Ah-may-zing as always!! There's a kid play area and plenty of seating. This store is located on the fringes of the Target/AMC supercenter at I 17 and the 101.  So it's hard to spot unless you know it's there.  Lots of other eateries are surrounding it.  They had THREE drive-thru lanes going yesterday (which means obviously lots of people know it's there!)The service in particular was outstanding.  The cashiers and expeditors couldn't have been nicer. We polished off the food quickly (we were hungry!) and it was so good!!I'm going to remember  this location for the future.  It's not horribly far from my home - AND they're opening a Deseret Bookstore in that same plaza later this month!!

I went in with my dad tonight and the place was super busy! We waited for our food patiently in the booths as a group of people stood at the counter. I stood up periodically to check on my food, but nothing. When we finally heard our name called, I was so excited. However, I walked up to the counter and my food was gone. I thought, no big deal, but I let the staff know. Apparently someone with a similar name had taken our food. The staff was incredible, so great! They guaranteed to make our food again and get it out as soon as possible. The staff went above and beyond, upgrading our order and apologizing along the way. To top it off the staff was very funny and was able to play along as we were joking about the mishap. I wish I got their names so I can call them out specifically, but as a staff they were great!! (Shoutout to the young gentleman in the black shirt because he was the best) 10/10 recommend, they should all get raises, they were great.

We are frequent flyers , but our last visit was an epic fail.1:30 (past lunch rush you'd think) We used Mobil app - upon arrival extremely long lines and we had to allow regular drive thru to go ahead We asked why to better understand if you need to give half an hour after ordering

It's amazing how long the drive-thru line is. I think they were going to make gold in this place instead of just food. You went inside and the line was okay as it took us about 10 minutes to get our meal. The service was and always has been very kind and polite. The food was awesome as usual but the diet lemonade is more like okay sugar lemonade. Fruit salad is really good as well

10/29/2019 my husband and I decided to come into the deer valley and 27th ave and have our sit down dinner. First things first, our food was left up at the counter and we were never notified it was finished so it sat up there (past times, actually all times our food has been delivered to our table, what else is that table marker they give you used for) then Ishmael one of the managers was so impolite. Started off with whistling the entire time which to me is not professional especially when people are eating and when it's brought up should be stopped. Than Ishmael decided to talk about all his personal issues at the table behind us, in which I had to turn around and ask him if he could take the conversation elsewhere as it was so inappropriate. Another manager named Emily was there as well, in which I asked her if she really allows this to happen. Be accountable and if your other manager can't figure it out, she should've. Emily also had the audacity to ask me what the issue was in regards to Ishmael and his inappropriate behavior. I am so disappointed in the service that was received. So inappropriate and unprofessional especially coming from chick   Fil a where being polite and professional is so highly valued by your company. I look forward to hearing from you.

I'd love to post a picture of two superfood salads but I can't I paid for two and you gave me one. When I called in I was told I could drive back or receive a coupon in the mail for a like item. So you make a mistake and now I must spend my time, energy, and fuel to correct your mistake. When that happens you injure me twice. That makes it no longer a mistake. So instead of taking my daughter to Chick-fil-a every Wednesday after Jiu jitsu we will take our business somewhere we are valued. Not the first time this has happened but it will be the last

Asked for a SPICY chicken sandwich with pepper jack cheese, but received a a regular sandwich with colby jack????? Ate it anyways because I was starving, but it's so annoying not receiving the food you paid for

I stopped by today at just after 11am and they were already very busy.  They were very efficient with getting everyone through the drive thru as quick as possible.  Three employees were taking orders and one employee, standing outside the pickup window, was handing out food.  The star was a very friendly and efficient young man named Ishmael, or Ish.  Such a wonderful sunny nature and definitely someone they will want to keep.  Bravo Ish.

Worst Chick-fil-A I've ever been to. Waited in line for 20 minutes only to find out they got my order wrong. I went back inside to have them fix it which they did. But then when I started eating, there was so much chewy fat on the chicken that I had to strip it all of in able to eat the sandwich. Not a good experience at all. I'm never going eating at this location again.
What is going on... i paid extra for lettuce and this is what i get. Im not gonna drive back there for lettuce... wth
Rude service and cold old French fries. The drive drive service is very long it does not bother me but I expect good friendly service. Date 9/9/2019 at around 6pm Drive Tru/Hand our girl blonde hair
Chick fil a, you dropped the ball tonight on the Mac N Cheese. I was awful. What happen? The Mac N Cheese was out of this world 10 days ago. We used the drive thru or I would have requested a refund.

Always have been a fan of Chick-fil-A but when a Manager makes promises that she doesn't follow through with, that rubs me the wrong way. Went through your drive thru on August 9th , picking up a order for my 91 year old client. The wrap sandwich w the Avocado Ranch sauce, requested 2. Drive all the way to Scottsdale and no sauce! Called and spoke with manager Myra about how frustrating it was and that returning was not a option. She assured me that she would mail some compensation and requested my mailing address. Think she followed through, nope. Hope she reads this and does better with her role as a manager addressing issues. Posting

First of all, let's start off with Zion: AMAZING SERVICE EVERY-TIME IM IN THE DRIVE THRU. He reminds me to get bbq sauce (I'm forgetful, lol). Thanks for recommending the grilled sandwich too. Lines are also fast, especially considering they have so many customers like my self. I don't even eat beef anymore because chick fil a is simply the best. Zion you and your crew ROCK ON!

I LOVE COWTOWN!!!! Hailey gave me that beautiful chick fil a smile, gave me my favorite chick fil a sauce!! I ordered the BBQ sandwich with extra bacon. I also got their signature lemonade, taste just like my grandmas homemade!! My little son played in their jungle gym and he had a blast! It was indeed my pleasure this time!

I don't know why this location offers macaroni and cheese because literally no exaggeration I have gone to this location every single day for the past six days doesn't matter when I go if it's busy if there's a line or not I'm told I will have to wait in between ten and TWENTY minutes for mac and cheese it's fast food knowone has time for that don't offer it if you don't have it. Oh and to make it better every time I have called to leave a message for the manager it says it will go to voicemail and it just disconnects you immediately so that's great

This is the fastest of all the Chick-fil-A's I visit, they're always on the ball and friendly. Food is top notch and they have a separate, faster drive through line for mobile orders which is awesome. Great job!

The food was good of course but the service was horrible the girl at the drive through wouldn't even let me get my order out and the girl at the window was upset that I had to add things to my order when they wouldn't even let me get it out in the first place

This is by far my favorite chick-fil-A to visit. I've never been disappointed by the food and furthermore, the staff here is amazing! My girlfriend and I came in after a long day at work and we were both starving. Not only were the sandwiches and fries perfectly hot and tasty, but also the store manager, Ishmael, was as friendly as can be. We had a good conversation at the front of the restaurant, and then he came over later to check on how we were enjoying our food. 10/10 experience and super pleasant hospitality. I can't wait to come back soon to enjoy good food and company.
Not really thrilled about getting half full fries.... Just got home and haven't eaten any.... this is poor se

I've written and visited many of Chick-Fil-a's. Always wonderful food and great service. I really enjoy the rewards program and "just because" rewards that are given out. Hey, they even donated to a food organization to help feed the hungry when I went up a reward level! I thought that was great. Always deserving of my business!
Not a place for me. A came with a friend very excited to eat here, but honestly I regret to have stopped by. Real chicken is used although

The manager Susie needs customer service training. She does not know what is available for breakfast. She told me sandwiches were available however that was not the case. They forgot my hash browns. I called and spoke to Susie she kept talking over me and was argumentative. I guess she hasn't bought into ChikfilA's church philosophy about being kind! Neither has the girl at the drive through she's rude. Your selling chicken it's not that  serious!
Great employees and awesome food! I'm excited to try the new summer items. I can't go here without having waffle fries and a cookie shake.

This is the worst chik fil a i have been too. They offered a mobile monday mystery gift if you order via mobile. I placed my order via mobile app and when i arrived at the mobile to-go line they couldnt retrieve my order. They thought it was user error so the person checked my app and saw that i did everything correct. They then told me that the app has issues a lot and told me to go to next agent for more assistance. Long story short they kicked me down the road to two more agents and problem did not get resolved. In the end i got no rewards and no points for my meal. I couldnt even add my points back because the kept the receipt. I have contacted management multiple times and finally got a reply. They said they will give me a 8 ct and told me to call corporate to get my points. I called corporate and they said the store does it. I am getting kicked back and fourth with no answers. And 2nd time around i have called and left messages to the manager and he did not answer or call me back after i have left him multiple messages.. this chi fil a is poorly managed and takes no responsibility because they are franchisee. Its pretty sad..

had the spicy southwest salad ...very good!! but almost 10 bucks,  also bought a reg chicken sandwhich....disgusting the whole piece of chicken was fat and chewy never had that before from this location!

Chik fil A never disappoints, but I would like to call out an incredibly kind person on their staff. I had an embarrassing moment where I brought my 2 young boys and husband to dinner and neither of my cards worked at the register due insufficient funds. This very sweet young lady (team leader) did not embarrass me at all and comped me and my children's meal. This act meant the world to me and my family, as I am between jobs and anticipated having to walk out empty handed. I wanted to let others know of the outstanding service.
Employees are young and not well trained(managements fault), leading to lackluster service in the drive through. If you like chick fil a, don't visit this one.

I've never had more disappointing service from Chick-fil-A in the last six weeks the last three times I've been through the drive-through they forgot something first time it was fries second time it was my meal salad the third time it was two fries of a meal and extra for a friend. I would expect this from Taco Bell or McDonald's but in the past Chick-fil-A has always gone above and beyond I've always had the best and friendly service now every time I go through when I asked them to check the meal for everything and they still have something missing but all I get is sorry sorry sorry I swear they're don't even care. Really too bad it use to be a great place.
Clean, fresh food, quick service. Always polite and respectful cashiers and managers. Food is consistent and good. They are always trying to give me more sauces!
Very nice place especially next to Tesla Super Charge. Nice service and have Target next to it as well. Love all the Chick-fil-A food especially the soup.
Hard to beat Chick-fil-a! Always had great service and enjoyed my time eating here.

This is my favorite Chick-fil-A location. My order is always right, the service is always exceptional and the food is always fresh. I asked them to make my food with love on my online order and they really did!
First time here, loved it. Eat here if you can. Yelp forces you to write long reviews so this part means nothing.

Here I sit in my car on my lunch break, still hungry, disappointed, and a bit more broke. Here's the thing... I'm not some huge Chick-Fila fan to begin with but they definitely aren't making me any more of a fan. Let's start with right now. I'm on a low carb diet so I thought I'd give the Protein Style Grilled Chicken Sandwich a try here. I then added a "Super Side" Salad a try as well. 3.09 for a side salad the size of my tiny fist. Then my sand which with pickles... or shall I say... pickle slice... yup! One thinly sliced pickle. And 5.35 for a tiny piece of grilled chicken... I'm starving right now guys! I'll be going to get me a Double Double Protein Style tomorrow! Now that's a meal! Anyway... I've always felt that you get very little bang for your buck here and honestly I don't get that super friendly service they are always preaching about on TV. A few months ago I order for my office. They forgot 2 of my meals. That's fine, mistakes happen. But when I went back to pick up what was missing, the manager was super annoyed, never apologized, or spoke to me at all. I'm just saying... I don't and never will get the hype. But hey my brother is your biggest fan and his here weekly so to each their own.

Never had a bad experience here until now. For anyone who wants to try to venture outside the box and try their NEW watermelon mint lemonade.. let me inform you of something because they won't and it is not posted anywhere. You CAN NOT get a refill in your cup even though you pay more than any of the other s, m or L drinks, they will not give you any sort of refill what so ever if you purchase the NEW watermelon mint lemonade. I just had lunch there with my husband and 5 kids. We all got meals and I bought a NEW watermelon mint lemonade with my mine meal for $2.25+tax. We all went to get drink refills and I ask for an ice tea refill instead of the watermelon mint lemonade and they absolutely refused to give me any sort of refill. I hope this review is helpful for those wanting to give the NEW watermelon mint lemonade a try.

I needed $600 worth of gift cards and they accomadated me in very quick time. I called ahead and they were ready for me so it was a very smooth process even though I was doing $5 increments for the gift cards. Always delicious food here by the way and great service! I cant remember the young gals name who helped me but she was great.
Very clean and pro-active! With a half-dozen servers taking orders of cars in line. Cheerfully! Moving the order process very efficiently. With delicious food. This place is a gold-mine!!!
Im just amaze of how fast my meal was served and how good the service is,sooo friendly!!! food's good as well, what more can you ask for honestly!!!!
This is by far the dirtiest location I've been to in Phoenix Valley. There's a hair ball at my feet right now.. I'm disgusted.
Clean, quiet, fast and friendly. Almost worth the drive from NY.  Maybe not that, but so personable.  It's definitely not McDonalds.
Tom is the sweetest man walking around give 10000% hospitality to costumers. Love him!

Outstanding        Mac and cheese?   Yes, Mac and cheese....I'm a kid again. Great chicken club, wonderfully clean and the hostess in the dining area was so very kind and happy!  Thank you, Donna and Paula
Chance in the drive thru is an all-star! Great food and great service! Very quick and order is always prompt and correct
Great food but ordered a spicy deluxe and ended up with just a plain chicken sandwich  didn't realize it until I was already home and it was too late.
EXCELLENT SERVICE. It's absolutely my pleasure, very clean, kid friendly, food is always amazing, and out fast.

I wasn't feeling well so I ordered the chicken soup using DoorDash.  It was delivered on time and was hot.  But...it was practically all broth and just a little bit of chicken and noodles on the bottom.  For $7 plus the delivery fees it was extremely disappointing!  I haven't had Chick-fil-A very often but I know people as obsessed with it.   So far I haven't been impressed and the soup was a rip off!

This review is for the APPThis app is the best fast food APP out there. Mickeys, Wendy , Starbucks bla bla bla. TWO REASONS: not only can u pre order and earn points BUT u can dictate when it is prepared. So like today, due to the known lunch-rush , I had it prepared before I even pulled into the parking lot. Walked in, washed my hands and as I came out my food was ready. I counted a dozen people in line, poor souls. REASON TWO. I am constantly getting free food sent to me from the app. A lot of bfast and a random Sammy. I have tried things I would never have ordered. Bfast bagel and grilled bfast muffin. The grilled chicken is the best chicken. Get the app and reap the rewards!!!!

This a True StoryMy wife discovered Chik-fil-a during her pregnancy and immediately fell for their chicken sandwiches. As pregnancies go - her water broke during a doc appointment and we were told to go straight to the hospital. So what did we do? We hit the drive-thru for this Chik-fil-a first! Our order was straightforward, less asking for easy ice in my sweet tea. We pull away and as my wife begins to crack open her sandwiches we find that each sandwich was missing the top bun. How do you forget the top bun on multiple sandwiches?? I wish I we had taken pics but clearly we had other matters on our mind...2 stars lost for 2 MIA bun tops

This used to be my favorite chick fil a. This was by far my worst chick fil a experience. The food was fine like it always is, the employees and service are what have made it terrible. Saying the employees are slow is an understatement. I stood there for 5 minutes waiting on a refill, the person bagging the food usually helps with refills but today she just stared at me as I patiently waited. The employee on the register was with people but after he completed their order he came around the counter to bring them their drink and talk to another employee 5 feet away from me as I waited. The other person on register took another customer to order instead of getting my drink, finally after a couple minutes of conversing the original person came back to the register but instead of helping me when he looked at me him and the other employee continued to talk, well when the second employee left I thought i was finally gonna get a refill but instead he took on the next customer who was an employee coming to get food before his shift, so I walked up to the counter and set my drink down and then he finally asked if I needed a refill, took everything I had not to reply with, no I'm just standing here with the lid off of my cup for fun. So even slower than when I ordered my drink he filled it up not saying a word. I ordered my food from the same guy and he was lacking any personality, couldn't speak up, I've never seen anyone press buttons slower and to say that the new employees move slow, is a great understatement. After watching the employees the last few times I have come in I can only compare the speed they move at to frozen molasses. They don't greet anyone with a smile, if you're lucky enough to be greeted, they don't have any personality at all, he made me and my girlfriend feel uncomfortable while we ordered because of the lack of personality. The only reason I still go to this chick fil a is because it's the closest one to my house and the food is still good, but the other week I drive to flagstaff just for chick fil a and that visit reminded me how amazing chick fil a is. Only reason I gave it 2 Stars is because the food was good as always
Seriously the best fast food restaurant!! I don't eat at any other fast food place!! Yesssss boy!

Love this chick fil a! The workers are always so nice and respectful! They make you feel so welcomed. You get a restaurant experience in a fast food place. My order is always right and fresh. I love how kid friendly it is too! I would recommend this location to anyone! You won't be disappointed!
Great service! They were quick and honestly the lady standing outside at 115 degrees outside to take our order was very pleasant and kind. Thank you!

Went into this location today and I was really disappointed in the customer service. Walking in I wasn't greeted and an employee ran into me as I was walking in and didn't even apologize or recognize I was walking. The workers were rude and inattentive. The cashier seemed like she didn't want to even be here and had attitude. I understand most of the workers are young but that doesn't mean they can't have manners. Really disappointed as I know Chick-fil-A is usually very polite and has great customer service. I definitely will not be coming into this branch again.

Chick - fil- A is a family favorite! We been eating at them for who knows who how long! Two nights ago we went to have a late dinner and I was beyond shock how rude she disrespectful our cashier was to my daughter and I.... normally after I order you guys read our order back but this was the first it didn't happen. All I said was did you get the extra large fries with no salt and she said no and I said then can you add it please but Omgosh that became such a huge deal and she kept on saying I never ordered it which I did plus my daughter had said it too .... long story short she wasn't having it at all she was sooo rude so disrespectful that I got upset and ask for a manager ... team leader came! and was on her side and didn't care , I just told them I have never dealt with this kind of nonsense anywhere especially here ( you guys are the best Customer Service anywhere but not after that night. I ask for my money back and left peacefully while all 3 workers stared rudely like they won something! This is my second Yelp, my first one was to give a new restaurant a 5 star so this is something I never do but was so upset about over a order that shouldn't have been a big deal so yes I had to come on here and write a review!

I am a huge Chick-Fil-A fan. I've never really had any problems with them for years. I went to this one this morning and we picked up food for 3. They read out the order when they gave it to me but somehow messed up our drinks and gave me a Frozen Coffee that was completely melted and warm. We noticed by the time we got in the car but were running late to an appointment so had no time to go back

I absolutely love chick-fil-A! Always friendly service and the best juiciest chicken sandwiches at any of their locations! I have never had a bad experience! Definitely one of the best fast food restaurants to ever exist!

I never understood all the hype on Chick-Fil-A, until my experience with this particular location. The team here demonstrates exceptional customer service- always going above and beyond to make it anything but a transactional environment. The food is always fresh, and the smiles are always genuine. Chick-Fil-A is the only fast food restaurant I frequent, and their effort to foster family values throughout the community does not go unnoticed.

Normally my wife and I go there and have great experiences and great food, and we get it almost every week, but we had it two days ago and somehow both got food poisoning. Please, make sure employees wash hands and keep from contaminating the food, that's all I ask. Being sick from eating Chick-Fil-A because someone passed over the seemingly small decision to take care of food is totally unacceptable.
I love Chick-fil-a and this is one of the best locations! The manager is amazing and always sends great gifts through the app.
Overpriced and below average. The soup was like canned, the chicken tenders have very little flavor.  The portions are small

I have never written a review to start off with. I literally downloaded Yelp just to write this.  I went to this Chick-Fil-A earlier and was pretty surprised went they told me my card got declined. I told them I would be right back and drove away leaving no explanation really. After leaving thru their drive thru  I realized that they had already given me our drinks.. I called back after 5 minutes and told them that I was sorry that I drove away not realizing I already got the drinks and that I was just calling the bank to see why my card got declined. They said not to worry and they understand and I told them That I was on my way back. When I got to the window they said that because I was honest and called about the drinks that they would take care of the order and I didn't have to pay for it. My heart seriously melted ..not because of the money but because of the act of kindness from these 2 specific girls (I should have gotten their name.) it was seriously the nicest thing that has happened to me in a long time. Just the thought of doing something so sweet and nice left such an impression on me. We have always been a fan of this restaurant but now I'm a greater fan. Thank you for having such amazing customer service ...most drive thru's can't wait to throw the food at you with no smile at all. You're employees have always left such a positive impression even before today. Thank you from the bottom of my heart.

Horrid service! Ordered sausage/egg biscuit in drive through. Was told to pull around would be out in 2 minutes. No designated wait area, so am stuck waiting behind parked cars. Everyone is mad as i have to keep driving around. Waited for 15 minutes...finally parked to go in to get my order. They put it together then ... All cold...IF YOU ARE ASKED TO PULL AROUND...GET YOUR MONEY BACK ON THE SPOT! Food average, cold, service horrid!

Horrible service, my nuggets were given to me cold,  after taking them back to the manager requesting fresh food, she brought me nuggets at roughly the same temperature witching not even two minutes and I know the food would not have been cooked within the time frame, very disappointed with you chic-fil-a and I frequent your locations across the valley, this was definitely the worst  meal I have received from one of your chains.
Super nice staff!  Great customer service-- Bodhi was incredibly polite and professional!

Bummer breakfast. We aren't ones to complain but....My office sent me to pick up breakfast for everyone on the company card, we had to pay some of it with cash too, but the manager this morning had to refund and recharge our order - she wasn't very nice about it either which was uncomfortable. One of the fruit cups and breakfast bowls were half empty... and the fruit had that fermented smell like it wasn't fresh from this morning! We didn't eat it.

Ranks with in-n-out as the best fast food. Grilled chicken nuggets are juicy with good grilled flavor and nice texture - not leftover chicken. Nice middle of the road BBQ sauce. Mac and cheese is a great side. Slightly over cooked noodles, but cheesy. Fruit cup side is spectacular! Not a bowl of melons  strawberry's, blueberry, mandarin oranges, and two kinds of apples. Fantastic!The pinnacle food here is the chicken soup. Best chicken soup bar none. Excellent chicken flavor, meaty, and superb broth. The best chicken soup anywhere. I also like the foam cups for drinks - keeps them cool. Staff is friendly and helpful. Seating is clean, comfortable and better quality than typical fast food.

Honestly the best experience i have ever received from start to finish!! I got greeted walking up entering in when i placed my order it was ready super quick. My experience was literally rad i had to speak with the manager to let him know how awesome everyone and everything was! If you are looking at these reviews all you need to know this chick fil a rocks!!! They just earned a loyal customer!

I rarely eat at Chick-fil-A, and of course, the afternoon I chose to do so they skimped out on my 3 piece tenders. The lunch rush hadn't even hit yet, whoever was packing up my meal just chose to stick a wimpy, brittle looking tender in my bag, as if that's what I paid $5 for.

Love coming to this chick-fil-a! They are friendly. Ricardo used to work here, he was my favorite so nice and always joking with everyone. I love their chicken noodle soup! So delicious. Also their side salad is good, they give you little red bell peppers as croutons(so good). I love getting the Chick-fil-a deluxe(it comes with lettuce & tomatoe) the original comes with just pickles on it. If you get a kids meal you can trade your toy for ice cream. Some times they have family nights were they do crafts and face paintings with the kids. Also they do have a play place inside.Download their Chick-fil-A app to get points & earn free food items.

I tried this fast food chicken place for the 1st time today. Let's start with the price of a pressed chicken sandwich with nothing else. $4.01. Now, the taste, was prepared before ordering and only warm when served. I realize a lot of people like this place, but if I want a chicken sandwich that is made when I order it and doesn't taste like it was cut from a roll of processed chicken then I will try Wendy's or Jack in the Box next time. To each their own. Thank you. Will I return, yes on a Sunday.
I think most Chick-fil-A's are good but this one always seems short on employees and takes forever to get you your refill. The parking is also a little difficult to navigate.
Chick-fil-A is leading the industry with excellent customer service and great-tasting food! I come here regularly and always love the food! The lines are long for a reason, people.

Wow. A fast food restaurant operating with high customer service! This is amazing. You never see this level of friendliness with fast food establishments or see employees who genuinely seem happy to be in their jobs. These people ARE!Aubrey was a delight and instantly put my husband and I in a great mood. The manager (younger, African American male -did not get his name) runs anAMAZINGship and I am so thankful to see young people thrive. Keep up the great work!Only complaint and it won't change the number of stars ( clean off the credit card machine). It was kind of dirty. Not a huge deal but it will take you from a perfect ten to an eleven!

Can't stand this place unless Kellen, the 6'5 Hunk, is working. All customer service by Kellen is more than exceptional. He not only deals with my sassiness but is also good with his hand (no pun intended) The guy can make anyone laugh, I almost hooked him up with a gig at the comedy club I own but he's moving up at chick fil a so he didn't want to jeopardize anything. Tells you the kind of guy he is, super loyal!

I came here last night and the lady taking my order just wasn't paying attention unfortunately.. I received my order and it was wrong. This is the closest Chick-fil-A from dove valley. By the time I got home I saw my order was wrong and received the wrong sizes. I've never had a complaint with this fast food place, hopefully next time the person taking our order pays attention and I won't be upset to find everything is wrong and a waste of my money.

I wish I could give them a "F" they get our order wrong more often than they do right. Today wrong sandwich, last week Friday's sandwich had cheese when we asked for no cheese. Monday's bagel sandwich was an English muffin and I got 2 bagel bottoms with cream cheese. We never order biscuits on Monday because they are dried out and hard. Then there was a time the bagels were so hard you could knock on wood with them. The people seem nice - so not sure if this a training issue or lack of caring. Oh and if you order hash browns - be prepared to get anywhere from 9-15 of them.  Sigh I guess @mcdonalds is our alternative-at least the orders are right and consistent.

Grabbed some to-go from here for lunch. The lines were long but moved fast. The staff was friendly and they accurately got my order. Food was hot and fresh and tasted great. I love the variety of sauces for the chicken nuggets. Waffle Fry's are my favorite. Keep up the great service.

I was having a rough day so my go to for comfort food is Chick-fil-A. The food was delicious as usual but what made it a great experience was your employee Nick. He was very polite and courteous. He engaged us in enjoyable conversation and really turned my night around. He is a great addition to your staff. I was told he has been there a little over a month but he seems to be really excelling in the customer service area! This is my first yelp review but I wanted to make it positive for a special person that made us feel special! Great job Nick , keep up the good work! We will be back to enjoy the delicious milkshakes and kind staff!
Is it really hard to not mess up an order? Oh I guess it is.

This place is always busy it's crazy how busy they get but always manage to give you a great customer service and double check that your order is exactly what u wanted and always before you get your food they ask you if you need extra sauce napkins and if you hear of their specials I love that they double check everything and make sure your order is correct best service

Dear Chick-Fil-a, if you are going to change your menu to now include on  the number 2 both the spicy deluxe and regular spicy you need to have you cashiers ask which the customer wants especially when you display the Deluxe on the menu and as the top item... thanks for the wrong order!!!

I am highly disappointed in the size of the chicken strips and nuggets. The skimpy pieces not only happen at this location, but at other locations. I feel so cheated out of the a nearly $10 meal when the strips are the same size as my short skinny finger. The fries and the employees were great. However, please quit cheating the customers on the tiny pieces of chicken, this is unacceptable.I do not plan on returning anytime soon.

Service staff gets the order wrong almost every time we order through drive through. Upon feedback to the manager, she showed no remorse nor did she took the ownership and was in fact condescending and rude. Rude but it was there pleasure as that's what they are programmed to say. Very disappointed!
I would give a 5 star but they dont have a grilled chicken deluxe not just crispy chicken. I love grilled chicken more with pepper jack and all the fixings. Doesnt that sound amazing?
Everyone was super nice and the grilled chicken wraps were delicious. My son loved his grilled chicken nuggets and waffle fries, def be back.

They make a drive thru for your convince however when they don't give you your complete order it becomes very inconvenient.   Quality control is a must for this location! Three happy people in our car and 1 unhappy person!!!

This is my favorite chick-fil-A location. The dining room was nice and clean and the employee was walking around with sanitary wipes (no dirty rags) wiping down tables and counters. Each table had fresh cut flowers too; wow! The food was fresh, made to order.We tried their breakfast sausage burrito and chick-n-minis. Both comes with drink and potato tots if you get them as a meal. Both were really tasty. Will return in a heartbeat.

Excellent customer service all the way!!!! They are speedy in the drive through, clean and helpful inside the restaurant, and kid friendly :) Plus I love that they get my order right Everytime, and they are equal opportunity employers. I love that!

What is Chick-fil-A without Chick-fil-A sauce? Realized they forgot to put it in my bag when I got all the way home. Not only the Chick-fil-A sauce but the other two sauces I asked for for the other two meals I bought.

Placed a mobile order rushed down there on my break to pick it up to be notified that the app wasn't working and that I would have to wait in the back of the line that was almost backed up to the door. I only have a 30min on my break and didn't have the time to wait In line and then for them to cook my food which is why I placed the mobile order in the first place. It's not there fault the system wasn't working and I understand that but when I kindly explained my situation I got "sorry bout that" very frustrating to work a 9 hour shift with nothing to eat. By the time I got out of there it was time to rush back to work. Very annoying.
Unfriendly pregnant manager on duty too busy wiping trays off to address a customer concern. Really Jeff, quality of managers deteriorating.

Customer service is NOT dead! I found evidence to this claim this morning at the Chick-fil-A at Deer Valley (I-17 & 101). Of course I've never had bad service at any of the Chick-fil-A's I've dined at. But the customer experience this morning was exceptional enough for me to lift my ban of chain restaurants.I would guess that the number one complaint or reason for giving a bad Yelp! review stems from bad service. Having worked in the industry more than a few times, I notice these things. So when I see someone (or a whole lotta someones) doing their job at what I consider an "old-fashioned level", I want them to know it was appreciated.This morning, while in the area, I stopped in for breakfast at what I thought might be a healthier alternative to standard industry fare. I was right! The Egg White Grill was delicious, not to mention under 500 calories. And who knew the coffee at Chick-fil-A was this good? But the great food here is only a part of this review.The couple ahead of me in line got into an argument at the register, but the cashier kept her composure and continued like nothing happened (and you wonder why you get bad service!) and smiled the whole time. And the cashier who took my order (Johnna) was very pleasant, helpful and also smiled the whole time. They aren't fake smiles either. You can hear how genuinely friendly the employees are in their voices.This Chick-fil-A is a little difficult to get to unless you're already in this shopping center, but it's worth your time if you want an alternative to the zombies that are hired at nearly every other fast food restaurant. Great job! You earned your day off tomorrow!

Went to this Chick-fil-A yesterday specifically for receipt day (where you bring in your receipt in January to get all of the items on your receipt for free) and did not get a receipt for my order. Have my credit card charge to prove it. I sent a message to the restaurant, they read it, but didn't reply back. My family and I eat at this Chick-fil-A often, but won't be coming back because of this. Way to scam people!

My favorite fast food spot! Always busy but line goes quickly. Fast service, great food, and amazing customer service! Management really did an amazing job with training their staff. Everyone is so friendly, fast, and very knowledgeable. Food is always hot and fresh and I love the simplicity of the menu. Can't go wrong with a simple chicken sandwich. I also have gotten the chicken wrap when I'm being healthy and it's also good. As most people already know it is closed on sundays and most holidays but I Highly recommend (:

Such a wonderful experience at this chick-fil-a! Wow. My boyfriend and I were coming back from a shotgun range out north to celebrate the fact that he finished his first semester of grad school. Upon ordering a huge milkshake and fries (which we never do), Becca bought us the milkshake! We thought she was just kidding but then it was actually free! What a kind person. Chick-fil-a should be extremely proud of an employee who really goes the extra mile to make their customers day. Bravo!

I don't have Chick-Fil-A often but I've had it enough to get a sense of the consistency of the chain. Tonight's visit was good but flawed. Several of the waffle fries were SO fried that they were brittle. Even larger ones. Even the chicken for the sandwich was over-fried.
